Tails soon noticed something- A weight on his chest. Two things jutting out of his back. A new center of gravity. New sensitive hearing... He gulped before acknowledging the inevitable.

"... I'm Rouge the Bat. Just wonderful.... May as well see the new digs..."

He, or rather she got up and looked around. The house looked to be highly expensive, and covered with Rouge's collection of gems. She looked around, trying to get used to her new body- It was definitely different... But there was a mystique about the 18 year old. She looked down, unconsciously licking her lips before snapping back to proper logic- She should call herself just to see if Rouge had become a two-tailed fox boy- After all, the two wanted their bodies back... At least for the most part. Maybe she might keep a copy... For study of course. But until then, she had to decide just what she would do first- Call herself, or perhaps... Experiment with her new body? See just what it was capable of after all... Right? She bit her lip.

Tails shook her head. She needed to get a hold on her body's effects on her mind. She couldn't let those... Gooey feelings affect her at the moment. Soon, she shuffled over to a phone and gulped. Her fingers twitched- They were just so thin... At least they could get to smaller things, but... She was used to her old male hands...

"Look at me... I'm going to lose myself over my fingers... I need to call... Myself... Jeez, this is just going to be so weird... Yeah, there was all that... Supernatural stuff... But body swaps? This is just going to be so weird..."

She slapped her head just to steel herself as she picked up the phone and dialed. As she waited during that eternity, she was thinking of just what could be happening- She was bound to have something answer, but who would be answering...? Would it be Rouge in the form of a two tailed fox, eager to have her body back, or would she be in a rather unique situation in meeting herself from a decidedly outside perspective...? 11523121211122222222111222211222.content:
Miles walked over to the mirror, and fixed his hair, making sure it was neat once again. He then headed out of the room, and saw Fiona setting up the gender-bender.

"Master, have you found your old body?" She asked, not looking up.

"Oh, I certainly found it, and I left Tails a little surprise for when he gets out of mine. Now, your true Master has returned, so kneel..."

Fiona looked at him, and shook her head.

"Master warned me about this." She said. "Since he got control over you while you were asleep, he worried that you might regain control when he went to sleep too. She he told me to prepare for your possible return. He clarified that I was only to obey the one called "Tails", and not to obey you. In fairness, I would've struggled to tell the difference without your grandstanding, but I think my Master knew you would do that."

"It doesn't matter, Fiona. I can reprogram your mind with ease." He frowned. "This will take but a few minutes. THen we shall enslave all of your former friends too."

"If you want to do that, you will have to remove the collar." Fiona smiled. Miles paused- He'd equipped each collar with a mental shield to block out any attempts to free or steal his slaves via telepathy or magic, the sources he would expect. He had not expected anyone using technology. He'd constantly looked down on his counterpart for valuing science over magic, but now that science had turned his own creations against him, and he had no way to fix that without putting himself in striking distance. "And imagine what will happen to you when you're in striking distance and my regular mind wakes up. SHe'll probably tear off that rather nice dick of yours."

Fiona picked up a stun gun, and pointed it at him. "I belong to Master Tails, and he entrusted me with making sure he was safe during the night. Now, go back to sleep. Your body needs rest, after all, and if you don't... I'll make you."

"You forget, I still have my powers, and I will-" Miles began to rant, only to be zapped in the head and reduced to a twitching lump on the floor. Fiona walked over to him and picked up up.

"And you talk too much." She smiled, putting him in the tank for one of Tails' machines and locking it. "That was designed to contain people like you, according to Master. You can't use warping abilities or spells, and there's no enough room for a Warp Ring inside it." She walked over to the controls. "Now, since Master will be going back to his body, I can do whatever I like with this one until you tell me what it is that you've done."

"Is that so?"

"Yes, fake-Master." She smirked. "So, tell me what you did to Master's body, or I'll start..."

115231212111222222221112222112222211.content:
Tails woke up, feeling more tired than he should've. It was easy enough to suss out that Miles had been up to something. Moreover, Fiona stood nearby, not wearing her collar.

"Fiona, why is the collar off?" He asked.

"Well, 'Master', it's really very simple." She began. "Miles took over when you went to sleep. He did something to your body, and then managed to manipulate me into removing the collar. He then went to sleep without actually doing anything to me. Right after saying that I had a low IQ. I stuck around mainly because I want to see the look on his face when he realises that."

The vixen shrugged, smirking, then pinned Tails to the bed. "However... You still brainwashed me and used me for sex. I'm going to hazard a guess that Miles was influencing you in a way, because I know I influenced you when you were in my head..."

"It's most likely, but I won't know until I'm fully myself again. We need to find out what he did to my body." Tails said, as she let him stand up. "You know, your friends are being used for sex and shit back on Moebius, right?"

"And I'm getting your help to take down the man in charge." Fiona replied. "Besides, why do you want me to go back?"

Fiona couldn't help but give herself a much larger bust, putting Rouge and Bunnie to shame. She twitched her new tails, as she admired herself in the mirror, posing for herself.

"Hmm... now what?"

11523121211212122122.content:
As she ran her hands over her new figure, Fiona caught sight of her twin tails, and let out a sigh.

Maybe being in Tails' body meant having his stupid bleeding heart too, but she found herself feeling bad about trapping him with Scourge. There was a reason she'd wanted to escape, after all. And instead of swapping with someone who deserved it, she inflicted it upon someone who had only ever been good to her...
11523121211212122122.title: She feels a pang of guilt about Tails' fate.

Fiona decides to recruit the rest of the FF.
Fiona decides to swap someone else with Tails, putting him in their body.
115231212112121221221.content:
Trying to take her mind off of her former friend wasn't helping, and she couldn't get him out of her head... or should she have been using female pronouns now? Either way, she couldn't stop herself from caring. Besides, that was her body, it was only right to feel attached, right?

"Ugh, I'd better save him... Her. Whatever!" She sighed. "But how..."
115231212112121221221.title: Fiona decides to help her victim

choices: She gears up for a fight.
She decides to grab Tails while Scourge isn't around.
The only weapons she needs are on her chest.
1152312121121212212211.content:
Her first thought was to turn to her "new" friends for help, but she reconsidered fairly swiftly. Having to explain to them why she had become a woman, and provide a good reason to rescue "Fiona" in the same conversation would be near-impossible. She'd have to do it alone, a thought that did not fill her with joy.

"I don't know if I can fight Scourge..." She mused, quietly. She'd seen how vicious he could be to his foes, and she was now one of them.

A memory flashed through her head as she pondered, and she realised, to her amusement, that she was watching a significantly younger Tails defeating Evil Sonic in battle. She also remembered that Antoine, before he had become a braver man, had defeated Evil Sonic in a single blow, when he wasn't even giving it his all! (He had thought it was the real Sonic in disguise, trying to help him look good in front of his father.)

The memories were amusing, but although it was clear that her ex had a glass jaw, she couldn't tell if that was still true after he turned green. True, her borrowed body was a lot stronger now than it was back then, but she knew Scourge's power had increased by an even greater magnitude...

Perhaps something sneakier was in order...
1152312121121212212211.title: Fiona decides to go to try and rescue Tails by ...

11523121211212122122112.content:
Forget fighting. That was bound to get her hurt or killed. She knew Scourge's routine like the back of her hand, she could just grab Tails while he wasn't about, or awake.

Fiona took the time to set up her portal, and warped onto Moebius, near the Destructix' hideout. She checked the time: 10:30pm.

Perfect. By now Scourge and the others would all be blind drunk and passed out. And she knew from experience that trying to wake up a passed-out Scourge was more like trying to bring the dead back to life. As long as she moved quietly, she'd be able to find Tails, grab her, and get out.

Carefully, she made her way inside the base, and began her search.

With the boys all passed out in the bar, Tails had separated from them to pour over some plans that Scourge would inevitably take credit for.

Fiona knew she wouldn't have gotten involved with the drinking. Neither of them would touch alcohol, so even subconscious influence from his new body would stop the fox getting wasted.

"Hey kid, miss me?" She greeted, strutting into the room, smirking slightly at Tails' stunned reaction.

11523121211212122122112112.content: "Okay, not quite the warm greeting I was expecting, but I can work with it," Fiona shrugged. "Look, maybe it's some weird subconscious thing from being in your body but I came here to save you. Why so angry?"

choices: "Because I'm your only way out of here."
115231212112121221221121121.content:
"Why am I angry? Maybe because you stole my body and left me with your jerk boyfriend!" Tails snapped, hands on her hips. "I mean yeah, the sex is great but he's such a creep!"

"Yeah, I know, hence why I decided to get out..." Fiona sighed.

"And not only that, but you then go and turn my body into... that." She added.

"I was making myself at home. But if you come back with me, we can swap back and then you can turn it back to normal." Fiona shrugged.

"Are you serious? Do you think I'm really going to fall for that?" Tails frowned.

"I'm telling the truth, Tails!" Fiona pleaded.

"Well, I suppose there's a first time for everything," The other vixen snorted dismissively.

Ouch.

That stung more than Fiona wanted to admit, and the worst part was that Tails wasn't entirely wrong. All her life she'd been a liar, a deceiver, She hurt people she cared about, people that loved and trusted her. Even when she decided to make a positive change in her life, she had decided to steal the life of an innocent boy and throw him into her personal punishment in order to do it. Because of her own cowardice, mostly...

"T-Tails, I'm... I'm sorry. But I really do want to help you now..."

"Give me one good reason why I should trust you."
115231212112121221221121121.title: Tails is angry at her for stealing his/her body...

choices: Fiona's going to need a new plan...
Fiona shrugs, and returns home. She can't help Tails now.

115231212112121221221121122.content:
"I'm not angry, I just don't want to deal with your bleeding heart bullshit," Tails snapped dismissively. "Now get lost, kid. I've got plans to work on before Scourge wakes up and... well, none of your business."

Fiona paused. Back in the lab, when the desire to save Tails had risen up, she had wondered if being in his body was making her think more like him... And it seemed that, whether or not that was true, the reverse had certainly happened to Tails. He sounded just like her. If she didn't know that it was really him in her body, she would've thought she was looking into a mirror that showed her true self.

What if this new Fiona decided to use the same plan as her and they sank into an endlessly repeating cycle of swapping each other an forgetting about it, only for them to swap again? "Do you... not remember? The whole body-swap thing?"

Tails ran over to her, grabbing her shoulders.

"Are you crazy?" She asked, sounding concerned. "You came all this way to save me from Scourge, alone and with no weapons?"

"Well, yeah. I know how the guys operate, so I thought I'd be able to do it. And so far it's working! Now come on, we need to get out of here."

"Alright..." Tails sighed. "Lead the way."

1152312121121212212212.content:
"Well, I do have some friends with similar bleeding hearts now!" She grinned, folding her arms. "I was going to have to explain this new body at some point soon anyway, might as well bite the bullet."

Fiona began to make her way to the door, twin tails swishing behind her, when she paused. "Wait... how am I going to get them to help me?"
1152312121121212212212.title: Fiona decides to recruit the rest of the FF.

11523121211212122122122.content:
They'd never listen to her if she said she wanted to go to save "Fiona." The rest of the team were no fans of her real self, not that she could really blame them at this point.

But if she decided to have the team go to Moebius for a separate reason? Well, she could steer them to land close enough to Scourge's base that they would be drawn into a fight, and then, hopefully, Tails would rejoin them, given the chance... After all, if the real her had fallen out of love with Scourge, then surely Tails, who hated him by default, would be the same, even if the the influence of being in her body was slow to catch up.

Provided that hormones or arousal he wasn't used to didn't take over, of course.

But how to prime the other Freedom Fighters to accept her? They'd think he was her, and potentially just make his situation worse. Or at the very least, not make it any better...

Wait, she had it!

Obviously her new "friends" would be interested in capturing Scourge and company. That could be her reason to go there. And she could give her real self credit for telling "Tails" where to find them, while using her own experiences of Scourge's abuse to justify the change of heart!

It was perfect!
11523121211212122122122.title: Pretend to have another reason to go to Moebius...

115231212112121221221222.content:
How to start with would be her first question. But given the nature of the information, her best bet would probably be Sally. She reached over and grabbed Tails' phone, before selecting the Princess' number.

"Hello, Tails?" Her voice echoed from the other end.

"I've got some important stuff I need to show you. Can you come over? And don't freak out." Fiona replied, before hanging up. The last thing she needed was questions about her voice right now, it'd be better to just show Sally the new body.

Besides, this way she had time to come up with an excuse for her new appearance.

About fifteen minutes later...

The doorbell rang, and Fiona quickly went to open it.

"Tails, are you okay!? On the phone you sounded..." The squirrel trailed off as she clocked her 'friend', and her new appearance. "... Feminine..."

"Hi, Sally," Fiona gave her best attempt at mimicking Tails' smile.

"What happened to your body?"

11523121211212122122122212.content:
"You know you could've asked me, or Bunnie, or any of the others, and we would've been happy to help, right?" Sally asked, stepping inside, and closing the door behind her. Fiona managed to avoid making a face, the willingness that these people had to not only help "Tails" with her experiments, but trust her enough to be her test subjects, ready to agree to let her use any manner of device on them...

Maybe that could be useful if she managed to convince Tails to keep being her. She might be able to have some fun with that...

Still, she needed to maintain her excuse.

"Well, I didn't want to put any of my friends at risk! Besides, I needed to test the gender-bender anyway, so I thought I could kill two birds with one stone," Fiona replied, slightly hurried.
11523121211212122122122212.title: "Needed a female test subject, decided to m...

choices: Sally wants to hear this other news.
Sally wants to know what the alleged device is, putting Fiona on the spot.
115231212112121221221222122.content:
"Speaking of... why do you have gender-bender?" Sally asked.

"Well, I thought it would be a good thing to do for people. Right now, sex-changes are long and complicated operations. Expensive too. But with this? One push of a button, and boop, done. I just need to stay in this form for a week or two to make sure there aren't any side-effects and then it can go to patent," Fiona explained, thankful for the combination of Tails' genius brain and her own ability to lie through her teeth.

"That's wonderful, Tails," Sally smiled, hugging her. "You're going to help so many people!"

Fiona flinched at the sudden embrace, and paused when she heard Sally's words. It felt... kinda good. The whole thing felt good, in fact. She knew Tails' relationship to Sally was a weird one. He used to call her "Aunt", but their actual bond was more like a sort of older sister and surrogate parent rolled into one. And that bond was something that Fiona had to admit she'd always rather envied. Not necessarily with Sally herself, but having an upstanding maternal figure was something she'd always wanted.

Gingerly, she returned the hug, feeling herself warm up.

"Thanks, Sally!" She beamed. "And that's not the only good news I have!"
115231212112121221221222122.title: Sally asks why "Tails" has a gender-ben...

choices: Sally immediately assumes "Tails" has been tricked.
1152312121121212212212221221.content:
"Well, hit me," Sally shrugged.

"I know where Scourge's hideout is!" Fiona announced. "Like, the exact location!"

"You do?" Sally asked. "How did you find that out?"

"Well, uh..." She pulled away from the royal hug, hands behind her back as she kicked one foot slightly, looking down. Time for her oscar-winning performance. "Promise you won't be mad?"

"Tails... what did you do?" Sally raised an eyebrow.

"Promise me!"

"Tails, it's fine. I won't be mad. Promise." Sally raised her hands, a placating gesture. Fiona wasn't certain if this was going to hold, but she could put that to the test.

"Okay..." She gulped, then looked down again. "Fiona told me."
1152312121121212212212221221.title: Sally wants to hear this other news.

choices: "Then let's get ready to go. I'll call the others."
"Tails, she's playing you. This is a trap."
11523121211212122122122212212.content:
"Go on." Sally went stiff, folding her arms.

"She hacked into my portal somehow, and came through here last night. She said that Scourge had been hurting her, she showed me the bruises..." Fiona fought to keep her composure. Relaying her experiences at Scourge's hand wasn't the easiest, regardless of the person she was speaking in or to. "She wants to come home, and I offered to let her stay, said we could work out a way to ease everyone's tempers about her presence, but... she said she had to earn her way back. Had to prove where she stood. So she showed me where their base is, and told me when we should best attack. There's a point of day where they're all drunk, except for her, and we can have an easier time of it. She just asked that we bring her back as a friend, rather than putting her in jail."

Sally stared at "Tails" for a long moment, the vixen starting to sweat bullets.

"Of course, Tails. I'll set everything up, you just be ready to explain everything about this new you to the others," She winked.

"Thanks, Sally!" Fiona beamed, hugging her again. It felt nice. She could get used to this...

1152312121121212212212221221212.content:
Several awkward explanations later, both of the changes to "Tails", and of what they were all doing, Fiona stood among her old friends, ready to explain the information that she had allegedly been given.

Fortunately, she'd managed to convince Sonic that she was the real deal too, and there'd been little grumbling from Amy and Antoine about the idea of rescuing Fiona.

"Right, so, according to Fiona, at about 4pm every day, the Destructix start drinking. Depending on the day they've had, it won't take them long to become completely inebriated. Now, Fiona herself doesn't join in, so she'll be sober. The base has a pretty simple layout, so it won't be hard to find them all, and Fi should help, but given what she's been through she might not be up for it."

"So we just go in and beat them up?" Sonic asked.

"Pretty much," Fiona confirmed. "Any objections?"

It didn't take her long to locate the room, and open the door.

1152312121121212212212221221212111111.content:
"Fiona!?" Tails turned, eyes lighting up. "Oh thank god!"

She rushed over and threw her arms around her own stolen body, and Fiona quickly returned the hug, holding her old form tightly.

"Wait, why do I have boobs?" The red vixen suddenly paused.

"Long story, look, I tried to make myself more comfortable in the new body, but then I realised that I felt really bad about ditching you with Scourge, especially since you were always nice to me, so I decided to rescue you. I managed to convince the others that I had turned myself into a girl for an experiment, and also that I'd received a tip-off from "Fiona" about where to find this pllace and how to get in, on the condition that we bring "her" home safely and don't arrest "her". Used my own memories to sell it, and now we're here."

"Pretty sneaky. Were you planning on telling them the truth?" Tails asked, apparently in a very forgiving mood.

"Nah, what they don't know won't hurt 'em. We'll get back, and as soon as they're gone, we can switch back, and they'll be none the wiser." She replied. "If you want to swap back, that is?"

"Let's talk about that later. For now, we should get out of here," Tails said, hugging her once more before letting go. "I was working on my own escape plan, but this makes things a whole lot easier."

"Yeah. And play along, please. Let's not make this awkward."

"Sure thing, 'Tails!'" She giggled. Maybe it was just being in Tails' body, but her own laughter sounded wonderful to the vixen, from an outside perspective.

"Alright, let's go, 'Fiona!'" She replied.
1152312121121212212212221221212111111.title: Tails is pleased to see her.

1152312121121212212212221221212111112.content:
The red vixen turned toward her borrowed body, and narrowed her eyes at her.

"What the heck did you do to my body, Fiona!?" She growled, as the blonde raised her hands defensively.

"Hey, easy, easy. Play along and I'll switch us back, okay?" She stated quietly.

"What do you mean, 'play along?'"

"I mean your friends think I'm you. I told them a little story about how 'Fiona' came to 'me' and spilled all the details on this place, including the best time to attack. Then I used my own experience with Scourge to explain why, and we came to rescue you. I got Sally to promise you wouldn't be arrested for being me, so if you go along with this story and keep being me for just a bit longer, we can go home, I'll swap us back, and you can turn this cute little bod back to normal."

"Give me one good reason why I shouldn't tell the others the truth," Tails folded her arms. "They'll just make you swap us back and then throw you in jail."

"Do you really want that to happen, Tails?" She gave him her best doe-eyed look. "You know how much being locked up scares me... I'm sorry I did this, but I do want to make it right with you..."

"Okay, fine..." Tails sighed. "Let's go."

1152312121121212212212221221212111113.content:
"Kid? Why are you calling me by your name?" The red vixen raised an eyebrow. "And what's with the boobs?"

Fiona swore she felt her heart stop. Yes, she had previously pondered as to whether her sudden desire to help Tails was him influencing her, but could he really have been influenced by her so much that he now thought he was her? Would that happen to her too? And if it would, why had he changed so much quicker?

Still, maybe this could work to her advantage. In theory, if Tails now thought he was her, then he would still want to leave, just like she did. They could just go home, and she wouldn't need to convince him to go along with her deception until she could switch them back. Then she could test whether she really was going to become Tails... and if she wasn't, well... nothing would stop her from keeping her new life.

Even if the arousal she felt at the sight of her old body was weirding her out a little.

Still, best to confirm that really was the case, before her mind got away from her.

"Do you... not remember?"

As Scourge lay there, snoring, Tails slowly shifted his stolen body, wincing in pain. Every part of him felt sore, and violated. He had been unnecessarily rough with her, every bit as much a brute in the bedroom as he was on the battlefield. She stood up, and limped to the bathroom, breathing shallow, and turned the shower on. Everything felt unclean, ad he had to wash it all away.

"Is sex always like this?" He murmured. As if in response, one of Fiona's memories flashed into his mind. He saw, through her eyes, Fiona lying down on a bed, with Sonic on top of her. He gently caressed her form, rubbing it all over, before he mounted her and began to slowly thrust his hips, sending shockwaves of pleasure up and down her spine. Immediately, the difference became obvious. Scourge had been all take, no give, whereas Sonic was more focused on making her feel good. Even if the knowledge that Sonic and Fiona had sex did annoy him, at least he understood the concept a little more now.

He got out of the shower on shaky legs, and began to dry himself, glancing at his 'borrowed' face in the mirror. Something seemed a little off, and he parted the fur around her eye to expose bruised, purple skin.

"How did you get this?" He mused. Fiona's memory came to his aid again, showing a flash of an enraged Scourge lashing out at everyone and everything around him. He had no idea whether the strike was deliberate or not, but he didn't seem all that sorry for her. "Oh dear... What do you see in him?"

This time, he didn't get a response. He sighed, and stepped out of the bathroom. The bed still stank of sweat and sex, and Scourge had taken up most of the space. He sighed, and looked around the room, before his eyes finally spotted a Warp Ring on the nightstand.

He's violent and rough all the time. And, now that I know where to look, having been in that body, I can see a lot of bruises. And a few cuts too. I saw how he spoke to you when you invaded with him. He threatened you. He shouted at you and got enraged when you were concerned for him, as if he took any care and sympathy as a personal insult, even coming from you, someone he's supposed to care about."

Tails' stomach dropped as he realised that the room had been trashed. Wherever Fiona had gone, whoever had taken her, she had put up a fight. A fight she evidently lost.

Then he spotted the clump of green spines on the floor, and immediately felt sick.

"Oh no. Oh no no no no..."


He flew back down the stairs, screeching to a halt near his friends.

"Scourge took her!"

"What!?"

"The room's been turned upside down and there's green spikes lying about!" He explained.

"Why didn't we hear that?" Bunnie asked.

"The whole building is soundproofed, so the noise from Tails' workshop doesn't disturb anyone," Nicole replied.

"Well. Looks like we're going to Moebius," Sally frowned. "Gear up, everyone. Be back here in ten minutes or we're going without you."

"Fiona might not have ten minutes!" Tails yelped.


Sally sighed, turning and grabbing Tails' shoulders.

"I know this is terrifying, and I want to help Fiona as much as you do, but we'll do her no good if we run in there half-cocked and lose the fight. Taking Scourge down is never easy, and we need to be certain we can win."

Even if she didn't believe Miles' words... she felt it was right to support his end goal...

"I understand, Master, and I will obey." Fiona said, bowing her head. She glanced up at Tails, the vixen giving her a look that she couldn't quite read, not sure whether she was simply pleased, or aroused. "ANd I will follow your orders, Mistress."

"Master, do you wish for us to head to Mobius Prime now, or later?" Tails asked.

Your rooms have large bathrooms connected to them so you will not have to go far." After finding her room she didn't wait long to strip and step into her shower, nearly squealing as the water cleansed the dirt off her body so elegantly.

1152312122112112222221111212211122211122.content:
After she dried herself, Fiona left the bathroom and was surprised to find Tails standing in her room, wearing a pink dressing gown.

"Oh, erm,Mistress, what are you doing here?" She asked, instinctively covering herself. She blushed brightly, realising that if any spark of the Tails she knew was left in her head, he'd probably be loving the view.

"Master Miles intends us to work together." She replied. "In order for us to do that, I need to be able to trust you, so we need to get to know each other better."

"Mistress, it's me, Fiona... you know me... Did Master alter your memories?"

"No, but he allowed me to see you from a new perspective. My previous self was blinded by his love for you. He could never quite accept your treachery as being you, and blamed Scourge for everything you did. I know better. I know that you were the traitor, you were not brainwashed or coerced, you chose to betray your friends and slap me in the face to cement it." Tails lectured her coldly. "I do not feel that I know the real you, Fiona. And because of that, I cannot trust you. So, we must get to know each other better. That way, if you do betray me, I will know..."

Fiona looked down at the floor, knowing that Tails was right, at least mostly.

"M-master ordered us to sleep..." She murmured weakly. She couldn't justify herself or argue back. She just wanted to worm her way out of this, however possible.

"Y'know I have a normal phone, right?"

"Whatever," Miles grunted. Cream's smiling face appeared on the screen.

"Hello, Mr. Tails!" She beamed. "How are you?"

"I'm fine, Cream!" Miles tried to mimic Tails' speech patterns as best as he could, much to his slave's amusement. "Could you come over to my lab, quickly? I need your help with something."

"Ooh, what is it?" She asked. Miles paused for a second, swallowing as he tried to think of something to tell her, until he spotted the Chao floating around behind her.

"Uh, a Chao translator!"

"Oh, wow! I'll be right there, Mr. Tails!" Cream gasped, hanging up the call. Tails' faintly suppressed giggles boiled over and she began to laugh heartily at her Master's tortured expression.

"You realise you used to sound like that, right?" He growled. She blushed, and her laughter died quickly. "Thank you."

The fox paused, and then began to laugh.

"It's true!"

"I know. Fiona wouldn't come up with something so crazy." Miles replied, wiping a tear from his eyes. "I bet that's not what you meant when you said you wanted to be inside her."

However, while I'm going to fix your body situation as soon as I can, I'm not sure what to do with Fiona... The people here would very much like to have their way with her... I can't imagine you want that?"

"No, and sending her back t Scourge isn't an option. He abuses her." Tails frowned.

Their barrier is probably what screwed up Miles' transportation spell. However, we've been studying it, and we now have a way through. This portal is stable and should get you home."

Tails nodded, and jumped into the portal, rematerialising in his lab on Mobius Prime. Hetook step forward and let out a sigh. "Good to be home... Now I just have to find my body."

115231212212112122.content:
"First thing's first, I need to tell the others." He picked up his phone, dialing Sally's number.

"Tails?" She picked up the other end.

"Er, kinda."

"Fiona!?" The squirrel seethed. "Get away from him this instant!"

"That's going to be tough. We're sharing a body at the moment. Miles' doing, he tried to summon me to his world, but only got my mind, and I ended up stuck in Fiona's head. At the moment, I'm in control, but I don't know if she's awake or if she's dormant. I want my body back, but I need someone to supervise the transfer. I also had to make a deal with Miles to get home."

"Whoa, slow down... You're saying that you're Tails... Stuck in Fiona's body... because of somehting Miles did."

"Yes."

"... Alright, even she couldn't make something like that up."

"If you come over, I can prove it. I have my body here with no brain activity."

"And you said you made a deal with Miles?"

"I needed help to get back home, and he wanted us there to help him fight Scourge, and minimize casualties. I said we would help in exchange for getting me home so I could get out of Fiona's head."

"Why couldn't he just send you back to your regular form?"

"I didn't ask."

"Really?"

"Sally... Scourge abuses Fiona. He treats her like crap. I've felt it myself. ANd I cna feel that she's afraid of him... I sensed it when I saw her memories... So I came back while still in her body so I could save her."

"I... see... Well, regardless of what she did, I won't send her back to that. We need to address that when you two are separate again." Sally mused. "I'll come over with Nicole, and we can get you back in your body. I'll get Sonic to round the others up to prepare for this trip to Moebius."

"Thanks Sally!" Tails sighed. "I'll get the machine set up and see if I can communicate with Fiona at all, make sure she's okay."

"Alright.We'll be there in about... twenty minutes, all told."

"Thanks." He smiled "See you then."


Setting up the machine only took five minutes, and that left him with fifteen to kill. Sitting down on a chair, he closed his eyes, and tried to make some form of contact with Fiona.

Soon, the whole team arrived- Sonic, Sally, Nicole, Antoine, Bunnie, Rotor and Amy, all of them looking a little disturbed, but hapy that Tails was unhurt and that, even if it was odd, FIona was in their custody.

"Any luck communicating with her?" Sally asked.

"No... She's either buried deep or grumpy with me." Tails sighed. "She should be okay once I'm not in her mind anymore. Plase, when she wakes up, let me handlethis alone. We don't want to scare her."

11523121221211212221.title: They make it there on time.

115231212212112122211.content:
Tails sat up, breathing heavily, as the others clustered around him, hugging him.

"I'm fine, I'm fine." He smiled, returning the gesture. "It's good to be back."

"Y'all gonna be okay, Sugah?"

"I will. How about Fiona?" He stood up, a little unsteady on his feet, making his way over to the vixen.

"She seems to be waking up." Nicole replied. Nodding, Tails gestured for his friends to back off, and sat beside her.

"Fiona, are you alright?"

"Ungh... Tails?" She murmured. "You're out of my head?"

"You remember?"

"Bits and pieces..." She replied, as her eyes opened and she rubbed her head. "That was the worst feeling of my life, having someone else bouncing around my head..."

"Want an asprin? You look like you've got a headache." He asked.

"Yeah, that'd be good, thanks." She smiled faintly. He gestured again, and Sonic zipped off to the bathroom, returning with the bottle of pills and a glass of water. Tails took both, handed her a tablet, and then the glass. She swallowed hard, and then finished the drink. "Oh, I feel better already..."

"Fiona... Can I ask you something?"

"Yes?"

"WHy did you stay with him?" He asked. "After wat he did and said to you, and how afraid you were, why did you stay?"

"I had nowhere else to go..." She replied, looking down. "If I'd come back, I would've been killed or locked up. The Squad hated me, Finitevus wouldn't take kindly to me ditching him twice, I don't even know where Nic is... So I stayed..."

"Well... I can promise you this... We won't hurt you. And I won't let you be locked up again."He gingerly wrapped his arms around her, hugging her, before turning his head to give his friends a look. "Right?"

The looked among each other for a moment, some of them didn't look pleased, and the whispers went back and forth until Sally looked at him and, with a heavy sigh, nodded.

"She can stay. But if this comes back to bite us, I'll be holding you responsible." She folded her arms.

"Fair enough." He smiled, turning back to the vixen. "Why don't you go get some rest while we join up with Miles and take down the Destructix? You'll be safe here, there are warm beds, a nice shower, and plenty of food. JUst don't touch anything in the lab, some of it's dangerous."
115231212212112122211.title: Fiona wakes up.

1152312122121121222111.content: "Thank you Tails." The young fox would wink before joining the team through the portal. Once they left Fiona hopped up and grabbed a ray gun and a computer she could use to track Mighty and Nice down, despite the offer Tails gave the vixen made a promise a long time ago that she would get revenge on the two who left her behind imprisoned by Eggman while Nic on the other hand was the one who saved her so she at least owed her a visit.
1152312122121121222111.title: Fiona accepts this.

11523121221211212221112.content:
"Alright, let's find Nic..." Fiona sat back on the seat. However, as she sat back, the screen went dark, and changed to an image of Nicole's face. "What are you doing here?"

"I don't have a body outside of the city, and since my computer abilities will be of no help in a straight brawl... I decided to take the time to get to know you a little." She smiled, as her image floated out of the screen and grew to Mobian size, floating beside her. "My name is Nicole. I was barely a person last time we spoke but I want you to know that I understand your situation. I know what it's like to be the outcast. To be used by people that you can't fight back against. To be faced with punishment for what you've done, even if you don't necessarily deserve it."

"Well, thanks... But I'm not sure I get what you're getting at. I heard about that whole "Iron Nicole" thing. You were literally brainwashed. Everything I did, I chose to do."

"There's more than one way to brainwash someone. And charismatic individuals who know your weaknesses can brainwash you just by talking to you. They keep lying, and feeding you want you want to hear, and twisting the truth, until suddenly, you don't act like yourself anymore. Does that sound familiar?"

"... Yes..." SHe looked down. "He gained my trust by pretending to be Sonic. By the time I realised the deception, it was too late... I'd already given him everything he needed to get inside my head. He's smarter than he looks."

"I know. So is Sonic." Nicole smiled faintly. "But, as much as Amy might disagree, as will Sally when she's had a few, he's not perfect. And he knows that."

"Wait, Sally drinks?"

"Only on special occasions." The lynx began to grin. "She's a very loving drunk. Be good and I might show you the pictures."

"Ooh, incentive. Anyway, what's this about Sonic not being a bottomless void of ego?"

"He doesn't take failure well. He gets angry and does what he can to fix it, but he's also bearing the burden of being the beacon of hope for everyone else. If he's seen to be depressed, or upset, it has a dramatic negative effect on morale. That's why he gets so enraged when one of us is hurt or endangered. Because he needs us. He needs us to help him cope." Nicole explained.

"And why tell me this?" Fiona asked. "You know I have a personal problem with him."

"Because it's misplaced. You, Sonic, and Mighty were all together in Prison Complex 457-A. However, Nic rescued you from Prison Complex 457-B, a separate building several miles away. Everyone that was recaptured was moved to a different location. And I can tell you that because one of them is a regular jail, and the other is a research facility where Robotnik built Auto-Automata."

"And you know this... how?"

"Because I have access to the FF database, and 457-B wasn't located until after the war, when the shields were down." Nicole replied. "Before we move on, Fiona, I want to suggest something to you."

"Hm?"

"Stop living in the past. Stop letting yourself be controlled by what came before. Forget all of this revenge and rage and just... live your life. Revenge isn't worth fighting for. All it begets is more vengeance, as more people come after you instead, and you end up always running, alone and constantly looking over your shoulder. It consumes you, destroys you. And often, you find you make that mistake. You hurt someone who didn't deserve it, you break a family apart, and suddenly, you have nothing left to live for, nothing outside of your now fulfilled vendetta, and that family are coming after you to make you pay." Nicole laid her hands on Fiona's shoulders, giving her a smile, before hugging her. The lynx's hologram form felt warm and tough. "The past doesn't define who you are. It just gives you the starting point for who you're going to be."

"I... I need some time to think." Fiona curled up a little.

"Why don't we have a little R&R? I'll keep up your search for Nic, and we can go and have a little fun. You need a new outfit and I want to experience more things about life, and it'd be nice to just live like normal people for a few hours, don't you think?"

"Yeah, I guess." The vixen stood up. "This thing does ride up in all the wrong paces. I can't imagine Tails was comfortable."

"I know what you mean, but now I'm just imagining him in his regular body wearing that." She stifled a giggle.

"Oh hell, that's an image." The vixen smirked.

"Look, look!" She waved her hand, a hologram of Tails wearing the outfit appearing beside her. The two of them began to laugh, leaning up against each other. "Oh, oh, watch this!" She gestured again, the hologram taking on a more coquettish pose. Fiona gave in to a full-on belly laugh.

"We're going to get on fine." She said, giving her new friend a one-armed hug, as the hologram faded. "Let's go."

"Screw this." FIona sighed, running around the building. She fished a coin out of her pocket, and held it up toward the duck. "Hey Bean, look, I got a shiny for you!"

"Oh, hey Fifi!" He beamed. "Sorry about Bark, he's grumpy today. Nack's inside trying to find Nic, and then it'll be an awesome family reunion!"

"Right, right." Fiona nodded slightly- She didn't quite have the heart to tell Bean what Nack was planning. "Anyway, look at the shiny."

"Oooh..." Bean caught sight of the coin, and grinned, eyes widening. She waved it around, watching as he followed it, then threw it into the treeline. Bean jumped up, and scampered after it. "Come back, shiny!"

"Right, let's get in there." Fiona grinned, kicking the door in. "Ready, Nicole?"

"What can I do?"

"I dunno, dazzle him with that light?"

"Fair enough." She smiled.

choices: Stay with this trio, as they go home.
Go back to Tails and the other FF.
115231212212112122211122222111.content:
THe two weasels stood, glaring at each other. Nack had a sniper rifle trained on his sister, Nic pointing an SMG at him in return. She knew, and he guessed, that her gun was empty, and she was backed up against a wall, gritting her teeth. Her face was bruised, her distinctive larger fang knocked out, blood trickling down her chin.

"Is this really about reputation?" She growled. "Just because I happened to get some better marks than you?"

"Yeah, kinda. You're still respected. I'm just a joke in their eyes!" He snarled, lisping around his tooth. "To them, I'm the guy that got kicked in the nuts by a princess!"

"Slaughtering our cousins didn't fix your rep, what's killing me gonna do?" She spat.

"Nobody knew about them, but you? You're famous. You're the one that trained the harlot that sold the Freedom Fighters out to Finitevus and Scourge. You're a somebody. For the next few seconds, anyway."


"I dunno." Fiona smirked, walking in. "This 'harlot' might have a thing or two to say about that."

"Fi?!" Nic gasped.

"THe hell are you doing here!?" He whirled around, pointing his rifle at her. Seizing her chance, Nic sprang forward, and rammed her foot into his knee, forcing him to crumple to the floor. The gun bucked, a shot firing into the ceiling. Fiona charged up, and kicked him hard, right between the legs. He gave a squeak, and crumpled to the floor.

"Fiona?" Nicole appeared beside her. "Aren't you wearing steel-toed boots?"

"Yup!"

"Ouch." She winced. "I'm not even a guy and I felt that. And I don't have a body!"

"Eh, whatever." Fiona shrugged, and turned her attention to Nic, running up and hugging her tightly. "Are you okay?"

"I'm fine, Fi." Nic smiled, hugging her back. "It's been a while."

"Too long." She nodded.

"You runnin' with the Freedom Fighters again?" She glanced at Nicole.

"It's a long story, but Scourge was abusive and, in a roundabout way, Tails brought me home. They went to go and fight Scourge, and I stayed here. I made friends with Nicole, and she traced your life signal and led us both here. " Fiona replied. "Really glad I didn't stop to get a new outfit first."

"That thing looks pretty good on ya, to be fair?"

"Are you kidding? I look like Scourge's whore." FIona frowned. "And it's really tight and sweaty and it rides up in all the wrong places!"

"Well, if ya say so." Nic shrugged. I always preferred bein' au naturale myself."

"I might try that again." Fiona shrugged. "Sally pulls it off."

"So, what now?" Nic asked. "He's gonna be after me again."

"We could take him home and lock him up. We just need to convince Bean and Bark to come too." Fiona replied.

"You really want to rejoin the Freedom Fighters?" Nic pressed. "We could always team up again."

"Yes." She nodded. "I have to make amends for what I did. So I can have a clear conscience. And Nicole showed me that revenge isn't a worthwhile endeavour. Nack just proved that point."

"Well, best of luck. I'm proud of ya." She smiled. "Still... I could use a doctor about now."

"Let's get you home. We can worry about these losers later." Nicole said. "If they come back for you, they'll struggle to get into Mobotropolis."

"Alright."

115231212212112122211122222111121.title: Bark wants to give up, the fighting has gotten ...

choices: Fiona says she can take care of Nic's injuries by herself.
1152312122121121222111222221111212.content:
"If I understand you two correctly, Bean is typically taking the lead and you follow behind him to make sure he doesn't get himself hurt or killed, right?" Nicole asked. The bear nodded, looking down at the unconscious duck. "Well, then I should be able to pull a few strings and make sure you don't get locked up."

"Wait, really?" Fiona asked.

"Would you say that Bean understands what he's doing?"

"... No... Oh, I see! Because he doesn't understand, he's not really guilty, and Bark hasn't really done much except follow him and protect him." Fiona snapped her fingers.

"Exactly." Nicole smiled. "And since Nic is well on the side of the law now, you're probably going to be the only one in any sort of trouble, and even Tails doesn't defend you to the hilt, I'll eat my handheld."

Fiona smiled for a moment, then frowned. "What if Bean becomes a problem again?"

"That's where you two come in." Nicole said, gesturing to her and Nic. "I want you two to be his handlers, since you know how to control him. Divert his tendencies from being a hindrance to the Freedom Fighters, to a help. Point him at Eggman, or Naugus, or Finitevus, or any of them."

"Oh, that could work." Nic smiled. "I'll take that on, looks like Fi has a lot of her own issues to handle."

"I'll help as much as I can, Nic." Fiona nodded. "But yeah, there are some issues there."


The rest of the trip was made with just small talk, as Nicole brought her friends to the Mobotropolis FF base, and took them all to the medbay.

"As much as we worked everything out, it's easier to get a doctor out here than explain everything right now." Nicole said. "I shall call Doctor Quack."

"Well it was nice seeing you Fi and thank you for all of this, after I get the medical help I'm going back to a place I set up here in the city where I plan on resting for a bit before checking in on who to hunt next." 1152312122121121222111222221111212111221.content:
Fiona sat down on the floor and sighed.

"I'm sorry... I just can't face him... Not after what he did to me." Bark laid a massive paw on her shoulder, and Nicole hugged her again.

"It's alright. But I promise you, even if he got away, I don't think any of us will let him come back and hurt you again." She said. Fiona smiled faintly.

"Thanks guys."

At that moment, the portal lit up, and the Freedom Fighters began to come back through, the new arrivals fortunately halting Bean's advance, as he zipped back over to Bark's side. The team looked like they'd been in a hell of a battle, bruises and cuts galore, but they were smiling, and seemed satisfied.

"Uh, looks like we've got another unexpected guest..." Sally mused, clocking the bird and bear. "Fiona, why are they here?"

"I wanted to find Nic, and Nicole helped me. But these two were there because Nack had been hunting her down. He cornered her, but I managed to distract him and we took him down together. Then Bark decided that he didn't want to fight anymore, and came back with us, and he brought Bean with him. I think they're gonna go back to working with Nic, since their methods don't really fit in the Freedom Fighters, right guys?"

Bark nodded.

"Alright then. Nic went to get herself back on the list at the office, she's had to take herself off because she was in hiding." Fiona added. "I take it from the smiles that you won."

"Yes, we did. He won't hurt you ever again." Tails walked over, and hugged her gently, causing her to blush. Tears welled up in her eyes, and she returned the gesture.

"Thank you... Thank you so much."

"What happened?" Nicole asked.

1152312122121121222111222221111212111221.content:
Unfortunately for Bean, but probably fortunately for everyone else, a team of crazed Freedom Fighters running around the city and stealing everything with even a slight sheen to it was more than a little conspicuous, and they were quickly rounded up by the Secret Freedom Fighters, with the assistance of Nic.

***

A few hours later, the Bean Fighters had been moved to the hospital wing of the prison, where they were being stored and treated. Elias stood outside the cell, with his team, Nic and most of the Acorn Council beside them. 'Shiny Duck' was currently inactive as Rotor worked on a way to turn her back into Nicole, while the others were in cells together. Most of them weren't up to much without Bean, who was in a separate cell, to order them around. Most of them were admiring the legs and arm of "Shiny Rabbit", as he had named Bunnie, while Princess Boobies (Sally) pressed herself against the force field, enthralled by her brother's crown.

"I'm sorry." Nic said. "We shouldn't have brought him back. I thought I could control him, I thought Fi could control him, but I guess I was wrong."

"Don't worry about it, we'll fix this." Shard shrugged.

"So, what exactly was done to them?" Rosemary asked, staring at "Propeller Butt" as he dopily leaned against Fifi.

"From what Rotor's been able to glean from Nicole's memory banks, Bean got a hold of the mind control devices Tails was working on and used them to put the Freedom Fighters under his spell and make them just as crazy as him. He also used the device Nicole made so we could keep her free from mental isues to synch her mind with his, hence why she transformed herself into a copy of him, while the others were comfortable with their original forms." Elias replied.

"Wait, why did Tails have mind control devices?" Silver asked.

"He's studying them." Isabella replied. "They're all versions of Eggman's tech, and he's trying to find out how it works so we can break Eggman's hold on his slaves."

"The Council asked him to do that, don't worry." Sir Charles added. "So... can we fix them?"

"Yes." Elias nodded.

1152312122121121222111222221111212111221.content:
Soon, Shiny Duck was reconnected to the city, and had full power over the nanites again.

"You know what to do, Shiny Duck!" Bean grinned. The crazed AI nodded, and set to work.

Nanobots, too small to see, began to fly into the heads of everyone in the city, filling their heads with the same madness and obedience to Bean that had overtaken their heroes. At the same time, she began to pump the hypnotic gas everywhere she could, the chemicals trapped within the city's shield dome. Screens all over the city began to display hypnotic waves, driving everyone into a form of insane obedience.

***

Bean sat on his new throne, wearing the crown on his head. Elias had no problem with surrendering the shiny object to his Master after Shiny Duck had finished with him. After all, who else could be the rightful King of Shinytropolis? Princess had been offered to the new King as a source of heirs, but Bean had been uninterested in the idea until the existence of wedding rings had been explained to him. She now sat by his side as "Queen Princess Dynamite, nee Boobies" and gave her Master a new shiny ring at every opportunity (Neither of them really knew what they were doing, but any excuse to give shinies to Bean was capitalised on).

The Council now focused entirely on locating new sources of shinies for their Master. Everyone in the city was enslaved to Bean's will, now. They were devoted to him and his ideals. Every shiny object located was to be immediately given to him. Every visiting newcomer was to be enlightened into obedience by Shiny Duck. The former lynx had been worried that the obsession with shinies would cause the people to fight over them, but the enslavement to Bean ensured that everyone was friendly, and shared the shiny objects.

"Turning the Freedom Fighters and Fi into your minions, Bean." Nic sighed. "Look, buddy, I get that you want to be a Freedom Fighter, but thigns like this are why you can't do that. You're just going to end up in jail again. Fi managed to get you a second chance, she stopped you from being arrested on sight. And you've repaid her by doing this to her. Come on, kid. Let 'em go, and maybe we can work out a way to stop you from getting jail time. Though it won't be easy with what you've done..."

"We can deal with that, but for now, send them back to the cells and let's go get them unbrainwashed, yeah?"

"Yeah, okay! I was getting bored of the "Yes Masters" anyway." Bean shrugged. "Being me isn't that fun when everyone's me. THey don't laugh at me or tell me off because they all think I'm right."

1152312122121121222111222221111212111221.content:
Fiona had decided to stay at Tails' lab before she left, and now that she wasn't returning, the fox was beginning to grow worried.

"It's been hours and she hasn't come back." He sighed.

"Maybe she decided to run off?" Amy suggested. "It wouldn't really be a surprise."

"No, I think her wanting to stay was genuine... something must've happened to her." The fox insisted.

"Tails, I know you love her, but she's not right in the head." Sally sighed. "Maybe something spooked her, and she took off."

"WHat do you mean 'spooked', Sally?" Amy asked.

"Well, if she realised that just because we want to help her, doesn't mean the council will approve. Especially Tails' mother." Sally replied. "In any case, I'll have Nicole scan for her, to see if there's any trace."

"Thanks!" Tails beamed.

1152312122121121222111222221111212111221.content:
"I'm afraid it's not that simple..." Nicole sighed, as she took form. "I saw what happened myself, but thanks to the Council's sanctions on me, I was unable to act on it."

"What? What happened?!" Tails asked, panic rising.

"Bean happened. It seems he took control of Nic and Bark after we were freed from his spell, and then did the same to Fiona. They then left the city." Nic explained.

"Oh no..."

"Why didn't anybody take the mind control beam off him!?" Amy demanded.

"We were a little distracted and frazzled at the time..." Sally sighed.

"We were, but the people that weren't brainwashed weren't!" The pink hedgehog pressed. Sally merely shrugged in agreement. "Well, where are they now?"

"I don't know, but if I had to guess, I'd say they'll probably head for the nearest population centre. It seems Bean is still intent on using them as thieves, rather than any grander goal..." Nicole replied.


Tails had said nothing since Nicole had revealed Fiona's fate, but as his eyes narrowed and his hands clenched into fists, he looked up at his friends.

"I'm going after them." He said, uncharacteristically cold. As he turned to walk away, Sally's hand grabbed his shoulder. He turned to look at her, still frowning.

1152312122121121222111222221111212111221.content:
Bean had been enjoying his minions' crime wave for a couple of weeks before things started to go wrong. He spent most of his time sitting on a throne made of his ill-gotten prizes, with Fiona still in her dazed trance by his side- He'd forgotten to properly brainwash her and she was still drifting in and out of trance every now and then.

However, while the Bean Fighters still seemed like their old selves, their actions hadn't gone unnoticed. With the robberies escalating day-by-day, the Chaotix Detective Agency had been hired to investigate, and they hadn't come alone. The trio of investigators had brought the rest of their team with them- Knuckles, Julie-Su, Mighty, Ray, and Saffron, to have a better chanceof apprehending the thieves.

The Bean Fighters had been able to give their former allies the slip for a few days, but as Bean's operations in the city began to draw to a close, the difficulty of getting into the last bastions of "shinies" ultimately gave them their trump card.

It had been a rather large shock to everyone when Sally Acorn was caught raiding the royal vaults. She was captured shortly afterwards, and brought to the prison for interrogation. Seeing nothing wrong with her actions morally, Sally had no qualms about telling the Chaotix everything about her Master.

11531.content:
After getting dressed, Tails leaves Amy's room in search of Sonic.

         Sonic spies Tails, and immediately starts to run away screaming, with Tails calling after him. After six or so times, Tails begins to get pissed off. On the seventh time, he angrily and sternly shouts, "Hold it right there, Sonic!"

         Realizing that he may have overstepped Tails' patience, Sonic stopped and turned around, a wary look on his face. "What is it Amy? I have a bit of an emergency, here."

         "Saving them small birds does not count as an emergency. More are shot for food each hour, whereas I have a real emergency on my hands."

         "Is it an 'emergency' like last time?"

         "Last time?"

         Yeah, don't you remember?"

         "...No."

         "I certainly do." Sonic muttered.


FLASHBACK ▼

         "Sonic, I have an emergency!"

         Sonic's visage took on a worried look. "What is it, Amy?"

         "I don't have enough money to buy new clothes!"

         Sonic sighed. "Amy, that isn't an emergency. If somebody is in danger, or Knuckles, Shadow, or Rouge is visiting, then it is an emergency. Clothing money, or lack thereof is not an emergency."

         "...But... my wardrobe is in danger of being outdated!"

         "Let me put it bluntly. No one cares about clothing! Nobody dies from having outdated clothing!"

         "My fashion sense dies!"

         "That doesn't matter!"

         scoffs "It most certianly does!"

         "No, it doesn't!"

         "Yes, it does!"

         "Does not!"

         "Does!"

         Sonic sighed. "You're impossible. Here's twenty bucks. Go crazy."

         "One problem."

         "What now?!?" Sonic yelled, exasperated.

         "That's only a fifth of what I need."

         "A HUNDRED DOLLARS?!?!?"

         "Yes." Mentally, Sonic screamed.

         "FINE! Here you go." Sonic practically threw the money at Amy.

         "Thanks, Sonic," Amy smiled sweetly, kissing Sonic on the cheek.

END FLASHBACK


         "So, is it like that?

         "Oh! No, it isn't." Tails stated matter-of-factly.

         Thank the lord! "What's up then, Amy?"

         "Well, first off my name isn't Amy, it's Tails."

         "Wait, what?"

         "Second of all, I'm a guy."

         Sonic screamed. "A man has been chasing me all this time?"

         Sigh "No, actually. Third, I'm not madly in love with you."

         Sonic sighed in relief.

         "Fourth, I'm a master engineer."

         "But that's Tail's job!"

         "Speaking of which, is this 'Tail' person a pink hedgehog?"

         "You should know that."

         "If my guess has any truth to it, then yes."

         Sonic gasped, feigning surprise. "How did you know?" He asked, voice dripping with sarcasm.

         "Okay, I think I figured it out. You may want to follow me for a minute." Tails led Sonic to a nearby bench, and stood facing the bench, while Sonic stood in front of Tails.

         I sure hope that I'm right. "I'm from a different version of this world, exactly identical in every way-"

         "So, you're from a parallel universe?"

         "Yes. As I was saying, identical in every way except for a few things:
One, in this universe, I'm in a girls body.
Two, I'm in the same place that the 'Amy' in my universe was in.
Three, this 'Tail' person is the 'Amy' from my universe, though I haven't observed their personality yet, so I may be wrong.
Four, you're my brother - metaphorically speaking.
Five, both Tai-"

         "I'm your brother? But..." He trailed off, realization dawning in his eyes. He suddenly sat down, averting his gaze from Tails. "But... that's Tail's job..." He murmured quietly.

         "Precisely. Anyways, both 'Tail' and I, as you knew us, are... were in the other body in my universe. I have 'Tail's' history, and he has 'my' history. I think what caused this was a strange blinding white light. It overtook me while I was repairing the Tornado (after a fight with Eggman), and I passed out. When I came to, I was in 'Amy's' room, wearing 'Amy's' clothes. I immediately went to find you to get help, but you kept running away."

         "Well, A- I mean, Tails, that explains why... er, Amy has been acting very unlike himself, and talking to Cream and Cheese all the time, and waking up in the middle of the night screaming for me, and asking where her hammer was, and asking me..." He trailed off again, completely stupefied that he didn't realize it before. "This will take some getting used to..." He muttered to himself.

         "What should we do, Sonic?"
11531.title: Help, Sonic!

Sonic, being the usual cool blue Hedgehog... Stared. Soon enough, the two tails got it in his head that this was Tails... But what happened?

"Buddy... What happened to you? Are you... Did someone do this to you, or are you... Well...?"

Tails sighed, explaining about the dream she had before she woke up... Somewhere with this body. It was just so strange to her, but then there was the fact that she was able to get to Sonic's typical abode... Granted it was a home that was rarely used. After all, Sonic was never one to be tied down into one place, and the house seemed to be little more than an obligation from civilization. Even if some of the things she had seen him do defy all manner of physics so he should be a puff of non-logic or nothing of the sort... But now she faced something far more important at the moment... Granted the fact that she was a woman instead of a badnik was the first red flag that this wasn't the usual Egghead affair- This was definitely someone else. She looked around, considering just what might be going on- After all, she was still a prisoner of some kind in this facility, but she had no idea what was going on about just what could be the reason for kidnapping her and turning her into a vixen... However, she was quick to halt at the final door that lead to the outside of wherever this is...There was a person, grinning in front of the door, staring at Tails-

"Look. If I knew, I'd be flaunting it all around. What were you expecting, for me to be some mastermind?"

Tails sighed, admitting that it was a fair point. After all, she was the type to flaunt. But of course, that left the two of them with two options- They could go to Tails' lab, and simply hide Fiona before they properly explained what was going on... Or they could, much to Tails' disgust, head towards Scourge. Yes, he was a womanizing jackwad with little to no chance of being sympathetic... But that would also mean Miles wasn't hard to find, and an increase in brain power was always a plus in figuring out just what was going on with the both of them. After all, they weren't exactly normal foxes, and Tails was still fast enough, meaning travel was a good idea... Plus hanging around this strange facility was not on their list of priorities given the circumstances. In addition, the air was stuffy... Yet too still to be normal... It was unnatural and absolutely disgusting.

"Really? You don't want to know who kidnapped you? Or what they might've done to you while you were unconscious?"

Fiona paused, staring at the golden vixen, biting her lip for a moment.

"Fine." She groaned. "I'll go to your lab with you. But you gotta keep your friends off my back."

"Alright." Tails nodded. "Although... maybe some of them are here..."

Fiona replied by saying...

Wherever this place was, it was just so strange... Stagnant, yet streamlined. It was something that Tails would be amazed with... If it just wasn't so disgusting. Then again, the fact that she had woken up as an attractive vixen rather than the young fox she was supposed to be. Fiona on the other hand was more disgruntled than anything- She had been taken to some weird place while she was sleeping. Granted, she didn't have any changes unlike Tails, so that was something that affected her temperament at the moment... Although she couldn't stop staring at Tails' backside... It was just too entrancing... But then again, now wasn't the time or place for looking at the merchandise.

"Hey Tails... Find anyone yet? Or is this place as empty as Scourge's brain?"
