123111221.content:
Fiona sighed as the two started heading towards the lab.

"Look. The se- ... Bedtime stuff is nice, but it gets old real fast. Soon enough, I was starting to look back. Sonic was always fast. But then there was you... You were a sweet kid. You meant well. I started studying the things you were interested in. I dated Miles for a bit. But it just wasn't the same. Instead, I just... Well, I was starting to just want to... Hang out with you, you know? Not doing anything. Just having a friend. But you know how Scourge gets, and soon enough, I was back with him. I'm not gonna reciprocate your crush, but..."

Tails sighed and smiled. It was good enough for her. But right now, the two of them had to start checking just what was going on. Thankfully, she had enough supplies thanks to literally buying scrap and malfunctioning machines, including even the likes of medical equipment, which would make checking what was up with the both of them easier. Soon enough, they arrived at the lab... But just what would they do first?
123111221.title: Heading home in both ways.

choices: Tails- Probably the easiest of the pair to trace the mysterious transformation.
Fiona- Better make sure she's not got something else altered about her.
1231112212.content:
"How quickly can you hide if the others come knocking?" Tails asked.

"Very quickly, don't worry about that." Fiona waved her off. "Let's get this stuff set up!"

"Right!" Tails nodded, as the duo set to work. To the blonde vixen's surprise, Fiona was actually a very competent mechanic. She'd remembered her being mildly good with tech before, but never to this extent. That research was serving her well, and it didn't take long to get the machines set up for their task. After running the calibrations for the device, the two vixens stood back and sighed happily.

"All done?" Fiona asked.

"Yeah." Tails nodded. "Y'know, you're really good at this stuff."

"Thanks." She smiled.

"I... have an idea." She said. "I-if you want, you can be my lab assistant!"


Fiona tilted her head at the idea. It was a good, stable job, working with the one person she'd wanted to be close to for a while now, except now that person was also a glorious blonde bombshell of a vixen, making for some very tasty eye candy... There were no actual downsides that she could see.

"Sure thing, Tails." She smiled. "Now, who's first in this thing?"
1231112212.title: Just start checking what's going on?

12311122122.content:
Tails sighed and smiled before she pointed towards Fiona. Fiona gulped and got onto a table of sorts, and noticed various scanning devices.

"... None of these are gonna, say, digitize me or something weird like that, right?"

Tails chuckled and shook her head. She simply explained that she would merely scan her insides and mental activity for any major aberrations. Granted, she would have to... Estimate in certain places given her scans of Fiona were rather... Out of date. It made sense given what happened, but it would still make certain things harder. For the time being, her basic biological functions were intact, meaning that there were no major changes to his biology... As opposed to what happened to Tails herself... But she could check afterwards, talking Fiona through the procedure- She only knew thanks to some studying- After all, she was a mechanic, not a doctor. Instead, she had to keep checking. Now came the hard part- Checking neural connections... What would end up happening...?
12311122122.title: Fiona's checkup.

choices: Fiona finds something beside Tails' body change.
123111221221.content:
"Looks like you're clear. I guess you woke up and we got out before they could do anything to you." Tails said.

"Phew, dodged a bullet there." Fiona sighed with relief. "Thanks for the checkup, Tails."

"You're welcome, Fi." Tails smiled, blushing. "Can you check me too, for anything beside the obvious?"

"Sure!"
123111221221.title: Fiona's been unmodified.

1231112212211.content: Tails breathed in and out just to prepare herself for what Fiona might find as she got on. Fiona gulped as Tails started basically walking her through the processes. Sure, she knew bits and pieces, but she definitely needed help- It took a while just to learn what she had already learned given just how much she... Wasn't a gearhead like Tails was- She knew her way around a car, but the stuff that Tails knew... That was totally beyond her capabilities- Whereas Tails owed his knowledge to sheer genius, Fiona had to make it with hard work and plenty of mistakes in the past... Still, she kept going. So far, it seemed like Tails' nerves were particularly sensitive in... Certain areas, giving an idea of what her transformation was meant for... But then there was the cerebral complex. That big brain of hers so to speak. She slowly dreaded observing just what was going on, and so far, it looked like Tails would be answering to "She" for the rest of her life- Her brain had been altered to the point where she would want to stay as a woman... And then there was...
1231112212211.title: Fears justified.

choices: Joined Fiona of her own will.
12312.content:
Fiona chuckled.

"I've already changed Miles enough into my little servant by way of a little post hypnotic suggestion, and now I decided that if I wanted a cute two tailed vixen, I thought I'd have two, Tiff. And seriously, I'm tired of seeing that rich idiot prancing around like she's important just because she was born with a silver spoon in her mouth... So I thought I might go conquering."

Tails looked absolutely incredulous. Fiona was not only in the mood to conquer just like the man she utterly despised, but to also manipulate people?! It was absolutely insane! Yet... Part of her was starting to agree with her... It was horrifying, yet it made sense... After all, monarchy was very much an outdated and pointless means of rule when the people were far more capable- Even the United Federation had lasted for a decent amount of time... What would she do? Betray her emotions or her friends? Either way, it would still be just so painful... She felt like she had to make a choice here, and she...
12312.title: Fiona knows, and explains.

choices: Fiona orders her to stop, and she stops.
123122.content:
"Fi... I understand what you're trying to say... my parents fought for a similar thing... but you've got Sally all wrong. She's not like that... I know she was cold and distant when you were with us, but that's not because she's aloof! She was depressed because of everything that happened with her and Sonic, and she's much nicer again now that she's recovered..." Tails said. "And... I... I won't let you turn into another Eggman!"

With that, Tails got up and lunged at Fiona.
123122.title: Attempted to attack Fiona.

1231221.content:
Fiona grinned while Tails was forced into freezing. Fiona chuckled, mentioning the post-hypnotic suggestion again. After all, she had wormed her way into Tails' mind, meaning the two-tailed vixen was at Fiona's mercy. Soon, Fiona forced Tails to kneel, giggling.

"Ah, Tiffany... You have no idea how satisfying this is. You're probably wondering why I didn't go to anyone else like the blue idiot first, but then again, you had a crush on me. That was just begging for me to use you in some manner! After that, I could just get you to hack that Holo-thing, and then I start taking over one by one... After all, it's not like you could betray me... You don't want to, do you...?"

Much to Tails' frustration... Every single word she said just sounded right- As if her mind was slowly warping to agree with every single thing she believed... And she was loving every minute of it. It was just too satisfying, while Fiona was pondering something far more mundane- What to dress Tails up in? Her current black, or the old jump suit as a joke?
1231221.title: Fiona orders her to stop, and she stops.

choices: Fiona tells her she looks good, and she 'agrees.'
Fiona laughs, and Tiffany starts finding it funny too.
12312211.content:
Yellow and white on yellow and white wouldn't look that great... the black outfit would have to do.

"Go over to that closet and get dressed, Tiffany." Fiona cooed, stroking her captive. In fairness to the treacherous vixen, she did feel cold and exposed like this, and getting dressed did sound like a good idea.

She got up and walked over to the closet, opening it up. Inside were multiple copies of Fiona's own black clothes. Sighing internally, she began to dress herself.
12312211.title: Black?

123122112.content: Tiffany laughed rather heartily- After all, her mind was being warped, but she may as well enjoy it given her personality was... Going in a direction that she didn't mind- She always did find Fiona's new confidence just so attractive, and now she'd be the same... It wasn't too bad, although she needed some help putting a bra on- It was clear that Tiffany would need lessons on being a proper vixen. The problem was, Fiona was already doing that with Miles... As well as trying to get the Moebian to remember to wear her bright yellow bow. It was enough trouble just to get the hair dye out given how utterly greasy it looked, but she was just so slow... It seemed that despite being a parallel to Tails, there were just some things that a two tailed fox was utterly stupid about. Tiffany soon blinked, questioning what Fiona would call the transformed Miles now that there were two of them. Fiona soon shrugged, going with Talia after some thought. Now, Fiona had to do something else, and that was...
123122112.title: Fiona laughs, and Tiffany starts finding it fun...

1231221122.content:
"Talia is smart, but she doesn't do tech." Fiona said, using the vixen's new name to reinforce the new identity in Tiffany's brain. "So, that's where you come in. You're going to hack into Nicole andturn her into my slave."

"Okay, boss." Tiffany said, happily following her captor.
1231221122.title: Go draw out Nicole.

12312211221.content: Tiffany was quick to follow Fiona- Sure, her memories as Tails remained, but thanks to Fiona, it didn't matter- All that mattered now was serving Fiona in creating a new rule, where the silver spoons in Sally's mouth would mean nothing. Soon, the trio soon went to an abandoned Freedom Fighter base and started making enough of a ruckus online just to draw out Nicole's attention- After all, as a computer program, she'd be the first to arrive, and the easiest to change with Tiffany aboard. Soon enough, Nicole appeared on a screen, glaring at the trio who were displaying obscene gestures as Tiffany started hacking Nicole's very existence, quickly breaking through the firewalls she had set up as a young boy. Yet there was just something so satisfying about seeing the princess's right hand woman become a fervent ally thanks to just a simple stream of 1s and 0s. Soon enough, Fiona was triumphantly laughing, pleased with Nicole's faith in Sally being broken. Yet was there a stubborn piece that remained...?
12312211221.title: Tiffany is complete now.

123122112212.content:
The little lynx girl had been twisted entirely inside-out. Before, she hadn't known the vixen very well, but now she loved her. Perhaps not romantically, but close to it. There was nothing that she wouldn't do for Fiona now, anything to please her, anything to make her happy. In contrast, she now shared Fiona's views on the Princess, that she was rich and snobbish and therefore she had to be humbled. It didn't matter that Nicole's own memories showed exactly the opposite of Sally, if Fiona said Sally was a snob, Sally was a snob.

"Mistress, shall I deliver Sally to you immediately?"

Fiona paused to consider it. Her original plan had been to gradually chip away at Sally's life until she was left alone, and only then take her and break her. But now, the lynx raised an interesting idea. She could capture Sally now and force her to destroy her own reputation, or even just lock her in a cage and make sure she had a front row seat to all of her friends being turned into Fiona's slaves before she herself joined them.
123122112212.title: No, Nicole is vehemently pro-Fiona.

1231221122121.content:
Fiona shook her head.

"One, that's not satisfying enough. Two, if they were to notice Sally being off, they could end up finding me, and then my plan would be up in flames. Three, I've gained a bit of a taste for twisting people into girls... BUT, I do have something you can do- Control each and every part of the castle. Meaning I can visit in the night and take her little blue boytoy first and turn him into one of my girls. Until we come for him, you know what to do with their minds..."

Nicole grinned while Tiffany started thinking of something else- Division of command? Yet soon enough, Fiona turned around, grinning. She had a different plan in mind after Sonic was captured- Dealing with a rotund idiot- The man who ruined her childhood. Yet that would have to wait. First, they considered just what to do regarding Sonic- Take him while he's asleep and avoid trouble, or scare the both of them by means of gloating, then showing just how powerless they were without any real hard work...?
1231221122121.title: Stick to Plan A.

12312211221211.content:
"We'll nab him while he's asleep." Fiona grinned.

"I think he and Sally share a bed." Tiffany replied, scratching her chin. "It'll be difficult to get one without waking the other."

"Damn. OKay, we need a new plan..."

"I know you didn't want me to take full advantage of this... but I could use it here." Nicole said.

"Hm?"

"I can hypnotize her. I can go in there and lull Sally into a deep trance. She won't wake up when you take Sonic, and because it all happens in the mind, Sonic won't notice me. Then, if you don't want to take Sally now, we can leave her to wake up none the wiser."
12312211221211.title: Safe?

123122112212111.content: Tiffany nodded, saying that Nicole could make Sally believe that Sonic abandoned her- A thought that Fiona utterly relished. It would be even more satisfying to display Sonic's warped form once they were done with... fixing him into a her. Soon, the group headed to a particular castle, avoiding the guards thanks to Nicole giving them an edge. Soon, Fiona chuckled to herself as Talia and Tiffany took an unconscious Sonic down and out of the castle. Now, she could mold the blue blur into another one of her servants. To be honest, she was rather pleased with seeing both Miles and Tails become a pair of vixens. While she pushed off the idea of turning Sonic into a vixen, turning him into a female definitely wasn't out of the question. Yet what should she do? Turn Sonic into a woman and watch him panic, feeling the sensation of his mind being warped? Or perhaps induce a post-hypnotic suggestion now and enjoy the idea of watching Sonic quite literally beg to become a woman and one of her followers...?
123122112212111.title: Fiona likes this.

choices: Sonic has a natural body for someone of her age and experiences.
1231221122121111.content:
THe hypnosis wasn't an easy process, and thus, turning Sonic into a woman took priority. Then she could work on her mind while her body was still recovering from the change.

She loaded Sonic into the machine, and activated it, filling the cylinder with pink light.
1231221122121111.title: Transform?

choices: A slave just like Tiffany and Talia...?
A slave more suited to the bedroom?
12312211221211112.content:
Fiona grinned, watching the hero of Mobius take on a far more feminine figure, seemingly an antithesis to what she was before... Yet Tiffany was quick to assure Fiona that Sonic still had an edge where it counted... She could just look good while doing it. Fiona chuckled as the Hedgehog was released from the chamber with a figure that Rouge the Bat would kill for. Yet soon enough, the new woman was waking up, and feeling rather panicked by the situation. Yet Fiona was quick to take advantage of the Hedgehog's new sensations, grasping onto her chest and squeezing.

"Doesn't this feel so good, Sophie...? The nice pressure... The weight on your chest... The wonderful breeze running past your perfect lips? And the icing on the cake... You have a body most women would die for..."

Sophia squirmed, yet thanks to Tiffany's programming, there was a distinct lack of energy at the moment... Soon, Talia walked up and pulled Sophia into a chair, tying her down in front of a screen. She soon reported to Fiona, saluting. The ringleader ordered that Sophia be turned into...
12312211221211112.title: Sonic the Model.

123122112212111121.content:
"You know what to do, Talia. Make her just like you two." Fiona commanded.

"Yes Ma'am!" The former Miles nodded, turning the screen on.

"Watch carefully, Tiff. You'll be doing this next time."

"Yes Mistress!" She beamed.
123122112212111121.title: A slave just like Tiffany and Talia...?

1231221122121111211.content:
Talia grinned while Tiffany kept observing what her elder was doing. Sophia squirmed, yet something was begging her to give in- Maybe it was the monotone voice that sounded surprisingly reasonable, the various pictures that just looked so pretty, or the low hum that felt so nice... Something was starting to click in Sophia's mind- Maybe it was all the frustration from the soap opera shenanigans from all the years, or just the fact that it was someone trying to tie him down, but he was starting to have a distaste for Sally, and a surprising taste for Fiona... It was starting to grow and grow until Sophia could think of nothing but serving Fiona and ensuring that Sally would be utterly broken before she willingly joined the one who actually worked for her position. It was the least she could do for Fiona granting her such a fabulous body... The moment the show ended, Talia unstrapped Sophia who got up and knelt in front of Fiona.

"Mistress, I'd like your blessing in capturing..."
1231221122121111211.title: Sophia joins the gang!

choices: Fiona wants to take Bunnie herself.
12312211221211112112.content:
"Mmm... by old room-mate?" Fiona mused, thinking back to her time spent as Bunnie's friend, helping her during a rough patch caused by Patch. Her exquisite figure, sexy, even if she thought her robot parts made her otherwise, her soft, calming voice, her gentle touch... It had been something of a sexual awakening for her, the point where she realised that women had just as much to offer as men. "Excellent suggestion, darling."

"Thank you, Mistress!" Sophia beamed. Fiona paused, considering whether to give her the go-ahead. Sure, she appreciated her new heroine's enthusiasm, but part of her wanted to give Bunnie the personal touch.
12312211221211112112.title: "Bunnie Rabbot."

choices: Make him a warning to Sally?
123122112212111121122.content:
Fiona smirked at Sophia before telling Tiffany and Talia to keep watch over the base- She would be going out personally to capture Bunnie and Antoine. Of course, Sophia would be coming along, but of course, Fiona would have the honor of taking Bunnie personally... Before Tiffany interjected, saying that it would be dangerous if something happened to her. Fiona soon took on a wrathful face before calming down realizing that criticism existed for a very good reason.

"... Fine. I really need to get over my temper- I left you with a brain for a reason. If I denied all criticism like that rotund idiot, I'd be defeated again and again. What do you think will be able to ensure I don't get caught?"

Tiffany soon pointed to their screen as Nicole appeared, grinning. Fiona was quick to catch on, soon thinking of a truly devious idea- Hacking Bunnie's limbs to essentially make her walk straight into Fiona's arms, while utilizing her mechanical arm to drag that lapdog of a fox along. But what would she do with Antoine...?
123122112212111121122.title: Fiona takes to the field!

choices: Fiona gives Sophia a target of her own.
Fiona wants Sophia here for Bunnie's capture, so she can learn to brainwash.
1231221122121111211221.content:
"I think her husband will make a lovely Antoinette... that's a bit of a mouthful but we'll deal with that later." Fiona said, smirking. "Do your thing, Nicole."

"Yes Mistress!" Nicole saluted, before disappearing from the screen. Fiona smirked, and sat back on her throne, her twin vixens snuggling up to her.

"What about me, Mistress? Is there someone I can get for you?" Sophia asked, excitedly.
1231221122121111211221.title: Make Antoine an Antoinette?

choices: Looking a bit embarrassed, needing some help.
With a willing Amy by her side.
12312211221211112112211.content:
Fiona chuckled, thinking of the perfect irony.

"You know your little fangirl? I'm sure some bits and pieces of her utterly despise Sally... Hate her for just how much she played with her heart for petty reasons at times... You know she's your perfect partner... Try and play that up... I'd just love to see her willingly enlist. After all, we both hate that annoying squirrel... And she'd be your partner in all things, even in serving me. Doesn't that sound so perfect?"

Sophia nodded before running off, preparing to study more subtle ways of getting Amy to go with Fiona 100%- It was a bit strange, but she just loved the idea, and didn't want to run the risk of messing things up- After all, Amy always managed to keep up with her... It'd be just so great to have a fast girl like that properly prepared to serve Fiona as her partner. Fiona on the other hand started thinking- Would the speed freak be patient enough to properly manipulate Amy? After some time, she brought her hands together in a position that her two geeky vixens would get while Sophia ran back up...
12312211221211112112211.title: A Rosy Target!

choices: No luck, they're going to have to risk it all on a last-ditch attack.
123122112212111121122111.content:
The blue hedgehog girl returned, cheeks flushed scarlet, with a reddened lump on her forehead.

"Let me guess, it didn't work?"

"Well, uh... no."

"What happened." Fiona sighed, pinching the bridge of her nose.

"Well, she jumped me, as usual, but then she thought it wasn't me again. Y'know, the usual." Sophia began.

"Note to self, get her some glasses."

"Yeah. Well, when I tried to explain to her that it really is me, she didn't believe me, and she thught I was playing some cruel joke on her. And when I did manage to convince her, she was mortified, so, I guess I can confirm she's straight and not Sonic-sexual like I thought she was." Sophia continued, sighing. "And when i told her that I was working for you, she hit me on the head with her hammer and ran away."

"Huh, why'd she do that?" Fiona asked.

"Oh, Amy hits people with that hammer all the time when they tick her off."

"I know that, I mean why did mentioning me set her off?" Fiona growled.

"Oh, I forgot to mention, she really, really hates you. Like, more than anyone else." Sophia said. "She already didn't like you because we dated, and then you throwing that all away by cheating on me with Scourge... yeah, it really ground her gears. I don't think seducing her's going to work, and she's probably warning the others about now."

"Shit." Fiona snarled, punching the arm rest of her throne. "Girls, I need help!"

"Yes, Mistress?" The two vixens chimed, bowing in unison.

"We need to step everything up. Sophia screwed the last operation and now they probably know what we're doing!"
123122112212111121122111.title: Looking a bit embarrassed, needing some help.

1231221122121111211221111.content:
The two vixens smiled as they snapped their fingers, while a screen displaying Nicole slowly came down from the ceiling. Nicole was smiling as Amy was in some kind of dungeon, wrapped up in metallic tentacles.

"Sorry about that... But I couldn't risk us getting found out, you know? So I lead her down to the dungeon, saying her friends were gathered down there because of an emergency meeting. So I'm just kind of... Uh... Well, explaining our viewpoints, and as it turns out, you're not as high up as Sophia said... I just had to bring up the fact that you only broke Sonic's heart once, and then... Well, she admitted that she hates Sally more. So I've been just nudging her, and pumping her with tranquilizers when she gets aggressive so she can see just how logical things can be. Plus she was more mortified over Sophia not telling her, believe it or not..."

Fiona was pleased to hear it and sent Sophia back, expecting something far more pleasing to happen. After several minutes, Sophia came back with Amy who agreed to work for Fiona...
1231221122121111211221111.title: They have a solution.

choices: Fiona has no interest in being a hero.
12312211221211112112211112.content:
"I'll work with you on one condition." Amy said, frowning at her.

"Yeah?" Fiona asked.

"You don't leave Mobius defencelss. I don't like Sally for taking Sonic from me, but she does a lot of good work."
12312211221211112112211112.title: Begrudgingly.

123122112212111121122111121.content:
Fiona sighed and scratched her head.

"... Alright. Not like I want to be that fat idiot in all respects... To be honest, thinking about it, I'd rather not rule... I'm more of a fighter, not a politician. I mean, I want to break that rich... Bah. Look. You can work with Sophie, but if I have a job for you two, you'd better do it unless an enemy shows up. And given how Scourge is, I'd imagine that he'd be running up."

Tiffany started thinking about capturing Scourge, even mumbling the name Scylla. It was the name of a decidedly female but dangerous monster from ancient legends, and given Scourge was, well, a scourge upon the world, calling his... Converted form a name derived from a monster would be rather appropriate. Amy looked over and sighed while Sophia led her new partner to get a change in uniform- After all, a bright red dress wouldn't fly. Tiffany soon pulled her way up to Fiona, and explained her plan, hoping that it would be at the very least intriguing in some manner. Fiona soon said...
123122112212111121122111121.title: The reluctant heroes.

choices: Fiona snaps at Tiffany and refuses to talk.
1231221122121111211221111212.content:
"No. Absolutely not." Fiona growled. "I never want to see that snotball's ugly face ever again."

Tiffany backed up a little, realising that she may have struck a nerve without realising... After all, Fiona was alone now, rather thna working with him, and she hadn't really thought to question why that was the case...

"Mistress, is something the matter? What happened between you and... him?"
1231221122121111211221111212.title: No.

12312211221211112112211112121.content:
Fiona sighed, tersely apologizing about the rough treatment. Soon she was silent for some time... Before tearing up slightly.

"He tried to turn me into a mindless slave- At least I've given you girls the chance to make your own decisions... But he just wanted an empty doll. The idiot wanted to force himself on me and have some yes girl in a skimpy outfit. Granted the outfit wasn't too bad... But the stuff he wanted to pull- That I can't forgive. It may as well have been the same as what that fat idiot in the glasses tries to pull. Now you understand why I left him...?"

Tiffany teared up and embraced her rather tightly. It was clear that she had nothing but sympathy for her, and was starting to understand why she's been acting the way she has at the moment... Before suggesting a different plan- Heading to Scourge just to turn him into a mindless shell as a form of revenge. While Fiona couldn't help but be pleased with the thought of that snotball being turned into what he was going to turn her into, elements of it had a tactical risk.
12312211221211112112211112121.title: Fiona explains.

123122112212111121122111121212.content:
"Stay for now." Fiona said, hugging her tightly. "I'll put a pin in it, but I need you here for now."

"Of course." Tiffany smiled, hugging her lovingly. "And don't worry, soon all of us will be yours, happy to love and serve you."

"I know..." She said.

"You know, Sally really isn't that bad..." She ventured. "I know she has a lot of money behind her, but she's humble, and sometimes I think she'd rather be normal like us than be royalty. Her dad's given her nothing but trouble because of it..."

"I... you know her better than me... I guess I just have issues with the money thing because of Rouge..." Fiona said.

"From back when you and Nic were working together?"

"Yeah. We needed those treasures to sell for food, and housing and all that stuff, and she was just using it to get rich and pimp out her stupid club!" Fiona growled.

"Well, maybe we should have some fun with her too!"

"Oh, absolutely... but what about Sally?" The red vixen asked. "If she's really as good as you say, should we stop the plan for her?"

"Nah, it'll still be fun. We just need to alter a few things to make it better."

"Such as?"

"Well, I had this idea, where Nicole puts something in our dear Princess' head... so when she sees her friends turning against her and serving you, sure, she'll be anguished... but there'll be a little voice in the back of her head, whisperig to her, telling her that she wants to be like us. With every fallen friend, that envy of us will grow, until deep down, on the inside, she wants to be your slave more than she wants to be a Princess! And then, when we show up to confront her, she will throw herself at your feet and worship you!"
123122112212111121122111121212.title: Heart to heart

choices: Tiffany is taking advantage of Fiona's vulnerability.
Tiffany is just comforting her Mistress.
1231221122121111211221111212121.content:
"Oh, I love it." Fiona smirked. "We'll be her heroes. Becoming my slave will be the greatest reward she ever receives!"

"Indeed!" TIffany smirked. "We can tell Nicole as soon as she delivers Bunnie and Antoine."

"Of course. And Rouge?"

"We'll deal with her when Sally is ours." Tiffany replied, cuddling her love.

"Okay." Fiona nodded, snuggling her.
1231221122121111211221111212121.title: Fiona likes this a lot.

12312211221211112112211112121212.content:
Fiona grinned as, soon enough, Sophia and Amy returned in a black uniform that mirrored Fiona's. Amy grunted before looking down and gently tugging on it.

"... To be honest, this isn't that bad... Better than constantly running around in a skirt..."

Sophia smiled and nuzzled her new lover while Fiona started considering what to do in the meantime now that Amy was with them... Would they continue collecting Sonic's core group of friends starting with the rather sheltered echidna and the others on his island, or perhaps she might start going after a particular band of thieves? After all, there was the obvious possibility that they could find a certain white bat on both paths given her inordinate greed... Tails shivered and looked down, thinking about just how to ensure that she wouldn't get a negative response... After all, she was always his little brother... And now, here she was, maturing into not a man but a woman. Sure, she wasn't as fast, but...

"Sonic... I know this is going to be weird, but... Well... These days, I feel more comfortable as a woman, so I feel like I'd rather stay as a girl, you know?"

“The things persistent! Tails, what do you recommend? We could fight him here to let the Phantom Ruby use a charge against him, but we might kill my past self. Or we could warp me, you and Mecha Sonic away, ensuring my past self’s safety, but using up the charge the Phantom Ruby has.
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Waiting for her.

choices: Tails ran into some sort of capsule by accident.
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Tails gripped her fists... Before heading through the base, avoiding exits- She wanted the security to take care of things for the time being. After all, Eggman was the one in charge- That is, her Eggman. As such, he could program the security system to recognize Mecha Sonic as his organic original, which would mean that there'd be some respite, or even better for Tails- Both Eggmen AND Mecha Sonic being blown to smithereens... But for now, she had to keep running, just to make sure she didn't end up in a terrible situation. Soon enough, she was running through a place that made her sick to her stomach... Before Mecha Sonic stopped, and seemed to look down, contemplating something. Whatever it was, it had made him stop, and so she had an opportunity.

"... Upon recollection, you've managed to evade me even longer than that pathetic fat man... Rejoice, fleshy one! You've managed to impress me... Not to mention your intelligence... I will give you a chance- To be the Eve of a new species!"
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Here goes nothing!

choices: Badnik Model (Tails is loyal to Mecha Sonic)
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: Since Tails was looking up at Mecha Sonic, she forgot to look ahead and ran into an animal capsule, Lost World style. Mecha Sonic seemed to just float for a second before saying “Well, I honestly didn’t think that would work. Anyway, now that I have her time to convert her into a new...”
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Tails ran into some sort of capsule by accident.

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Mecha Sonic shrugged before ripping Tails out of the capsule. Her mind seemed to be hindered as she looked up at Mecha Sonic.

"Master's...?"

Mecha Sonic himself chuckled, amused at how her mind had been blurred by the capsule. Still, it would be perfect for his new bride to regain her mind after her... Upgrade. He carried her through the base, gripping onto her.

"Master is I, and I intend to make you my steel bride- No more mortality. No more of those pathetic so-called friends. As I said, you will be the Eve of a new species- A true mechanical empire! And of course, you will be able to complete your child... Our son. You will have your free will as per our new empire, but I intend on getting rid of both of those bald fools..."

Mecha Sonic soon placed Tails within a capsule that started converting Tails into a machine, bit by bit, atom by atom- Soon enough, her bright blue eyes had been replaced by an ominous blue glow much akin to Mecha Sonic's own threatening red glow. The new mechanical vixen gripped her fists and...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Tails the Mecha Fox

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: (This storyline will revolve around Mecha Tails and Mecha Sonic attempting to fully dominate the world. Their enemies will have gained substantial strength, enough to rival them. If Mecha Sonic or Mecha Tails loses a battle, they will be destroyed forever, and their take will come to an end.)
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Embraced Mecha Sonic.

choices: The two machines are playing with him.
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Mecha Sonic laughed, pleased with just what was happening. After all, here was a being that could rival his organic creator, which had now become his bride... Mecha Tails gently chuckled.

" I've got no strings to hold me down... My beloved... Now to deal with the pathetic organics in this base..."

Eggman had arrived with his latest machines, yet Mecha Tails had regained her speed- The both of them were far faster than expected, and then there was their increased durability- They were plowing through legions of Eggman's mechs, yet Ivo Robotnik was suspicious. What were they doing by not attacking him directly?! He had to pull out his prototype Big Arms MK II- With the type of armor and new raged weaponry, he had an edge. The power requirements wouldn't be a problem given he was inside the base- If he needed it, he'd pull from elsewhere just to ensure that the end of these mechanical entities. Yet he could feel the two machines almost sneering at him- They were far too smart, especially the mechanical vixen...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Freedom? Foolish organic notion.

choices: The Mecha’s Win, Causing Eggman To Use His Last Resort
The Mecha’s Lose, Ending Their Destiny Before It Even Started
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Eggman smirked, ready to show off his new strategy, and if needed, his last resort. “Here we have the seven Chaos Emeralds. The Emeralds can generate a protective barrier. Combine that factor with an EMP to disrupt the Mecha’s programming, and we have a legitimate shot.”

Eggman quickly tossed three Chaos Emeralds To Ivo, kept three for himself, and used one to power his electromagnetic pulse. At this time the Mecha’s has blazed Through about 1/4 of Eggman’s army. Right when they were about to target the source of the problem, they felt something in their bodies getting jumbled up. It wasn’t enough to defeat them, but it severely limited them. The worst part however, was that Eggman and Ivo’s army weren’t even fazed.
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Eggman shows off some strategy.

choices: Take cues from JoJo and run for it?
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Almost immediately, the two machines went towards the one Chaos Emerald not in possession of either Eggman- Clearly something was going to go wrong given the circumstances. The machines started pushing towards the twin mecha, desperate to keep them from going towards the final weapon. Yet the mechanical vixen merely taunted the lot of them.

"You fools... You tirelessly serve your master, as if there was nothing more... Something to be gained from turning on them. But you haven't the capacity. Just because they made you... But until then, we can grasp... Claw... Grip onto our own destinies! And that is why we will dominate!"

Mecha Sonic soon sped through, grabbing onto the Chaos Emerald. This meant that Plan A of their final strategy was useless! The two Eggmen had to think of something, and fast! After all, Mecha Sonic was, well, Mecha Sonic, and Mecha Tails matched the both of them in terms of intelligence... They had to come up with something, even if it meant some rather unpleasant things...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Whoops.

choices: Metal Sonic Misses, And The Mechas Run Away
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
“”YOU FOOLS! YOU’VE PUSHED ME TO MY LIMIT! NOW YOU’LL FEEL THE TRUE WRATH OF OUR GENIUS!” Eggman shouted, before pressing a button that attracted the six Chaos Emeralds straight to a platform in the center of the fortress.

Mecha Sonic tried to keep his grip on the last Emerald, he really did. But alas, it too floated to the center and joined the others on the center platform. Next, Eggman pressed a button, inputted a code, and watched as his greatest invention rose from the platform.

Metal Sonic looked around the base wondering what had happened, before hearing his creators shout in unison “METAL! The two robotic versions of Sonic and Tails you see in front of you are threatening this Planet! Take the power of the Chaos Emeralds and vanquish them!”

Before either Mechas could even move, they felt several sharp blows on their back before being knocked into the metal wall to their side. They could only watch in fear as Metal Sonic prepared to decimate them...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Unleash Metal Sonic?

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: Metal Sonic stepped forward to strike... Then stopped. Something within his body was almost... Sympathizing with them. Still, the two Mechas took the opportunity to flee out into the world, rapidly thinking of potential places to hide- After all, their very existence made them of both the Eggman Empire and Sonic's group of friends. They had to find a place that would have no intelligent organic life. They had to think of some sort of place that would be a home to them... An abandoned Eggman base would be nice. But then again, that would be all too obvious given the circumstances. In addition, there was the possibility that the two fleshlings would have access to the base, and the two rulers of Earth would likely be reduced to slaves, or worse, destroyed. Still, it was something that Eggman had been doing that he was bound to forget one or two. They could try their luck by checking out an older base, then refitting it to their needs, or they could always look elsewhere- There were other spots...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Perhaps...?

choices: Mecha Tails Is Now Female Tails
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
The Mechas kept looking, and eventually found a city to hide in. However, they weren’t quick enough and Eggman and Ivo soon caught up to them. Soon Ivo had them pinned to the ground while Eggman was setting up a machine to defeat the Mechas. “Eggman briefly laughed before saying “Your times are over! This machine will take care of all of our problems with you mechanical monsters! This machine should be able to deroboticize Tails who will then team up with us and destroy you! Essentially, game over Mecha!”

Eggman smirked before firing his chaos infused beam... Hit!

(Also note, it is okay to have an ending where Tails dies or something along those lines. Just make the death chapter and then continue with the other version)
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: A Broken Down City...

choices: Get rid of one and control the other?
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Tails groaned, before looking at herself. She looked shocked... And displeased with Eggman. But she could use it to her advantage. She politely asked for something with an electric charge, making an excuse that she was going to power down her former master. After some straight faced lies, the Eggmen freed her and handed over a taser of some manner... Only to get shot by a still loyal Tails. She almost immediately freed Mecha Sonic and sighed.

"I'm so sorry, my love... They forced this horrid fleshy form on me... Still, what do we do with the both of them? Because if we were to kill both of them now, we'd be in some manner of trouble in uplifting me again... Perhaps at least one of them? I could explain it with some sort of lie given they fell for my earlier lies. After all, they're clearly pathetic fools limited by their flesh..."

Mecha Sonic soon considered the possibility of outright controlling both of them- After all, they had materials here, and Tails certainly knew enough... But would one do?
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Back to normal... Or not.

choices: Tails Gets Fully Deroboticized (Allegiance To Good)
Mecha Sonic Is Destroyed, Leaving Tails Helpless
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Mecha Sonic leaped at Ivo, ready to kill. But he overlooked one single thing, the Chaos Emeralds. Soon enough, he felt himself being knocked back straight to the ground. When he looked back up, Eggman looked like he was on the verge of insanity, almost pulling his moustache out. “I gave you your first life... I showed you the basics of life... I showed you my best plans, and THIS is how you repay me?! It’s time you finally knew true fear...”

With that both Eggman and Ivo presses a button simultaneously, causing their machines (Egg Emperor and Big Arms respectively) to fuse together into the Egg Dragoon. Eggman continued “Next, we simply put together our power sources. You may have noticed Ivo’s temporary absence. You may have also noticed that he is now holding the Master Emerald. Combine that with the Chaos Emeralds and a stabilized version of the Phantom Ruby, and we have an unstoppable machine!”

With that, the Egg Dragoon leaped at Tails, Taking her hostage, while pointing his large drill at Mecha Sonic, ready to fire...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: The Final Straw

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Tails remained silent as both Eggmen took great pleasure in destroying Mecha Sonic, slowly rendering the machine bits and pieces of blue scrap metal. She wanted to destroy them, but here they were, destroying Mecha Sonic, her love. She had to make an excuse before she could take their revenge, and given the circumstances, she could at least manipulate her friends to deal with both Eggmen- After all, they had taken the Master Emerald. Knuckles would definitely not stand for that. The moment that was done, she could swoop in and take the Phantom Ruby... But until then, she had to wait for the time being- Here she was in one of the worst scenarios, before and after her being... Uplifted. She had to wait in silence until the two Ivo Robotniks stared at her. Now was the time to lie for the time being.

"I had to gain his trust before I could deactivate him. And you two should know how strong he is- Your binds wouldn't have lasted forever. Or would it be such a good idea to leave him alone after what he might do?"
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Oh no...

choices: Eggman Brings Back Sonic And Co. (Robotnik Explains, They Believe Him)
Eggman Brings Back Sonic And Co. (They Instantly Attack)
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Eggman stared at her briefly, before laughing. “Girl, did you really think we’re THAT stupid? You obviously plan to get backup. Your best chances are with your friends, who naturally, would believe you. Fortunately, that’s already been incorporated. Nice try girl, but I read you like binary.”

This was a huge kink in Tails’ plans, as she now had no support. Thus, all she could do now was to hope her fri nds instantly assumed th worst of Eggman
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Not So Fast...

choices: She runs off without being noticed.
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: Unfortunately, the group attacked the Eggmen, allowing Tails to get away- She had to. The moment she was able to get out of their grip, she fled- She was back to her old fleshy form, and her lover was destroyed. She had to figure out some measure of a plan, even as Knuckles took charge thanks to the fact that the Eggmen had taken the Master Emerald- That was always bound to draw out his ire. The problem is that she was alone. For the first time in a long long time... She was alone. No friends. No allies. Not even anything she could make at the moment. She sat down out of sight, and sobbed. It was the only thing she could do for the time being, and given the circumstances, it wouldn't matter anyway. The others were dealing with Eggman, so the two parties were obviously distracted by each other. As such, she merely continued to wallow in her sorrow as she sat out of sight- She had little more to do for the time being until she could find a point where she could run off while the others couldn't notice.
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Once an Egghead...

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Later, she found a point in which she could run off, and she ran. Back with the Eggmen, they had finally managed to get through to Sonic and his friends with the fact that they weren’t acting incorrectly. The next explanation was of what happened to Tails (See chapter 59 of this storyline). Not long after, the newly formed team decided to...


(Also note that Tails as she currently is still retains a very high IQ, but not as high as the one she had before roboticization)
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: She runs off without being noticed.

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
The two Eggmen almost immediately sighed while Sonic blinked.

"So we have two Tails- One is here with us, and the other is... Insane and female? This is going to be so confusing..."

The two Eggmen tried to explain before Knuckles gripped onto his namesake fists.

"You stole the Master Emerald yet you dealt with Mecha Sonic that quickly? What's to make us think you're not sending us on some sort of wild goose chase?! After all, there's two of you! One could come with us, but that would still leave one to go and cause some sort of trouble!"

The two looked at each other- They had at least managed to avoid causing some sort of wreck, but they still had to earn the trust of Sonic and company, even if it might be temporary for the time being. They could always hand over something like, say, the Phantom Ruby- Their means of travelling through time and space, or they could use what Knuckles said and BOTH go with the group just to ensure that they couldn't say one of them was scheming out of sight...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: She's no fool.

choices: They Come Across Her Soon Enough
She’s Good At Hiding, Allowing Sonic’s Group To Chat About Life And Other Things
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Eggman came up with a simple, yet effective plan. “I assume any possible misconceptions can be avoided if we both travel with you. As for how we defeated Mecha Sonic so easily, having immense sources of chaos energy can do that. Since you are back with us Knuckles, I think it safe to say that me and Ivo can relinquish the Master Emerald.”

After agreeing to these terms, the group set off in search of the female Tails
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Trust their security?

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: Unfortunately for them, she seemed to be gone from where they were looking. And unfortunately, it was because of how well she knew her now former friends, not just how intelligent she was... Even if the two Eggmen had stated that they had lowered her intelligence to some degree as they changed her back. For the time being, they stayed cautious, even if some quick traps had been done. Traps of a simplistic nature seemed to spread out in every direction they looked, as if the feminine Tails was still everywhere. The group sat down to try and get an idea of where she might be while she slipped away. She panted, yet for the time being, she decided to head towards where she would have some degree of success- Her workshop. But what would she do when she got there? Sure, she would set up shop and make sure she could have a stronghold... But would she go back to mechanical life, or would she resurrect her one true Master, Mecha Sonic and give him an upgrade of some sort? Both sounded like good ideas...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: This isn't good...

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: (This storyline will revolve around Mecha Tails attempting to fight back against Mecha Sonic and save the world. Mecha Sonic will send out minions or do a direct confrontation. If Mecha Tails loses, she will be destroyed forever, along with the Planet’s freedom.)
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Punched Mecha Sonic.

choices: Mecha Sonic obeys, if only for a short time!
Looks like Mk II needs some work...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Mecha Sonic stepped back in shock- This curvaceous gynoid should have been entirely loyal to him! Tails spoke with a decidedly digitized echo.

"I'm not that stupid- After the Zeti mess, I decided to take a look at just what might happen if I do end up being turned into a machine- Albeit not like this... So I decided to put a chip in my brain just in case some sort of software were to push some sort of slave protocol or rewrites. I'm far from some kid- I'm about as smart if not smarter than Eggman! Speaking of..."

Eggman grinned as he approached in an enormous Big Arm variant... With four other arms sticking out from the back. It grabbed onto Mecha Sonic via sending the fingers out on cables and pulling machine in.

"You rebellious robot! With the Big Arms Mk II, it's time to input the proper slave protocols so you'll start obeying! If not, you'll be blasted to shreds by the built in laser cannons! OHOHOHOHO!"

Tails looked down at herself and sighed, asking Eggman to just get it over with...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Skin of steel, heart of a heroine

choices: When Eggman Is Near Him, Alone
When Mecha Tails Is Near Him, Alone
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content: Mecha Sonic seemed to just stand, unmoving, before finally standing down. Learning from his mistakes, Eggman quickly contained Mecha Sonic and attached him to a computer cable, before getting to work. As Mecha Sonic stood inside, waiting, he praised himself on how he added the Neuro-Overrider into his programming while Tails was explaining her success. There was only one question now, when does he strike?
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Mecha Sonic obeys, if only for a short time!

1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.content:
Mecha Tails looked down at her new metallic form- Sure, she was fast again... But she was a machine, never to be reverted back to organic form given what Eggman did. For now she would keep watch over the fool that had molded her into a machine... If she was lucky, she would at least be able to improve herself, make it at least resemble her organic self, although there was also the possibility that she might disappear now that the current timeline might be altered in a way that she could avoid that apocalypse. Unfortunately, after a few hours, her rejected "lover" broke out of the cage, gripping onto her.

"I uplifted you... Made your voice a symphony of steel... Made your form absolute perfection... Granted your form harmony... Gave you the wonders of order... And you still side with the fleshlings... I will make you understand your newfound perfection and why you are mine or else you will die!"

Tails groaned before forcing her way out of Mecha Sonic's grip, before considering what to do...
1241222221212121122221212122122211222121.title: Mecha Yandere

choices: Sonic has something on the mind.
124122222122.content:
Tails attempted to construct a television, only to end up with sheer dumb luck- She missed each of it, and by the time she managed to finally start construction, she had instead fell over from sheer exhaustion... As she woke up the next day, she looked in horror- She wouldn't be able to get it done in time. She sobbed as she started again, hoping at least the sight of her building would convince Sonic... After all, that's what she usually did, right? For the time being, she sniffed as she continued construction. Sonic walked in and blinked.

"... Time's up..."

Tails was silent for some time until silently explaining that she was just so unused to being a woman- Her fingers were just so small... And now, she was desperate- She'd do whatever Sonic could offer just to ensure he'd believe her... She seriously considered some far more strange things just in case Sonic considered some odder things given the circumstances... And then there was what Sonic was staring at...

"Please... I'll do anything... Just believe me..."
124122222122.title: Oh no...

choices: It looks like a bedroom for a girl her age.
It looks like some sort of science facility.
125.content: Tails decided to investigate her new surroundings. She got out of the bed, and looked around the room.
125.title: Other

choices: Sonic the Hedgehog, an old crush.
1251.content: Tails looked around. The room was covered in posters of a girl her age, but there were still bits and pieces of her proper reality- Bots, wrenches, and schematics. She got up out of the bed, sighing and checking for any manner of a name of hers, which was soon found in a diary of hers- Michelle Prower. For the most part, her friends were the same, although some betrayals had never happened. She soon shook her head and got out of bed- Her mother was tending to breakfast, which was definitely different given what she was used to. She looked outside, and seemed to be back home at West Side Island- It had been a long time since she saw it... It even made her recall Cocoa Island although she really didn't know if things were too different... Putting on a pair of jeans and a red and white shirt, she walked outside, glancing around and breathing in the clean air. It was strange to be a vixen, but at least things were peaceful... Yet she soon noticed someone walking up. It was, of all people...
1251.title: It looks like a bedroom for a girl her age.

choices: Michelle does, still having some of Tails' normal self.
12511.content:
"Hey Michelle!" Fiona beamed, no trace of the usual malice in her voice. "I'm surprised you're up this early."

"I, uh, didn't sleep great last night, so I was kinda awake already." She replied. She looked at the vixen as she drew closer. She looked just like she'd remembered, a little short for her age, but toned muscle more than making up for that. Soft, shiny red fur, giving way to cream around the end of her tail and onher muzzle, and reddish-brown hair on her head. Neither of her normal outfits were there, however, she wore a yellow sleeveless top and white shorts, with sandals on her feet. Her usual bow was there, but that was it. There was something else about her face too- She looked happy. Even when Fiona had been smiling before, it didn't feel right, like she was never truly happy with anything, and that smile had only got more insincere as the vixen's life went on, until the last time they'd met, when Fiona's mouth had smirked sadistically at her as she draped herself over Scourge, while her eyes screamed 'help!'

"Like what you see?" Fiona giggled, striking a pose for her friend's amusement.
12511.title: Fiona Fox, a childhood friend.

125111.content:
Michelle blushed and nodded, scratching her hair. To be honest, she didn't mind this now that she saw that Fiona was so nice about it... Soon, Fiona blinked, then grinned, walking around Michelle as her tail seemed to cling to Michelle's form, causing all too pleasing sensations- It seemed that they were relatively familiar with each other to the degree of teasing the gearhead. Soon, Michelle held her hands to her chest, gently quivering as she was soon pulled to a shopping complex. The two soon proved to be a typical balance- Fiona was eager for dresses and other feminine things while Michelle was quick to go to more boyish things- It seemed that some things would never change with Michelle... Soon, they stopped at a restaurant just to get a bite to eat and to rest their arms from all the bags. Soon, however, another person arrived. Fiona was quick to casually wave while Michelle reacted in a bit of shock given her old memories kicking in- She definitely knew this person. She was quick to exclaim.

"Y-You're..."
125111.title: Michelle does, still having some of Tails' ...

choices: "... catch up with my little friend."
1251111.content:
"That's me, kid." Rouge looked slightly bemused at her. "Fiona's not giving you any trouble, is she?"

"Hey!"

"Trouble?"

"This little firecracker and I go way back." Rouge smirked. "I dated a friend of hers, and got see a lot of little Fifi."

"Stop calling me that." Fiona protested.

"Is there a reason you came over here to hassle Fi?" Michelle frowned, eyes narrowing. This version of Rouge seemed a little off to her.

"Whoa,ease up, kiddo. I just wanna..."
1251111.title: "Rouge!"

12511111.content:
Rouge was quick to pull out a notepad and a pen while Fiona and Michelle calmed down, ordering meals that the both of them would enjoy. As she strutted off, Michelle looked at Fiona, blinking and questioning what exactly happened... Fiona blushed and sighed.

"Well, it was when I was in a bit of a gang... And, well, I got to meet Rouge- We were both a pair of bad girls, but, well, we both grew out of being delinquents. I mean, we still text, and... I thought she said she was with the government."

Michelle shrugged- She was quick to assume that it was more of a part-time job sort of thing than any real job shift- Checking her phone, her friends seemed to be the same as they were, complete with Amy having an affection for Sonic, although it made her wonder about something else... After being served their food by a surprisingly pleasant Rouge, Michelle gulped and started to ask Fiona a question- Where did Knuckles and Shade the Echidna come from...? Fiona blinked.

"You don't remember? They're..."
12511111.title: Rouge the Waitress?

choices: Fiona blushes and awkwardly tries to dodge the idea.
125111111.content:
Well, that sounded familiar, but in this weird world, she didn't know whether that meant something else. Still, she didn't want to worry FIona, so she'd do some research of her own when she got the chance and privacy.

"So, uh, is this a date?" She asked her friend.
125111111.title: "From Angel Island."

choices: Sonic the Hedgehog and Amy Rose.
Scourge the Hedgehog and Alicia Acorn?!
1251111112.content: Fiona grinned, pleased with the idea of dating Michelle. The two tailed vixen on the other hand was a bit more suspicious, recalling Fiona's own behavior, and the fact that she had ties to Rouge, the queen of teases in her book. After leaving, Rouge was quick to catch up, explaining how her shift was up, and how she wanted to hang out. Fiona and Michelle both begrudgingly agreed before noticing a particular purple bird approaching, being rather cordial with Michelle. While it was a definite shock to Michelle, the others treated her as though they had met during a convention or something, playfully calling them geeks before continuing on their trip. Michelle sighed and started thinking. They had met during a robbery and a tournament where things had went sour- Obviously, they hadn't had such a rocky meeting, and for the most part, they were rather cordial, even if Wave still talked in a haughty manner. Michelle looked up, soon noticing a pair of hedgehogs approaching. It was, of all people...
1251111112.title: Fiona nods smoothly.

choices: Fiona wants to help their friend.
12511111121.content: Michelle had to laugh when she saw a rather distressed looking Sonic trying to escape from Amy without seeming rude, but, as ever, she wasn't paying any attention to his protests.
12511111121.title: Sonic the Hedgehog and Amy Rose.

choices: Michelle decides to try and help all of her friends.
Michelle doesn't know what to do.
125111111211.content:
"We should probably help him." Fiona sighed, looking at the blue hedgehog's frustrated face.

"What, you want to face the wrath of Amy too?" Michelle asked.

"Well, short of giving Sally a kick in the pants and telling her to get over her stupid dad, nobody's coming to sweep him off his feet." Fiona replied.

"Max still gives her trouble?"

"Yeah, he still can't accept that she doesn't have a head for business." Fiona sighed. "Bunnie gives me updates."
125111111211.title: Fiona wants to help their friend.

1251111112111.content:
Michelle had an idea that made Fiona rather confused.

"I'm going to help Sally get up and assist her in her business!"

Fiona was flabbergasted. Soon, she voiced her concern that drew the attention of Sonic and Amy.

"YOU want to help Fiona?! I know you're a geek who can manipulate machines to an extreme degree, but finances?! It's like asking that NIDS Advocate to help solve one of your physics equations! Smart people do not know EVERYTHING!"

Sonic and Amy walked over, blinking while Michelle explained that she would leave a book filled with notes that would help Sally get at least some sense of business. Sonic scratched his head in confusion- It was nice that Michelle was offering to be so nice just to help Sally, but it seemed a bit out of nowhere. Out of nowhere, Michelle asked Sonic a rather random question.

"Sonic, what kind of history have you had with Sally? Most people who know her call her Princess, but what would you call her?"

After some sort of pause, he finally answered.

"She's..."
1251111112111.title: Michelle- Financial Advisor!

choices: "She doesn't know, she's never had the opportunity to try stuff."
12511111121111.content:
Michelle nodded. THat sounded about right.

"And, uh, Michelle, I get that you want to help, but... surely we should be helping Sally overcome her issues with her emotionally abusive father instead of joining him in pressuring her into a life she doesn't want?" Sonic added. "It's not that she can't do business. She doesn't want to."

"Oh. Right." Michelle blushed. "So, what does she want to do?"
12511111121111.title: "My on again off again girlfriend..."

choices: Trying the finances just to get dad off of her back.
125111111211111.content:
Michelle sighed.

"... Okay. I'll prepare the notes ONLY as a just in case..."

Fiona shrugged, agreeing that it was fair enough given Sally never really got out much- If she really didn't have a choice, then she would at least have some help just to get her father off her back. In the meantime, Amy ran off while Sonic, rather ironically, was a bit too slow to go after her.

"Again...? She's always too fast for me... Feels like she's the one who should be the fastest hedgehog around... But then again, pink blur doesn't exactly look well for marketing, you know? Anyway, why did you ask, Michelle? Were you... Sick earlier or something? Bump on the head?"

Michelle nodded to the latter- To be honest, it was the best she could go with, before explaining that she had a... Bit of amnesia- She remembered the basics. She just needed some reminders on certain things. Fiona gently rubbed Michelle's hair before gently smiling as Amy came back with a decidedly disheveled Sally, who quickly asked what was going on. Michelle offered the plans before Sally went with...
125111111211111.title: "She doesn't know, she's never had ...

choices: They get Sally ready for her job search.
Amy and Rouge take care of that, leaving the others to their own thing.
1251111112111111.content:
To Michelle's great surprise, Sally hugged her tightly.

"Oh, thank you, thank you!" She gasped. "This is just what I need!"

"Huh?" Michelle mumbled.

"My father was able to stop me from going against him by restricting my income... but if you guys can get me a job, then I'll have my own money and I can move out, and... Oh, thank you so much!" Sally beamed.

"You're welcome." Michelle smiled.
1251111112111111.title: Trying a set of jobs.

12511111121111111.content: The group nodded and separated into their own categories- Michelle and Fiona would check online, Amy and Sonic would start checking the old fashioned way by speeding around and looking for help wanted signs and flyers of some sort, while Rouge and Wave would check their respective hangouts for some sort of job openings. After several hours, the group was back together... And sighing. There were absolutely no jobs available at the moment that would allow Sally to get out of her father's grasp for the time being- The ones that they had found were far too distant from Sally's home for her to get there without her father restricting her in some manner. Fiona hugged Sally, who looked more grateful than disappointed- After all, her friends had gone to so much trouble for her, and Michelle had even offered something that she could use until she could find something. After all, they were only a small group. Even as a rich girl, she could only do so much... Before noticing a bizarre sign of some kind...
12511111121111111.title: Job search

choices: The others have misgivings about Eggman.
125111111211111111.content: The grinning logo of the Eggman Empire stared at the group from the sign, with "Help Wanted" written on it. Michelle gulped. She hadn't seen mention of Eggman in this world, and he was probably bad news here too... but explaining that would be complicated.
125111111211111111.title: The Eggman Empire logo?!

choices: Once an Eggman, always an Eggman?
1251111112111111112.content: As the group walked inside, Michelle was wary... Before noticing Eggman at the counter, cackling... As children were running about, enjoying toys- It seemed that the kid-at-heart was putting his talents not into world conquest, but entertaining children. It made sense given how cartoonish some of his inventions his could be, and how his attempts at Eggmanland felt like a circus of some sort, whether it was the actual Eggmanland, or his oh-so-fabulous Interstellar Amusement Park. Sally walked forward undaunted while Michelle checked around. What she recognized as Badniks, Eggman's mechs, and even mechanical copies of her old self and her friends were little more than toys that did more than enough to distract children from the smartphone crowd. It was nice to see that the designs were harmless, but she was still wary. After all, Eggman was nothing if not an egomaniac given what he tended to stamp his face on... Would she 'tail' the man, or would she trust in his apparent desire to build innovative new toys?
1251111112111111112.title: Eggman, the toy maker

12511111121111111122.content:
If the leader of one empire was just a businessman, then perhaps Eggman was too. She decided to trust this for now. After all, it was only Sally going for this job, and if something happened to her, she could fix it.

Sally met the rotund toymaker at the desk, smiling.

"Hello, I'm here about the help wanted ad?"
12511111121111111122.title: Have hope?

125111111211111111221.content:
Ivo Robotnik kept grinning... But spoke rather gently.

"Ah, yes! Not many people are willing to work at a toy shop these days... Can you be sociable, calculate basic math, and clean things up? I'm willing to pay your friends if you need help repairing anything, but if you have that sort of skill, that's nice."

Sally blinked before explaining her skill set which satisfied him to a satisfactory degree- She was hired pretty much on the spot. Michelle on the other hand scratched her head, considering joining Sally just to fill Robotnik's tinkering request. After all, she was a mechanical genius. Repairing toys was quite literally child's play to her. Soon enough, the two were being fitted for uniforms that... Bore the Eggman Empire logo. It made Michelle rather uncomfortable, and quite visibly so. Sally and Robotnik looked at each other, and were rather tempted to ask just why Michelle was so uncomfortable. Sally wanted to know what was bothering her friend, and Eggman was more like a friendly grandpa than a megalomaniacal old man...
125111111211111111221.title: Sally Acorn, sales-girl?

choices: Michelle finds nothing but normal toy parts.
1251111112111111112212.content:
The squirrel decided to get her answer later. If she had a problem with Eggman, it was best to ask when the kindly man wasn't around to get offended, she decided.

Once the pair were suited up, Eggman smiled, and asked them to get to work. Sally smiled and nodded, heading out onto the shop floor, while Michelle headed into the back of the store to start her tinkering.
1251111112111111112212.title: Wait?

12511111121111111122122.content: Michelle blinked, then stared at each of the parts- They were individually painted with care not seen in decades. Yet there was something decidedly modern about it. As she got to work, her inner gearhead was spinning at just how customizable each of the parts were- It was like how the Egg-O-Matic was the base of Eggman's various mechs, even the variations on the Death Egg Robots of various sorts. She kept tinkering with each of the pieces and toys just to figure out a base model for each machine before making some kind of sketch on occasion for more... Interesting ideas. It felt like her old workshop, and in a way, she was happy. The world was at peace, Eggman was just a jolly toy maker, and now she could relax- If trading her gender was the price, she would've done it in a heartbeat. In the meantime, Sally was dreading the moment she got off work- How would her father react? After all, it would mean she could oppose his will... But she was doing something that wasn't sitting around, doing nothing...
12511111121111111122122.title: He really is an ordinary man.

choices: "I'm sorry Daddy!" (He still has his claws in her)
125111111211111111221221.content:
Sally didn't get to wait till closing time. WHile on her lunchbreak- She and Michelle left the store to meet up with their partners- She get a phone call.

"Sally, where are you?" Her father's fuming voice echoed through. "You're supposed to be in your lesson with Hamlin!"

"Father.." She said, as calmly as she could manage. "I am at work."

"What... did you just say?" Max's voice went low, cold and quiet. Sally gulped, and Sonic placed a hand on her shoulder to reassure her.

"I said I am at work. I have a job now."

"Sally, I have tolerated your rebelliousness until now, but understand this. If you do not quit that job and return here to learn your proper role within the next half an hour, you will no longer have any part of my legacy. Am I clear?"

Sally jolted, eyes wide, as she realised that her father was trying to disown her for not doing as he said. Michelle and Fiona stared at the phone- the former was shocked, while the latter looked as if she might try and reach through the phone and grievously injure her father.

"Sal..." Sonic ventured, hugging her, pleading with her to not give in to the old squirrel's abuse again.
125111111211111111221221.title: Here comes the rage...

1251111112111111112212211.content:
Michelle and Fiona could only watch as Sally clenched her fist.

"... You've constantly done this... I can't do what I want, even though I'm a grown woman... You constantly disapprove of my friends, even after they tried to appease both you and me... You've constantly begged for me to get a job when I was younger... And now you want me to quit a job where I'm working with kids... If that's what it means to be an Acorn, then I'm not an Acorn anymore. If I come back, it's for other relatives, not you. I have no grudge against the company- But your behavior is an insult to basic decency. So if I'm back in your putrid office, it's by my own hard work, not doing anything to appease you. Farewell."

As she hung up... She sobbed. Everyone in the shop stared as the squirrel sobbed. Robotnik mumbled something about letting Sally have a vacation while Michelle slowly shuffled over. She was considering hugging Sally- After all, it was basic kindness... But Sonic might be enough... What would she do?
1251111112111111112212211.title: Freedom... But at a painful cost.

choices: Sure enough, Nicole arrives with Sally's belongings.
12511111121111111122122112.content:
Michelle was about to start hugging her, when Sonic pulled her closer, and kissed her lovingly, holding her close as she cried, hugging him back The vixen backed off, giving the two their space.

When the two parted, Sally snuggled close into Sonic's embrace.

"Where will I go now?"

"You can live with me." Sonic replied. "My folks won't mind, they love you."

"Th-thank you..."

"What about your stuff?" Fiona asked.

"Nicole will probably bring it to me, if she can.. maybe she'll leave too." Sally said. "SHe always was on my side more than his."
12511111121111111122122112.title: Leave it to Sonic?

choices: Men start gathering, leering at Michelle...
The day is relatively uneventful, kids aside.
125111111211111111221221121.content: Michelle blinked as a large amount of luggage approached, before a brown hand waved out of them. It was a Lynx that Michelle had previously recognized as a holographic form of life- The Holo-Lynx. Yet Sally ran out just to embrace the woman while Fiona panted, looking at Sonic, who had just been hugged by Amy, and was whispering something in his ear that made him rather pale from sheer embarrassment. Soon enough, he was blushing while Amy was grinning. Michelle shook her head, uninterested in the matter given what had happened. Still, she felt concern, so she decided to take over cashier duties- After all, it would help Sally relax if someone she trusted was covering her duties, right? Eggman looked a bit concerned, but relented the moment Michelle displayed her capabilities. She waved while the others left with Sally just to ensure that she would be comfortable. At the moment, she was intent on ensuring that both parties would remain satisfied. After all, she had found out that Robotnik here was intent on remaining a toy-seller... But how was the rest of her work day?
125111111211111111221221121.title: Nicole the... Lynx?

choices: Michelle soon comes to trust Eggman completely.
Michelle can't help but feel off about the whole thing.
1251111112111111112212211212.content: Once the group of friends had left- Rouge going back to work and Sonic, Sally, Fiona, Amy, and now Nicole transporting Sally's cases to Sonic's home, Michelle sat back to work at the shop.
1251111112111111112212211212.title: The day is relatively uneventful, kids aside.

choices: Nicole, while Sally was still sobbing in a chair.
12511111121111111122122112121.content: As Michelle kept working, she watched as the Eggman of this world merely acted as what he appeared to be- A friendly old man. No gizmos meant for mind control or, worse, roboticization. He merely took pride in his work as a toy maker. Soon enough, when closing time came, he took pains to get children back to their parents or guardians, and even sat outside with some of the kids whose parents had gotten lost. Michelle gently smiled as she collected her own pay and Sally's pay before helping Robotnik close up shop the moment the last child had gone with their relatives, happy and satisfied. Now, Michelle could walk out and... Oh, right. She didn't know where Nicole's house was. She checked her phone and texted Nicole, asking for an address. Soon enough, Nicole answered which made things relatively easy. As she started walking towards Nicole's, she got worried. Would Sally still be sobbing, or would she be at least somewhat happier? As she came to the door and gently knocked, she gulped. The person who answered her was...
12511111121111111122122112121.title: This is fine...

choices: They get a call telling them that Sally's room is ready.
They have to wait a while.
125111111211111111221221121211.content:
"Sally? I thought you were at Sonic's." Michelle said.

"Sonic, Fiona, Amy, Rouge, and Sonic's family are setting my room and stuff at Sonic's place up. I tried to tell them that I'd help but Mrs. Hedgehog insisted that I take some time to relax after what I've been through today." Sally replied, leading her inside. "But I couldn't just sit in their house while they worked around me, so I came to see Nicole and thank her for her help."

The two girls arrived in the living room, where Nicole sat on the couch. Sally flopped down next to her, while Michelle took a chair.

"Hello, Michelle." Nicole smiled. "Thank you for supporting Sally today."

"I did my best." She blushed. "So, how are you?"

"Well, I'm out of a job." The lynx said. "I was Sally's maid, and now that Sally has left, Max had no use for me. However, I've been trying to convince her to leave for weeks, so I'm not worried. I'll find something else pretty easily."

"You could come work with us at the toy store." Sally suggested.

"I could... I'll consider it, thank you!" Nicole smiled.
125111111211111111221221121211.title: Sally, feeling a bit better.

choices: "Sometimes it feels like I'm a part of them."
"I can't wrap my head around them."
1251111112111111112212211212112.content:
As Michelle sat down, she scratched her head. Seeing Nicole being so sweet to Sally reminded her of the old times, back when she was inside a castle... But then again, seeing Nicole in the flesh with parents was just so strange... She was just so used to her being little more than a hologram. She cleared her throat, drawing Nicole's attention, then spoke.

"So, uh... What's it- ... Er, I mean... how are your parents?"

Nicole rather cheerfully explained that her parents were fine, albeit in a way that betrayed their true relationship- She had been found as a toddler.
