To be honest, that felt a bit more natural to what Michelle remembered, but still, she left it be for the time being- After all, they were still a family, regardless of whether Nicole had been adopted or not. Soon, she considered a question that would make things a bit more clear for her. Still, it would decide certain future plans. But if she was lucky, not much had changed beyond her organic nature...

"Hey, Nicole, how good are you with machines?"
1251111112111111112212211212112.title: A few questions.

choices: Soon, they get the call to let them know that Sally's room is ready.
12511111121111111122122112121122.content:
"I wish I could, but it's not something I can handle." Nicole sighed. "I'm... not great at a lot of things, to be fair. It's why I ended up as a maid."

"I see..." Michelle said, frowning slightly. Helping Nicole was going to be an important task too, but she felt like she should focus on making sure Sally was settled first- take everything steady instead of getting distracted. Making sure to put a pin in that for later, she turned her attention back to the conversation.
12511111121111111122122112121122.title: "I can't wrap my head around them."

125111111211111111221221121211221.content:
Sonic came down with Amy, and the both of them gently smiled.

"Your room is ready."

Michelle sighed, at least thankful that things were going well. After all, back home, Sally's relationship was strained... But never that bad. Still, she had friends, and it seemed that a physical Nicole meant far better things for her life. Still, they had to be on guard given just what might be happening... Amy walked over and embraced Sally before waving at Nicole's folks and leaving. Sonic on the other hand stayed around. Michelle had a pretty good idea of what was going to happen, and she decided to stay downstairs. Almost immediately, Sally and Sonic went upstairs whilst Michelle and Nicole stayed downstairs. Michelle soon sighed. She had to figure out some of the basics of this world, and she was... A bit rusty.

"If I may ask... How did you meet Sally in the first place? I know this might seem a bit odd to ask, but I'm a bit rusty with... Everything... Things happen, so now I'm rather confused about certain things."
125111111211111111221221121211221.title: Finally...

1251111112111111112212211212112211.content:
"I needed work, and Max gave me the job to take care of Sally. We didn't get along at first, Sally didn't like having someone watching over her constantly, but we grew closer, and now we're like sisters. If Sonic hadn't given her a bed at his place, I would've invited her here to live with me." Nicole explained.

"Well, I'm glad Sally's had someone to turn to all this time." Michelle smiled.

"Thank you." Nicole nodded,as Sally hugged her.

"Thank you, Nicole. I'm going to be heading to Sonic's now, I rather need the sleep, but I'll be sure to call first thing in the morning, so we can help you find a new job."

"Alright, Sally. Stay safe." Nicole smiled, as the two parted. Sally headed over to Sonic's side, and he picked her up, carrying her out of the house.
1251111112111111112212211212112211.title: "I needed work."

choices: They deliberately avoided it for one reason or another...
125111111211111112.content: "Hey, did you go there?" Sally pointed to a store with a "Help Wanted" sign in the window.
125111111211111112.title: Some kind of shop...?

1251111112111111122.content:
The group blinked as they looked at the shop. Soon enough, they made it clear- They didn't know the shop was there. To them, it was as if the shop had come out of nowhere. The group walked inside while some older person sat at a desk whose species seemed to be obscured by sheer age- It was hard to tell what it was... But it was some kind of man thanks to the hair on the face. Sally tapped on the desk which seemed to tower over them, explaining that they were present to ask about the help wanted sign out front. The... Man seemed to take a rather long time just to get down, and coughed. It seemed that coughs and grunts were the only sounds in the shop that was filled to the brim with knick-knacks and curios of varying age that were all covered in dust as the person was slow to pull out some worn and bent sword on a pillow of some sort towards Sally of all people. After some time, a feeble wisp of a voice came out of the man.

"The Legendary Sword of Acorns... Will you take it, Child...?"
1251111112111111122.title: What store?

choices: Sally is normal, but she has the weapon now.
12511111121111111221.content:
"S-sword of Acorns... as in... my last name?" Sally asked.

"Yes..."

"Your family were warriors? Badass!" Sonic grinned, hugging Sally. Melissa stared at the blade, recalling that the Sword in her world had been... questionable. But everything else was different here, why not this?

Gingerly, Sally reached out and put her hand on the blade's hilt, picking it up. In a flash of gold, the blade straightened, the rust and wear fading away, leaving the weapon pristine and glowing.
12511111121111111221.title: Take it?

125111111211111112211.content: Sally twitched- It gave her some sort of pain the moment she touched the handle, as if the weight of the world, nay the very universe was pressing down on her... Yet it also felt like all of existence was subtly empowering her... Michelle looked a bit confused. Just what happened before? Was the Acorn family guardians of the world? Were they royalty, but dethroned and left as merely a rich family? Or perhaps it was something she couldn't guess entirely? Maybe it could fix her... Bizarre transformation as far as she knew? Yet soon enough, there were more pressing matters- The sword was starting to glow, brimming with untold amounts of energy to the degree that it was overpowering their vision. There was little more than vague outlines of the people, while the outside of the shop was just as white as the rest of the shop. The energy seemed to keep the group in place, meaning that space seemed to mean nothing. Soon, they were merely clinging onto each other in some way before blacking out. When they woke up...
125111111211111112211.title: Sally feels a little funny...

choices: Sally decides to hold onto it.
Sally decides to get rid of it.
1251111112111111122112.content:
The friends woke up lying on the floor, Sally still holding the sword. As the girls sat up, shaking their heads, they looked at their surroundings. The store was empty. No shelves, no desk, and no old man.

"What the hell just happened!?" Sally gasped, as Sonic hugged her protectively.

"What about that thing?" Fiona asked, pointing to the sword.
1251111112111111122112.title: The shop was gone!

12511111121111111221121.content:
Sally decided to hold onto it. If it was something that belonged to her, it should stay with her, right? Amy slowly shuffled over and hugged Sonic and Sally.

"Guess we're stuck without any clues... This place is empty... No knick-knacks or anything..."

Soon enough, a security guard pulled the group out, accusing them of trespassing as he pointed to a "for sale" sign. Wave and Rouge soon asked about any sort of shop that matched what they saw before the guard laughed, saying that no such shop had existed in the mall, much less in the location they were in... The group agreed to spending time being scolded at in exchange for not getting into major trouble. They spent far longer than they thought, and left almost immediately- It was closing time. The group merely shrugged and separated while Michelle went home and scratched her head, deciding to look up the legendary Sword of Acorns on the internet just to figure out just what was going on given what she remembered of the blade in her old world...
12511111121111111221121.title: Just need a sheath.

choices: She finds rumours about its power.
She finds theories about its history.
125111111211111112211212.content: She found rumours, hushed whispers about the history of the weapon, supposedly the blade of a mighty monarch, who bore the name of Acorn.
125111111211111112211212.title: There's only rumors.

1251111112111111122112121.content: Michelle looked up the abilities of the blade- It looked to be a weapon supposedly capable of surpassing deities- In Medieval Times, the description was that within laid the power of God and Devil. It made her recall an anime, but then again, the destruction it wreaked upon the world meant that the mighty monarch was appointed as its guardian for a good reason. From that point onward, it was to be used only for defense... But it tended to trade wielders well within a year before the Acorns became the watchers of the blade- It would often sap the life force of those who had it, and it only took specialized training to resist the blade's ill effects. Unfortunately, the training had been lost to the mists of time, meaning that Sally couldn't use its full power unless something incredible demanded it. But what of the dynasty? Would Michelle keep looking it up, or was the knowledge of the blade itself sufficient enough? She kept glancing at the particular link towards the dynasty as she mulled over the decision.
1251111112111111122112121.title: All-Powerful Blade

12511111121111111221121212.content:
"I have to warn Sally." Michelle said, jumping up. "Mom, Dad, I'm going out!"

As she left her home, Michelle realised that she didn't know where to find Sally...
12511111121111111221121212.title: Enough for now?

choices: Her father, Maximillian... Or was it Nigel?
125111111211111112211212122.content:
Michelle started heading towards Fiona- After all, they were relatively friendly, meaning that they'd be able to find Sally relatively quickly. Soon enough, she arrived at the house and knocked. A pair of foxes answered, which meant Eggman wasn't a major thing in this world... Maybe a toymaker or something? Regardless, she explained that she needed to find Sally, and she didn't remember, so she came to Fiona for help. Almost immediately, Michelle's phone buzzed while Fiona ran down and grabbed onto Michelle as she ran straight towards Sally's mansion- Clearly something was going on given Fiona was running just like she was before. Fiona soon displayed a bit of a motor mouth...

"We gotta save Sally from that sword! It's gonna sap her life like that whip from those games you mentioned a few weeks ago! It had victims up the wazoo and we gotta-"

Michelle nodded, saying she had done similar research as the two ran straight inside, thankfully avoiding furniture and employees before being stopped by...
125111111211111112211212122.title: A different kind of date.

1251111112111111122112121221.content:
"What are you two doing here?" A low voice growled at them, the two stopped short to see an aging squirrel with greying hair, wearing a business suit.

"Sorry but we need to help Sally! She's in real danger!" Fiona yelped, trying to pass him.
1251111112111111122112121221.title: Her father, Maximillian... Or was it Nigel?

choices: Engulfed in energy, gripping onto the sword.
12511111121111111221121212211.content:
Michelle started to explain about the Sword, but the squirrel scoffed, dismissing it as little more than a legend. Fiona groaned as the man seemed to refuse to see reason.

"Listen! If you won't believe us about the sword which, might I add, probably affected her behavior just due to how tired she might be, then look at it as her miscreant friends trying to get a literal weapon away from her! What would happen if she accidentally stabbed herself in some manner?! You might not approve of what she does, or her friends, but we're trying to fix a mistake! Please just let us through! We'll scrub your floors or something! Just let us through!"

After some time spent thinking, the elderly squirrel nodded.

"Alright... But they had better sparkle. Understand?"

The two vixens nodded before heading up to Sally's room. It was a long climb given how big Sally's mansion actually was, but thankfully they had an idea of the way, and it reminded Michelle of the old castle. Within Sally's room, the squirrel was...
12511111121111111221121212211.title: Hard work, but...

choices: Sally cuts the energy flow- She's actually controlling the sword.
Sally isn't in control. The sword is.
125111111211111112211212122111.content:
"Sally!" Michelle cried out, spotting the squirrel holding the sword as golden energy flowed around her form. "Sally, you have to let it go!"

"But I don't want to..." She turned to them, her eyes opening to reveal that they too were filled with gold light. Fiona gasped in horror, trying to approach her, only to be knocked away by the power. "Please, Fiona... it's alright..."
125111111211111112211212122111.title: Engulfed in energy, gripping onto the sword.

1251111112111111122112121221111.content:
Michelle stared as Sally's energy ceased, and the squirrel placed the sword down. She sputtered before Sally explained.

"Well, the sword started talking, but... I started clearing my head just trying to get a hold of myself, you know? After that, the sword started going quiet- They were calling me Queen for some reason... What's that supposed to mean, anyway?"

Michelle and Fiona sighed in relief before they started to give Sally a basic cliff notes version of the history of the sword that she had taken... Sally herself was decidedly shocked by what was going on. The blade that was apparently her birthright was just as capable of being her end... But what was that Queen business? Wouldn't it address her as princess or something like that given her father, rough but caring in his own way, was still very much alive? Still, she could ask tomorrow as she laid the sword down. Michelle and Fiona looked at each other, then embraced each other before hugging Sally, thankful that she was alive... But what now?
1251111112111111122112121221111.title: Thank goodness...

choices: ... angrily going to pick up the sword again.
12511111121111111221121212211111.content:
"Let's take some time to relax." Michelle smiled, glad her friend was okay.

"Er, what about the cleaning?" Fiona asked.

"Cleaning?" Sally frowned.

"Your dad wouldn't let us pass until he told us we had to scrub his stupid floors." Fiona groaned.

"What the... Dad, you grumpy old jerk... Did you tell him about the situation with the sword?" Sally pressed. Tiffany was about to confirm it, when she looked at Fiona. Both of them knew what that would mean: Telling Sally that her father was trying to weasel them into becoming cleaning staff before he would let them save his daughter's life. The two tried to figure out a way to break it gently, not an easy task without communication, when Sally spoke up again. "So, you did, and he still stuck to it. Don't try to deny it now, you took way too long to answer."

Sally turned away slightly, as Michelle bit her lip. The squirrel took a few moments, before..
12511111121111111221121212211111.title: Relax...

choices: And went down, holding the sword.
125111111211111112211212122111111.content:
Sally gripped onto the sword, and erupted into rage as energy roared around Sally. Michelle was utterly terrified while Fiona facepalmed. Michelle gulped.

"I-I know you're angry, but we already got worried that you might end up losing yourself within that hunk of metal... Please don't make us worry again... After we came all this way for your sake, please don't make us worry again... After all, the research we did... That thing is a leech... It's bound to do something wrong, even if you can control it for the time being... Honestly, I was thinking of sealing that thing away by burying it deep in your back yard or something like that... Because you're my friend, Sally... I don't want to see you getting hurt, you know? We came because we were worried that you might end up going too far for your own good... Sure, it might be your birthright, but what does your birthright mean when you're not going to last that long...?"

Michelle gulped, dreading the eternity that seemed to happen as Sally made her choice...
125111111211111112211212122111111.title: That's not good...

choices: Fiona helps pack, Michelle decides to remove the sword pronto.
1251111112111111122112121221111112.content:
The glow died, and Sally dropped the blade to the ground.

"He's not worth it." She said quietly. Michelle and Fiona looked sadly at each other, as the squirrel girl opened one of her closets and pulled out a large case. "Can you two help me pack?"

"You're leaving?" Fiona asked. "Where are you going to go?"

"I'll stay with Nicole, or Sonic, or just check myself into a shelter. Hell, I can probably afford a hotel." Sally replied. "If Da-... If Max needs more staff so much, well, I'll just lighten their workload."

The two vixen glanced at each other again, then stepped forward and embraced Sally. Almost immediately, she froze, and began to cry, hugging them back.
1251111112111111122112121221111112.title: Dropping the sword.

1251111112111111122112121221112.content:
Sally continued to speak with a monotone that made Michelle and Fiona shiver.

"The girl will live on within the source of All."

The two kept attempting to tackle their friend, yet the golden light was far too dangerous- It meant that they had no means of properly separating the squirrel from the sword. They were seriously considering grabbing onto the sword just to get it away from Sally, yet just what could they do? They were stuck with a potentially dying friend gripping onto a parasitic blade that was producing some sort of energy that it was definitely controlling... The two vixens started mumbling to each other just to figure out a strategy. Yet they were pressed for time... They could try begging the blade to simply let her go, trying to tempt it with the idea of peace of some sort, or they could merely grip onto the blade itself, even if it meant getting heavily wounded- After all, what would be lost hands compared to a lost friend? A lost daughter? They wanted Sally back regardless.
1251111112111111122112121221112.title: Sally's gone?!

12511111121111111221121212211122.content:
Michelle looked into the conflagration of golden power surrounding her helpless friend, gritting her teeth as she glanced toward Fiona. The red vixen looked about ready to throw herself into the fight, but she couldn't let her do that. Fiona in the world the twin-tailed vixen had come from was a fighter, and a good one at that. She'd probably be able to do this. But this Fiona? She didn't look like she'd been in a single fight. Ever. Her friends in this world were ordinary people. Michelle didn't even know if she had powers now, she realised...

Still, the blonde knew how to fight. She was experienced and smart, and she would have to do this on her own.

"Fiona..." She said, backing toward the door. THe red vixen joined her, eyes pleading for her to find a solution to this. As they drew close, Michelle kissed her for a moment, then placed her hands firmly on her shoulders. "I love you."

"Michelle, wha-" Fiona gasped as she felt herself get pushed out of the door, which slammed shut behind her, the telltale click of the lock following close behind. "Michelle!" She jumped to her feet and began to pound on the door, desperately.

Inside the room, Michelle turned back toward the possessed Sally, squaring her shoulders. She looked toward the squirrel, fixing the blade with a determined glare, before stepping forward. She began to walk closer, until she reached the outer edge of the weapon's aura. Walking into it felt like trying to force her way through gale force winds, with the icy cold sting of the deadly blade thrown in for good measure. Still, she pushed onward, forcing her way through as she tried to reach Sally.

"Do not fight this. It is for the best." The monotone voice spoke up over the howling winds, as a particularly strong wave shunted Michelle back a foot or two. Growling, the blonde vixen planted her foot to steady herself, refusing to stand down as she pushed back against it, even as she felt her clothing start to tear and her eyes stinging, she perservered.

Michelle swore she saw a look of shock on the mindless squirrel's face as she finally closed the gap, standing face to face with her.

"Get out of my friend!" Michelle roared, as Sally's stolen arm raised the weapon to swing down at her. She moved faster than normal. Not even the trained fighter Sally in her world moved as quick as this possessed one did, and she had no room to dodge. If she relaxed her stance for even a moment, the aura would pick her up and throw her across the room again, spoiling all of her hard work.

With no way to avoid the blade, she could only have faith that she could survive this the way her old self would, bringing both of her tails up over her head to shield herself, willing them to harden the way they always had.

Pain sliced through her, from the tip of her tail, all the way up her spine, as the force of the blow crumpled her to her knees... but her shield held firm. She sighed with relief internally: She still had her powers in this body. And that meant she was faster and stronger than the average Mobian...

Springing back up, her fingers closed around the surprised squirrel's arm, and her claws dig into her pressure points, as her tails braced against the flat of the blade, pushing against it.

"No!" Sally's voice screamed, as her arm spasmed in pain, fingers opening involuntarily, as her namesakes pushed it aside. Immediately, the golden storm of power abated, dying out as all of the energy flowed back into....
12511111121111111221121212211122.title: Grab the sword.

choices: They leave and head to the hospital.
125111111211111112211212122111221.content:
The blade clattered to the ground, glowing still, but inert without Sally's hand holding it. The squirrel groaned in pain, slumping against Michelle's body as her legs gave out.

"M-m... Michelle?" She murmured softly, as the vixen hugged her tightly, gently lying her down on her bed. At that moment, the door swung open, kicked cleanly off its lock, as Fiona barreled into the room.

Fiona stared at her lover, standing by Sally's bedside. Her fur was blackened in places from the shocks of power she'd received, her clothes were torn to ribbons.A thin trickle of blood ran down her chin- she'd bitten her lip during the fight, while a much larger cut appeared across her tail-tips where she'd taken the sword's attack. Still, she was alive, and Fiona ran over, hugging her tightly.

"Don't you ever scare me like that again!" She cried. "What were you thinking?!"

"I'll explain later... right now, we need to get Sally to the hospital..."

"I think you need to go as well." Fiona pointed out. "Is she okay?"

"Out cold, but the power went back into the sword and she woke up. I think she's going to be fine, but we need to check... Let's go." Michelle moved to pick Sally up, only for Fiona to cut her off and do it.

"Let me do it, you're hurt." She said, as the two left the ruined room.
125111111211111112211212122111221.title: ... the sword!

1251111112111111122112121221112211.content:
Michelle and Fiona gently pulled Sally down the steps, while her father... Was just getting off the phone. The two vixens blinked before the old squirrel spoke.

"I know I made you two promise to clean, but that can wait until my little girl is back on her feet- Despite how rough it may seem, I do love her, and to be honest, I didn't believe the talk of the Sword of Acorns- That was merely a fairy tale among the family... Until I heard the noise, and that... Unearthly voice... It was my daughter, yet it wasn't... It had to be that cursed artifact... And then again, the both of you look like you've seen combat of some kind... You're definitely people I can trust... I'll be there as soon as I can pay for her treatment."

The two nodded while paramedics swarmed in, paying more attention to Michelle- After all, her injuries were the most apparent to the naked eye. But there was still a decent amount of care for Sally. Soon enough, Michelle blacked out, only to wake back up thanks to a bright light- She was in...
1251111112111111122112121221112211.title: Thank goodness...

choices: A golden glow flows out of Sally,back into the weapon.
The Source refuses, and Michelle breaks the blade in half.
125111111211111112211212122111222.content:
"Crap!" Michelle growled, as Sally tore her arm free and lunged for the weapon. It was still in control of her. Still, she couldn't give up now, diving for the blade herself. Faster than her friend, she easily zipped by her and scooped the blade up, then twirled her tails, launching herself up out of Sally's reach.

"You are too late to resist me, otherworlder." The Source spoke harshly. "Sally has surrendered to me."

"I don't care!" Michelle growled, noting that this Source seemed to know of her origins... Not good, but not a pressing matter now. "Release her this instant!"

"You presume to command royalty? Divinity?" The squirrel roared.

"You're no god, whatever you are! You said you know I'm an otherworlder... well, you know what happened to you on my world? You died. You're gone. Sally rejected you over and over, and eventually you were killed. So let my friend go, or I'll make you dead in this world too!"

"How will you do that?" The Source asked, almost mockingly.

"You may have control over Sally's body, but your powers stopped working when I separated you from this." She held the sword up. "But with your mind in Sally's head, this is just a hunk of metal... metal that I can break."

"You cannot!" She shrieked, trying to reach the flying fox with no luck.

"I just stood up to your full power. You think I can't break a thin bit of steel?" Michelle glared back, as her hands bent the blade. A small crack appeared in it, making the Source scream in agony. "Now, I'm going to ask again nicely... Get out of Sally's head or I'll shatter you. Right here, right now!"
125111111211111112211212122111222.title: ... Sally!

choices: She's going to have to think outside the box.
1251111112111111122112121221112221.content:
Michelle gripped onto the blade as a golden light filled the thin piece of metal, healing the crack, yet her mind was starting to become overwhelmed. She blacked out. When she emerged, she was in some kind of golden realm, oozing with energy. It seemed infinite- To go on forever... Yet there was something even more threatening... Just how many voices were whispering into her ears... She gripped her head.

"Shut up, shut up! Where is this, anyway?!"

Almost immediately, the voices screamed out at her in an even monotone despite their volume. It was at this point it was obvious- She was in direct conflict with the sword itself.

"You dare to oppose us... Well, come. Show your power, if you can! Here, we are on equal footing!"

Michelle gulped. She was in over her head- She was a woman of science, not an expert in the supernatural. And here she was faced with... Whatever this Source of All or something was. Either way, she needed help of some kind... Not to mention what might have been happening to her body...
1251111112111111122112121221112221.title: Barely averted.

12511111121111111221121212211122211.content:
Michelle woke slowly, head pounding, as she realised she was lying in a hospital bed. She glanced around, saw doctors and nurses rushing about, and then spotted Sally, lying, still unconscious, in the bed beside hers. Sonic sat at her beside, holding her hand.

"S-Sonic?" Michelle asked.

"Michelle? Oh thank god you're awake..." He looked up at her, relief flooding through him. "You scared the hell out of us there... Fi's kind of a wreck. Said you pushed her out of the room and went to fight the sword-thing alone."

"I... I had to. She doesn't know how to fight. She could've gotten badly hurt." Michelle replied.

"Well, given what you did... there are some questions there that need asking. But for now... I'm just glad you're okay."

"Thanks, Sonic." Michelle smiled.
12511111121111111221121212211122211.title: Her friends pull her out.

choices: She wants a normal, but respectable job.
Sally wants something a little naughty...
125111111211112.content: What sort of life does Sally want?
125111111211112.title: "Well, she's always wanted to be..."

125111111212.content: Michelle giggled, amused with the antics- It seemed that despite the world, some things never changed regarding Sonic and Amy. Soon, however, Sonic was quick to tug on Amy's shoulder, saying that he wanted to go get some chili dogs. Amy quickly brushed him off, saying that he always went off to go get chili dogs. Fiona and the others looked a bit confused, apparently relatively unfamiliar with Sonic's behavior around Amy while Michelle merely took in the nostalgia, recalling the times he had to cover for Sonic. Yet soon enough, he showed a side that was utterly alien to Michelle- A loving boyfriend of all things. The two were calling each other amusing pet names which seemed all too strange to Michelle given the first time Sonic and Amy met as he recalled- Him running away from her on the Little Planet... He only bothered to rescue her because of what happened regarding Metal Sonic. Still, it was a bit comforting seeing him conquering Amy's... Obsession with some patience and legitimate love. Soon, Michelle...
125111111212.title: Some things never change.

choices: Rouge and Wave give them some privacy.
Rouge and Wave like the sight of Fiona and Michelle having their fun.
1251111112121.content: She wrapped her arms around Fiona, and pulled her close, surprising the red vixen. Still, she returned the gesture, ad began to lovingly snuggle her girlfriend, kissing her cheek.
1251111112121.title: Hugged Fiona.

choices: "... I don't want to talk about her."
12511111121212.content:
The two were quick to make jokes about Michelle and Fiona having a wedding alongside Amy and Sonic given how Michelle and Sonic were almost like siblings ever since their childhood. Yet Michelle and Fiona were blushing, seriously considering the possibility... Before metaphorically shaking their heads and realizing that Rouge and Wave were merely joking. Sonic sighed while Amy was quick to embrace all four of them- It seemed that the girls were all close in some fashion while Michelle mumbled something as a joke.

"An American! There's an American among us!"

Fiona blinked while Michelle sighed, soon explaining it as a reference to an anime she had seen. Soon enough, the group kept going, enjoying themselves for the entire trip while Michelle soon realized something that she utterly dreaded- She didn't know what Fiona thought of Princess Sally... And that was bound to result in some kind of pain. She quivered before whispering something.

"Hey, Fiona? This is going to come out of nowhere, but what do you think of Sally?"
12511111121212.title: Friendly ribbing

125111111212121.content:
"I'm surprised she's not here, actually." Fiona said. "Girls, have you seen Sugar-Queen around here at all?"

"Hm, no, can't say I have." Wave replied. "Guess she's busy canoodling with her girlfriend again."

"Huh, I guess I'll call her." Fiona said, taking out her phone and calling the squirrel.
125111111212121.title: "She's a good friend!"

1251111112121211.content:
Nicole answered Fiona, saying that Sally was busy governing her kingdom and maintaining relations between the country and the United Federation. Soon enough, however, Sally was sending over a text to the lot of them, essentially saying she wished she was there. Michelle shrugged, a bit confused by why Sally was using such a roundabout manner of speaking before merely shrugging in confusion. To be honest, things were looking relatively peaceful, before noticing... Something a bit more strange. A young girl in Eggman's attire with rather odd reddish orange hair that reminded Michelle of Eggman's own facial hair riding around in an Egg-O-Matic. It confused Michelle, but hearing the girl rant out loud about being rejected by the scientific community reminded her immediately of the same rotund scientist. Rouge glanced over and smirked while the girl got down, panting.

"Curse that furniture store and its lack of quality leather..."

Michelle blinked, before asking who she was. The girl almost immediately answered.

"I am Maria Robotnik..."
1251111112121211.title: Royal Squirrel

1251111112121212.content:
Sally picked up, answering Fiona.

"Hey, Fi! Sorry about not being out today. As much as I'd be with Nicole at the moment, my parents are actually home at the moment for once. It's weird, but at least things are going well. How're you and Michelle?"

Fiona blushed and explained while Michelle checked her phone. So far, reading texts from Sally, she was able to figure out that the squirrel was apparently an heiress to a fortune as opposed to being a princess, which likely changed the circumstances between Fiona and Sally, resulting in a far healthier relationship, although her mind soon drifted towards something else- The one thing aside from Sonic that seemed to bring people together in the old timeline- Dr. Ivo 'Eggman' Robotnik. Michelle trembled as she checked the news, dreading the circumstances. After all, things so far seemed to be peaceful, but she was still unfamiliar with this world. The others glanced over and blinked while Michelle attempted to pass it off as lack of sleep as she saw in the news...
1251111112121212.title: Sally is not.

12511111121212121.content: Sure enough, Eggman still seemed to be active, but he was much less powerful here. He would occasionally make an attack with a robot of sorts, but his machines were often easily dispatched by actual authorities, rather than leaving a group of teenagers to do it.
12511111121212121.title: Eggman's latest rampage.

choices: "He's in his Space Colony ARK as usual."
125111111212121211.content:
Michelle sighed and smiled- At the very least, things would be a lot more quiet given the circumstances... While Sonic would probably be a lot more bored given how much fun he tended to have with Eggman, it would leave Michelle and the others to have some spare time for some shopping, and their own respective hobbies. Although part of her now wondered something else- A particular black and red hedgehog who had been released by the Egghead from Prison Island. She started checking her own phone, and got a bit worried- Sure, Shadow wasn't much of a talker, but still, some things were still important, like the Black Arms invasion... That had literally nothing to do with Eggman, meaning she was a bit concerned. She was quick to check the internet, and the Black Comet was still a thing in this world's past. As such, she gulped and turned... To Rouge- After all, she was one of the ones who had the most bonds to Shadow in the old timeline... As she asked, she subtly dreaded the answer before Rouge delivered.

"Shadow...?"
125111111212121211.title: Michelle Prower wants a quiet life.

choices: She tries to find more answers.
1251111112121212112.content: It seemed Rouge didn't know the black hedgehog at all.
1251111112121212112.title: "Who's Shadow?"

choices: A breakout, meaning Shadow was somewhere.
12511111121212121121.content: Michelle was a bit concerned, and started checking military records, praying that things in the past went well enough. Thankfully, the Space Colony ARK was still a thing here, although sadly enough, the massacre aboard had still happened... For the time being, she gulped and checked elsewhere- She had hacked military hardware in the old world, and so far, checking up on the ARK resulted in something a bit odd- It was still a brown rocky orb akin to a smaller version of the moon, meaning that Eggman didn't travel to it or fire it anywhere. Soon enough, she checked Prison Island's records. Wave and Rouge glanced over and stared at Michelle, confused as to why she would be digging into military records of a top secret military facility- She shouldn't even have any sort of reason to have knowledge of a facility that didn't really interest her! Yet as soon as Michelle got to later records, she noticed some kind of anomaly ten years prior that left a sick feeling in her stomach. When she came to the modern day, she noticed...
12511111121212121121.title: She tries to find more answers.

choices: Sally Acorn, Close friend to her
Amy Rose, Best friend to her
12513.content: Who else could it be?
12513.title: Other.

1252.content:
She got up out of the bed and looked around. The room itself was sterile, with mostly white and grey colors. Her tails tingled in the cold air conditioning while her own appearance appeared to be different- She was wearing something! That something was a bright white medical garb, and her usual attire appeared to be modified to match her new gender- Her gloves were far more slender and her usual shoes were now heels that still retained their old white and red colors. She soon noticed a rather large bulky machine near what appeared to be some type of door with glowing red lights. From experience, this meant that the door was locked... But then again, the machine was gaining more of her attention at the moment as there was a large screen, a keyboard, and a rather large glass tube attached. It hummed with a peculiar sound, meaning it was functioning in some manner... She walked over and tapped on the keyboard, hoping it was merely in sleep mode. The screen soon flickered, displaying two things: Text that said "Please input your name", and an image that made the vixen jump back.

"It can't be..."
1252.title: It looks like some sort of science facility.

choices: She decides to input her name into the machine.
12521.content:
The bright pink orb she'd seen in her dreams was there, staring back at her.

"Was it a logo? Or some sort of AI?"
12521.title: A bright pink orb?!

choices: No. I am my own Master.
125211.content:
As she slowly typed her name, the orb soon formed a set of eyes and a mouth, sliding down to the center of the screen. As soon as her name was fully inputted, a smooth feminine voice came out of the machine, reminding her of a certain bat.

"Welcome, Miles Tails Prower. Or perhaps Millie would be appropriate. I am the program responsible for your transformation. You may call me Sammie."

Millie sighed. This would explain the change, but there was a lot more to think about... This body... Could it be changed or not? And then there was the most important question- Would this AI be willing to change this body back in the first place? She decided to take the chance.

"Can you change me back?"

After several minutes, Sammie answered, explaining that there were no programs that she could run that would change Millie back into regular old Tails. It was a massive blow given her own lack of expertise, but there were still more questions. She almost immediately asked another question- Did Sammie have a master of some kind?
125211.title: A new voice...?

choices: Sammie dismisses the question, and focuses back on Millie herself.
1252112.content:
Well, at least she was talking to the one in charge, Millie decided.

"Well, why did you do this?"
1252112.title: No. I am my own Master.

12521122.content:
"Doesn't it feel nice...?"

Millie was confused before Sammie clarified- She wanted to know how the two-tailed vixen was feeling as a woman... And it was surprisingly well... Far more comfortable than he had ever been as a boy... It was almost intoxicating- The sensation of her chest moving with every breath, the wind on her body... And an increasing confidence. It drew a different question to mind... Why didn't she do it any sooner? It felt far too good... Sammie's icon smiled.

"That's better... Your body has been altered to such a degree that while your gender is changed, your abilities are far more capable, even matching your friends Sonic and Knuckles."

Millie gripped her fist before blinking as something else appeared on the screen Sammie's icon was on- Increasing her age of all things. While it was a bit strange to have, Sammie assured her that it would only mean good things for her. After some time thinking, she glared at the screen before finally making a decision. She would...
12521122.title: Revealing distraction.

choices: She looks like an average young adult woman.
125211221.content:
"Can it be undone if I dislike the result?" She asked. She had to make sure of these things, it didn't pay to be reckless.

"Yes, it can." Sammie replied.

"Alright then. Let's try it." Millie said. A hatch in the ceiling opened, an arm extending down with a needle at the end. She winced as it dug into her skin, and she felt herself go numb, her head beginning to swim, before she slumped to the ground and passed out.

***

She woke up a few hours later, her body feeling awkward and unfamiliar. There was a lump on her head too, clearly she hadn't landed quite as softly as she'd like, and she'd be having words with Sammie about that... but for now, she wanted to see her new form.
125211221.title: Try it out.

1252112212.content:
Millie looked down, amazed at her new body, akin to Rouge the Bat. Yet as good as her body felt before, it felt absolutely amazing. She got up, rubbing her head while Sammie's bright pink face appeared on a monitor.

"Sorry about that. I wasn't expecting a reaction like that. Maybe you're allergic to one of the ingredients?"

Millie shrugged, relatively confused, but a bit distracted as she looked around. There was a wardrobe filled to the brim with clothes from stores as well as her friends. Her mind soon went towards wearing an outfit that emphasized her bust for some reason, but she had other things to do- Like question Sammie... On any potential changes to her mind. Sammie started going rather slowly through bits and pieces of her mind before finally pausing. A glass chamber rose from the floor while Sammie soon explained the elevator while Millie sighed in relief that literally nothing had been changed beyond her gender, age, and proportions.

"Do you wish to enter the elevator to select a mentor?"
1252112212.title: She's an absolute stunner.

choices: "I am not at liberty to explain that yet."
12521122122.content:
"I'll pass for now, I still have a few questions for you." Millie said, still perusing the outfits.

"You do?"

"Yeah, I do." She nodded, strongly considering the copy of Rouge's attire in front of her. "What is this place?"
12521122122.title: Mentor? Pass...

125211221221.content: Sammie was quick to deny anything important, she was at least fair enough to give coordinates- They were on some off-shore facility within sight of the Mystic Ruins, meaning getting home was relatively easy. To be honest, the fact that Sammie was at least willing to say where was actually quite refreshing- Most of the time, Millie was expecting literally no information thanks to past experiences. But Sammie, while apparently under some kind of AI restrictions or at least had some secrets to keep, was kind enough to provide some clues like an actual location. Perhaps she wasn't malevolent at least. In addition, Sammie made Millie feel just so good... Soon enough, Millie was putting on Rouge's outfit, and it was fitting like an absolute dream- Part of her even wondered why she didn't wear this as a boy. Yet at the moment something was bubbling in her mind- A simple choice. Ask Sammie about just who made her, or brush it off and ask for lessons on acting like a proper woman- While the question of who could make an AI like Sammie was pressing... She needed help in heels, lest she get hurt.
125211221221.title: "I am not at liberty to explain that yet."

choices: Sammie offers the mentor again, and Millie accepts this time.
1252112212212.content:
Millie decided that her captor could wait. She wasn't going to be able to save herself if she didn't know how to function in this... exquisite body.

"Sammie, could you do me a big favour and help me learn how to act like a proper lady?" She asked. "I can hardly do anything to help myself if I don't know how to use this body and this amazing outfit..."

"Absolutely, Millie."
1252112212212.title: Ask about girl lessons.

12521122122121.content:
Millie walked inside the elevator, recalling Sammie's offer as she stumbled inside, barely managing to avoid tripping. As the elevator descended to a black chamber, Sammie began to speak.

"Regarding my offer for a mentor, I have several women in your lives on record, so in a sense, I will be utilizing a pink hologram based on your friends. In addition, I will be utilizing a number of training methods so that you may be far more appropriate for your body, ranging from fashion and makeup, to social cues and even the likes of seducing both men and women. However, the choices are yours to make- If you don't want to seduce, I can accept that, for example. In addition, thanks to your fully functioning anatomy, lessons on raising children is also an option."

Looking ahead, after she escaped, she'd definitely have to think about what she'd do with the rest of her life. As such, as the elevator slowly stopped at a dark chamber with a bright white floor, Millie made her decision.

"I'd like my mentor to be..."
12521122122121.title: Who to choose?

choices: Sammie starts to tutor Millie normally.
Sammie's teaching methods are rather... hypnotic.
125211221221211.content:
"I got the outfit, after all." Millie giggled, running her hands up her thighs, over her hips, and around to cup her breasts.

"Loading personality file..." Sammie replied. A few moments later, a bright pink avatar, shaped like Rouge, appeared in front of her, posing. "Are you ready for you first lesson, cutie?"

"Yes!"
125211221221211.title: "Rouge the Bat."

1252112212212111.content:
Millie smiled as she kept trying in earnest to learn all of the lessons, thankfully getting help with Sammie's assistance. These lessons felt so natural, and they made her feel so confident... In-depth analysis resulted in nothing more than some sort of hallucinatory tech meant to mess with anyone in close contact with the thing... Sure, that might have been nice once for a surprise, but it was probably good for nothing other than perhaps some sort of internet rumor of some kind..

"Honestly, you won't do at all for the advertisement... But you have potential... I could rebuild you from the ground up to match your adorable little co-star... Or I could just expand you a bit with something soft and fluffy so you look like a plush... What could I do...?"

The Tails Doll silently stared as Sophia pondered.
125222121222212111111212212111211211211.title: Empress, human, ... Director?

choices: They manage to make a very cute Tailsko doll.
"Toymaker" is not one of Sophia talents...
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content:
There was no real reason for it to resemble Tails anymore. After all, Tails was a thing of the past, and now Melissa was here to stay- A dramatic improvement in Sophia's opinion.

With Nicole's help, the Empress began to remake the toy robot, preparing for its best evolution yet.
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: Make the Tails Doll a Tailsko Doll?

1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content:
Sophia grinned as she looked upon the utterly adorable doll. It matched Melissa's proportions, but in an utterly adorable manner. Soon enough, they showed it to Melissa just to get an idea of the reaction. She almost immediately grabbed onto it.

"Like, this so super-adorable! I'm just sure everyone will love it!"

Sophia chuckled, explaining that she just needed to cuddle the doll in various ways in front of the pretty camera. Melissa nodded, asking about various camera angles. Sophia scratched her head, a bit confused at what her super-cute husband did... It was like she was an absolute expert in anything she was asked to do... But the rest of the time, she was an utter airhead. It was a little confusing... Would she go see her husband when he got back, or would she just let go and accept that she was this convenient for the time being? Sure, it was something he might have over looked... But then again, Eggman was her husband and Emperor. He could do no wrong after all. What would she do...?
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: A doll for a Doll.

choices: Sophia agrees, and they decide to give Melissa a new outfit.
Sophia likes the juxtaposition, and keeps her this way.
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content:
Sophia decided it wasn't worth worrying about. If it made Melissa useful as well as adorable, then it was okay with her.

The Empress and her AI ally spent over an hour taking various shots of the vixen cheerleader with her cute little doll, and there wasn't a bad shot among them.

"Hmm... I'm not sure if the sexy cheerleader getup works for this advert." Nicole mused, looking over their pictures.
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: Let it go?

choices: Tell Melissa she doesn't need it now.
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content: Sophia decided to leave the outfit on and started to film. Soon enough, Melissa was gently nuzzling her new little doll as the cameras rolled- She was absolutely adorable, and even when Melissa flubbed up a line, it was in character, meaning that they could keep it in. As they finished up, Sophia looked rather pleased- Even with the outfit, nobody could possibly resist Melissa's charms... It was just so perfect, even during the moments when the doll was nestled in her bosom. It was a bit amusing to see how Melissa was child-like in front of the camera, yet off the record, she could be so knowledgeable about filming, as if she had a distinct command to be knowledgeable about only what was needed. Soon enough, the pictures and film were done. Melissa walked over, holding onto the little doll, and now Sophia started thinking... While it was harmless to let her keep the doll... Did she really need the thing? It was a bit of a pointless decision, but it was something on her mind... And then there was the potential reaction from her Emperor...
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: Directors are cheap.

1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content:
"You can keep that, but keep it in your bedroom, okay?" Sophia smiled.

"Yes, Mistress!" Melissa beamed. "Are the others ready yet?"
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: Let Melissa keep the doll.

1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content:
Sophia sighed.

"Sadly, it seems that some bits and pieces of their minds are still resisting... It's a shame- They could just let go, and then they could join you in your lovely bliss... But that's what their reeducation is for, you know?"

Melissa nodded, agreeing with her Empress even moreso. She was always right... Still, they headed towards the area where the others were being educated. Soon enough, Sophia was gently whispering into the ears of each and every one of them. It was clear she was trying to reinforce the mind control, and soon enough a particular pink hedgehog was approaching with a figure that was rather close to Melissa's, yet she was gently swaying- Her mind was still divided between a willing Eggman slave, and a defiant freedom fighter, but Sophia was intent on ensuring that the woman would join Melissa. Soon enough, she was outright making out with the girl, to which she gave no resistance. Sophia grinned and asked a question.

"Now tell me... Who do you serve now and forever...?"
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: Not yet...

choices: Sally Acorn, defiant to the last... unless Sophia has anything to say about it.
Fiona Fox, her fear of Eggman overriding the spell... for now.
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.content:
"That's a good slave." Sophia cooed, petting her head. "Now, let's help the rest of your friends come to the same decision, girls."

"Yes, Empress Sophia!" Melissa and Amy chimed, spreading out through the room.

Most of the victims were really just at breaking point, only needing a small nudge to send them over the edge and into loving obedience. Some of the transformations seemed to be almost chain-reactions. Cream had been steadfast in her resistance until her best friend Amy started to nuzzle and coax her into loving their Master. Antoine, now Annette, had crumpled fair more quickly than Bunnie, but the cyborg quickly fell under the loving touch of her former husband.

Soon, only one victim remained...
1252221212222121111112122121112112112111.title: "Like, Emperor Robotnik!"

12522212122221212.content:
Eggman grinned as he was quick to design an outfit for Melissa, putting elements of the Eggman Empire's colors on it- After all, he couldn't be too obvious. As for hiding the extra tail, he soon realized something that should've been incredibly obvious- The magic of camera angles and Photoshop! Soon enough, he had a professional enough looking advertisement that would plant the seed within to buy the app- After all, while it was harmless to humans, he'd probably get in trouble if he marketed it exclusively to people like Sonic and company! Plus making some more money alongside his final victory was a nice bonus. As he waited for some time, he noticed something else- One of his forgotten inventions was leaving the base for some reason. It was rather confusing given he had recently had Metal Sonic's internal structure remodeled recently, so it couldn't be one of his antics... He soon made an announcement.

"Armies of the Eggman Empire! You have new orders! You are to chase after and capture...!"
12522212122221212.title: Enter Egg-Cutie!

125222121222212121.content: Eggman and Melissa watched the screen together, as the decrepit old robot tried to escape the base. It was a miracle that it was still functioning, let alone rebelling. He didn't recall it having any advanced AI of its own, meaning that this could well have been a foreign programming hijacking his creation's body.
125222121222212121.title: Silver Sonic!

1252221212222121211.content:
Soon enough, Eggman's machines caught up to Silver Sonic, and were quick to restrain it. Melissa on the other hand started thinking, or at least as much as she could, about some of Silver Sonic's parts. They looked new. Soon enough, she was calculating the cost for the manufacture and installation into Silver Sonic's parts. Soon enough, she was preparing a report for her master, who had already caught on- Someone had been sneaking in and upgrading him just for the sake of having him escape for some reason. Yet something else had happened- Silver Sonic was flailing about with more power than he expected- The last time he had seen power like that was when a Chaos Emerald was within him, which would explain the all too familiar stream of radiation- Silver Sonic was fueled by a Chaos Emerald again.

"A Chaos Emerald... Now who would deliver it to me... And in one of my older creations no less? Your code will show me soon enough..."

After some hard hacking, Eggman was surprised to find that the hacker was...
1252221212222121211.title: A hacker?!

1252222.content:
Against her better judgment, Melissa nodded, answering the old scientist with an affirmative answer. He in response laughed as Egg Pawns approached with a custom made outfit styled after Eggman's own red and black outfit. Orbot and Cubot soon arrived, holding a contract. Melissa sighed and sat down, reading through the contract for some time. Apparently part of accepting the contract involved wearing the outfit- Something about "brand recognition". Melissa sighed and put the uniform on, soon noticing a hole for both of her tails. Eggman on the other hand was wheezing.

"Oof... Jeez... Ah, my back... Alright, alright... Now that we've made our partnership formalized, we have what you want. Unfortunately, we can't exactly change you back to a fox boy, you do have the option of... Other transformations..."

Melissa tilted her head. Transformation? What came to mind first was being turned into a machine... And she had already risked that fate at least once... But maybe Eggman had more than just roboticization...? And then there was a feeling at the back of her mind that maybe becoming an immortal machine might not be too bad...
1252222.title: A deal with the Eggman

choices: "... a human, my heir in every sense of the word."
12522221.content:
"Can't hurt to look." She sighed.

"Excellent! Follow the two robots to the next chamber." Eggman commanded, and the screen shut off. Melissa did as she was commanded, following the two droids to the next room, where, sure enough, a large glass tube waited. Eggman appeared on another screen.

"Don't be alarmed, Miss Prower. This isn't mandatory, but it is something for you to consider. This device will, should you use it, transform you into..."
12522221.title: Take a look?

choices: "Try and give the others a taste of this..."
125222211.content:
Melissa blinked as the screen showed off specifications- She wouldn't be so much a traditional badnik as a cloud of nanomachines capable of matching her original organic form, to even surpassing the capabilities of even the bulkiest of combat mechs- Truly invincible... Right? Melissa almost immediately brought up the possibility of an electromagnetic pulse shutting her off. Eggman was quick to explain.

"You'll be the ultimate fusion of organic and mechanical! Beyond any weapon made in the past! Not even Metal Sonic could hope to surpass you! Ohohohohoho!"

The allure of this power as well as the sheer curiosity of the ultimate fusion of organic creature and badnik, not to mention the fact that Eggman was quite literally offering such a thing when he could easily do it to himself if it really was as powerful as he said... She walked inside the tube and started tapping her foot as a mist filled the tube, soon clinging to her form as well as filling her insides. She could feel heightened capabilities, new means of seeing the world, and even a HUD. Orbot and Cubot looked at each other as Melissa's eyes started to glow with a deep blue shine.

"So this is the result of your research... Now to..."
125222211.title: The Birth of Mecha Melissa!

choices: Melissa asks why Eggman didn't do this to himself.
Melissa realises that she feels compelled to obey Eggman.
1252222111.content:
Melissa stepped out of the tube, and walked over to the mad doctor.

"Thank you for this wonderful gift, Ivo." She smiled, flexing her new body. "I'll be sure to make good use of it."

"I know you will, dear."
1252222111.title: "Go thank... Ivo."

12522221111.content:
Melissa soon stopped flexing, then asked the obvious question- Why, with all of these capabilities, didn't Eggman perform the process to himself if he wasn't going to last forever...? He scratched his bald head, blushing. He explained that he had quite literally forgot about the sheer possibility. Melissa herself shook her head, thankful that he didn't do the usual mind control... Although with how he programmed Metal Sonic, he might not have been perfect in his own mind control... Regardless, she tested her own abilities, shifting differing forms that matched various machines Eggman had made over the years. She grinned as her transformations were entirely flawless, before testing other transformations- Even mimicking her old male form... But there was something hollow about it... She was comfortable as a vixen. Yet something ultimately much more important popped up on her HUD- An alarm of something going on. Eggman was quick to notice despite his behavior earlier.

"For the love of...! It's...!"
12522221111.title: Forgetful Egg...

choices: Melissa stands firm to her ideals, and prepares to surrender herself.
Melissa gives in to her new desires and prepares for a fight with her friends.
125222211111.content:
"I see." Melissa said,looking at the screen. With her friends arriving, now was her chance to end the Empire, to surrender to them and dismantle the whole wretched thing, return mostly to her normal life, though now as a girl made of nanites... though at least she and Nicole would have some new common ground.

And yet, a not-insignificant part of her didn't want to do that. With Eggman having given her such a lovely gift and mde her into this perfect being, she felt guilty to even think about betraying him. He had made her this, given her a new, female identity, which suited her much better than her male one, and then turned her into a perfect robotic creature... She was sorely tempted to side with Ivo and repel her friends, maybe even capture them...
125222211111.title: "Sonic and your friends attacking!"

1252222111112.content: Melissa grinned- She'd be able to get rid of certain... Faults about some of her friends, and then there was the fact that she was now capable of interfacing with technology including the likes of Nicole's devices. She headed out alongside an army of Badniks and other combat mechs "borrowed" from the likes of GUN. Sonic and company looked absolutely shocked to see Tails female and on the side of Eggman, yet when Nicole started scanning, there was no sign of mind alteration- This was all of her free will. Sonic was quick to start begging, yet when Melissa revealed her nanotech nature, these Freedom Fighters seemed to have no mercy, even if bouncing on Melissa appeared to be little more than an annoyance rather than destroying her or freeing her as Sonic hoped... Soon, the two sides seemed to be evenly matched for once, giving Melissa an idea- If Eggman fell, she'd at least be able to hitch a ride with Nicole and try to explain herself to her friend... After all, she always was a gear head. Soon...
1252222111112.title: This means War

choices: She answers, cementing herself as Eggman's ally/successor.
She doesn't have an answer, and starts to wonder...
12522221111122.content:
As it was, Melissa was just too effective for her former friends.

They couldn't do anything to stop her or slow her, she was just too tough. If they did manage to damage part of her construct body, she'd just repair herself or form a new one in seconds. She did the same for her mechnical troops as well. Every time a SWATbot or Badnik fell, her machines would have it up and running again in short order. She was more than smart enough to repel Nicole's attempts to hack into her systems as well.

As she noticed her organic foes beginning to tire, she made her move. She called in Metal Sonic to confront his flesh-and-blood counterpart, as she used her nanites to infest Bunnie's arm and legs. Despite the rabbit's protests, she was unable to control her limbs as they turned her arm cannon on her friends, and started firing out stun blasts. Nicole found that the labyrinthine mind of her former friend had quickly turned into a prison, and she was now trapped within the hostile AI's code until she could be reprogrammed and freed.

Shortly, only Sonic remained, exhausted as he tried to match Metal once again. The others had already been cuffed and carted off to the doctor's prison, and Melissa watched, interested, as the fight wound down, Metal punching the hedgehog down and dragging him over to her feet.

"T-tails... why are you doing this?" He pleaded.
12522221111122.title: The Eggman Empire dominated.

choices: Was pleased with Melissa's desire to succeed him!
Was perturbed to hear such criticism...
125222211111221.content:
Melissa merely chuckled.

"My dear Sonic... My big brother figure... Tails is gone- My name is Melissa. Eggman is getting old. Forgetful. What he gave me was a chance to become something more... Something truly eternal- A nanotech fusion of organic and mechanical. And to be honest, being a vixen isn't that bad of a trade. I think I even like it. And I want to let you feel just how good it can be- You're free to go back once you've seen just what you can be... Technically speaking, you can even retain a male form if you really want to stay the same old boring Sonic the Hedgehog. And Nicole and I can certainly tell you that this isn't anything Egghead put in my head- I agreed to this. Even if we have to wait a few decades, the Eggman Empire can be something else entirely... A force that can protect the planet- And to be honest, I'm tired of you fighting Eggman. You'll get to keep having fun, but seeing Eggman hurting people even if it's by accident and touching things that he shouldn't be touching is getting old... Now then..."

She ordered a set of Crabmeats to carry Sonic inside the base while she headed to Eggman, soon placing her hand on her hip as Eggman...
125222211111221.title: The Empress' speech

1252222111112211.content:
"I must say, I enjoyed the speech." Eggman said. It surprised the vixen slightly, she'd expected him to be displeased with the criticism. "If my name is known and loved for a thousand years, I will be satisfied, no matter the form it took to get there."

"If you say so, Ivo." She smiled. "Now, I have things to do... Nicole's attempts to escape are futile, but annoying, I should reprogram her... but I also need to fix the others before Sonic tries to lead an escape."
1252222111112211.title: Was pleased with Melissa's desire to succee...

choices: The others embraced Melissa, pleased with her reasonable decision.
The others attempted to attack- They would need to be 'convinced'.
12522221111122112.content: Melissa walked over to a dark lab filled to the brim with the Eggman logo on the walls. Sonic and the others were inside a row of tubes connected to the same machine that had changed her before. She gently smiled, reassuring them that this wouldn't be painful at all- All they had to do was simply breath. While they started attempting to hold their breaths, Melissa activated the machine, starting with Sonic by inputting their names. While the ones that were already female didn't end up with name changes, the males soon received far more feminine names while their bodies, regardless of gender were covered in nanomachines that started reproducing, bonding to their cells and morphing their bodies to match more of a standard female mold. As soon as they were let out, the majority of them were decidedly angry with Melissa, but she herself was dealing with a bit of a dilemma- She said she would let them go back to their lives before, including even opposing the Eggman Empire... But they were being incredibly emotional to the point of apparently ignoring the fact that their free will had been retained, proving that Melissa was being far more merciful than what they expected of Eggman... She sighed as...
12522221111122112.title: Start with Sonic.

choices: She works on them one and a time.
She does them all at once.
125222211111221122.content:
With them all now hving bodies like hers, the Freedom FIghters had decided that the playing field had been evened, and they might now be able to stop her.

They were wrong.

As Sally gave the order to attack, Melissa snapped her fingers, an the nanotech in their bodies froze, pinning them in place. The vixen looked at her captive friends with a disappointed sigh.

"I have given you a gift, and this is how you repay me? Very well, I see that I will need to... convince you... of my worth."
125222211111221122.title: The others attempted to attack- They would need...

choices: Surrendered to the will of the Eggman Empire.
1252222111112211222.content:
Melissa smirked as her nanites spread out, integrating themselves with her friends, giving them a new set of uniforms patterned after Eggman's own uniform with a proud Eggman Empire logo on the back. She basked in the power of control... While she left their personalities relatively the same, certain... Flaws were altered to be less irritating, and of course, they would see just what the Eggman Empire could possibly do- While they would carry on the orders of Eggman, they would become independent the moment Eggman passed. After all, what good would an empire be if it couldn't live past its founder? She soon turned her attention to Nicole, sealed within her own mind. Within cyberspace, Melissa grinned at a quivering Nicole. She looked small. Afraid. Perfect for someone about to be molded into a perfect little servant. Melissa allowed Nicole access to her optics, just to see her allies molded into beings like her, and enjoying it in an admittedly painful attempt to break her resistance...

"Well, Nicole? What will you do...?"

Nicole...
1252222111112211222.title: She does them all at once.

choices: She easily overtakes her former friend.
Nicole puts up a surprisingly strong fight.
12522221111122112222.content:
"Freedom Fighters n-never quit..." THe lynx murmured, fighting back tears. "I-I will not let you do this..."

Melissa shrugged, and grabbed a hold of Nicole's avatar, feeding her code into the lynx's own.
12522221111122112222.title: Refused to give up resisting.

125222211111221122221.content:
Melissa sighed.

"Of course you're going to resist... Nicole, this hurts me as much as it hurts you... You're a dear friend, and I never wanted to alter you... We've been through so much, and I thought that now... Now that we're so much closer, I thought we'd be able to understand each other... Be closer than we ever were before... But now... Now you would reject this...? I made things clear- My intent is to forge the Eggman Empire into a force to protect the planet! You can't even bother to try looking at my own perspective despite the fact that you have access to my mental processes... Granted, I'm not stupid enough to give you permission to modify them, but you can at least observe them... And still, you deny me... I never wanted to reprogram you, Nicole... On some level, I suppose I was in love... What gear head wouldn't dream of an AI that could properly mimic the intricacies of the human brain?"

Nicole could feel her mind changing to accept Melissa as her outfit soon changed to match the others... Melissa soon considered something else- Reprogramming the rebellious Metal Sonic... Or returning to Eggman. She soon...
125222211111221122221.title: She easily overtakes her former friend.

choices: Eggman is very pleased with the results.
Eggman is slightly disappointed that he didn't beat Sonic himself.
1252222111112211222211.content:
It was best to make sure the doctorwas approving of her plans for now.

Returning her consciousness to her body, and allowing Nicole to reform herself, Melissa looked at her assembled friends. She looked at their minds in turn, making sure all of them were ready, and spoke up.

"Come,we should meet with the boss." She said, turning and leading them away. The group made their way to Eggman's throne room, and filed in, Melissa taking the lead while the other fallen Freedom Fighters lined up behind her.
1252222111112211222211.title: Headed for Eggman.

12522221111122112222111.content: "I must say I'm impressed Melissa, should've recruited you several years ago." The vixen smiled as she gave a response, "They aren't finished: I plan on reversing their genders like I was so they can enjoy my experience." "Do whatever you'd like to them Melissa, this will be your empire soon enough."
12522221111122112222111.title: Eggman is very pleased with the results.

choices: Team Dark and other GUN forces?
125222211111221122221111.content: Melissa grinned, before calling her nanite-organic hybrid troops to her- They were all wearing Eggman Empire Uniforms, lacking in injuries that they may have had, including Bunnie's past injuries, resulting in a rather pleased Bunnie saluting Melissa. While her mind had been altered, the Freedom Fighters' personalities were left relatively unchanged. As such, Bunnie's own insecurities regarding her arm were still something to worry about. As such, she was absolutely overjoyed to have quite literally the best of both- The superhuman capabilities of her mechanical form, and the physical sensations of being 100% organic. If she knew this was her fate, she would have betrayed the Freedom Fighters for just this kind of freedom. Meanwhile, the boys were soon starting to enjoy the feelings of becoming women, although on retrospect, it would be far more difficult just to choose names for each of them... At least Melissa had a name instead of some kind of nickname... But she had different plans for now... Would she go after...
125222211111221122221111.title: Start editing the Freedom Fighters

choices: Start changing the names of each Freedom Fighter first
Get the Chaotix now, names can wait
1252222111112211222211111.content: The Chaotix would be the next critical targets as they in the past were able to match the strength of the Freedom Fighters, not mention Melissa was intrigued to find out how those like Charmy and Julie-Su would look like as the opposite gender like she currently saw looking at Sally and Rotor.
1252222111112211222211111.title: The Chaotix?

12522221111122112222111112.content: Melissa, deciding she would call out names on the fly, decided to make a phone call to the Chaotix Detective Agency, impersonating one of their usual clients- A distraught mother searching for her child. She grinned as she heard Vector's usual groaning that cases like lost children wouldn't need to bother about payment. Sure, she could just get rings from her own bank account, but utilizing character flaws and the fact that the Chaotix, despite being detectives, would have literally no reason to suspect that the woman talking to them was formerly an ally of theirs that had willingly become a member of the Eggman Empire- Who beyond a rabid conspiracy theorist in the slums of Central City would even have the very idea that she was someone the detective agency knew, much less someone who had willingly joined their enemy? As it was, she gave them an address that lead to an abandoned factory, meaning they wouldn't have any witnesses- While she was fine with turning friends into biomechanical gynoids, she wasn't going to go overboard. But now, she had a different decision...
12522221111122112222111112.title: Get the Chaotix now, names can wait

choices: Be patient and let Nicole take care of it.
1252222111112211222211112.content:
With the Freedom Fighters all hers to command and control, the next biggest threat to her Empire was GUN. Fortunately, she already had Nicole working to infect all of their machines, lacing everything with subliminal mind control signals, turning them all into her drones.

No, the real task would be the upper echelon. The commander was an old man, cantankerous and probably best suited to life as a drone, but a few of their agents, such as Topaz and Madonna, would be reasonable servants, like her friends, and Shadow and Rouge would of course be necessary additions. She also had the chance to reconnect with her Master's estranged niece, Hope, and convince her to return to the family.
1252222111112211222211112.title: Team Dark and other GUN forces?

12522221111122112222111122.content: As Melissa started feeling up her own body, she commanded NICOLE to simply start influencing the upper echelon of GUN in the appropriate manner- The Mobians, Ultimate Life Form included, would willingly march towards becoming Biotech Gynoids while the humans would soon willingly join the Eggman Empire just for the time being... But given what he would probably think of Hope, Nicole had left Hope unaffected- Instead, she would instead be convinced to join not Eggman, but to be passive for as long as Eggman still lived. After all, she had made certain things clear, including that she wanted to stay away from her Uncle... After all, Roboticization was a fate meant for Mobians, not for any sort of human... Right? She started thinking, before checking her own internal records. So far, things checked out, but she still had some questions... Would she go to Eggman and ask about anything he might have done, or would she leave it for later and focus on the invasion of GUN and potentially the United Federation?
12522221111122112222111122.title: The Secret Invasion

125222211111221122221111221.content:
Melissa returned to her Master's side with a smile.

"Can we turn humans into robots too?" SHe asked.
125222211111221122221111221.title: Ask Dr. Robotnik?

1252222111112211222211112212.content:
Dr. Robotnik grumbled something about the idea of him roboticizing himself being ridiculous. Melissa started arguing the point that in essence, it wouldn't be as much as being a Biotech gynoid... Before realizing that it was definitely a bad idea to bother him when he was in a mood. Yet something just wouldn't leave her mind... That thought of roboticizing him... Or rather, giving him a perspective shift as a biotech being... Yet she didn't know what might happen... And what would it do to human flesh? Would it end up changing Robotnik in some sort of manner? She didn't know... But she wanted to give him an idea of how she felt... She started considering what she would end up doing now that she had some manner of command of people on the planet that could run circles around the military of the world... Before going back to her original question. In a way, it would decide his fate- If he had indeed messed with her in some manner, she would give him a taste of biotech. If not, she would leave him alone...

"Did you... Alter me in any way?"
1252222111112211222211112212.title: No.

choices: Eggman made her think of herself as a woman, nothing more.
Eggman did more to speed up her corruption.
12522221111122112222111122121.content: "You did...? How?" She asked.
12522221111122112222111122121.title: "Why, yes."

125222211111221122221111221212.content:
Eggman sheepishly chuckled.

"I had to make you more... Amiable to my cause-"

Melissa had heard enough, ramming nanites into Robotnik's form before stepping back as the Doctor's body slowly warped into a shape that seemed utterly alien after all these years... Melissa tilted her head as Eggman's form reworked itself from a bald, rotund, middle aged scientist, to a young girl with a head of hair that mimicked the old mustache. The girl panted while her trademark glasses took on a distinct shine- She was something else entirely. She was the first human biotech gynoid... But Melissa was a bit concerned by her own actions... She had just roboticized a human, so to speak... She felt absolutely terrible... And then there was the problem of whether... Well, Robotnik had any free will or not... This was just utterly painful on her conscience... She slowly stumbled over with a concerned look on her face as she bit her lip.

"Hey... Are you alright over there?"

After several minutes, she soon answered.
125222211111221122221111221212.title: Egg... Woman?

choices: Eggman decides that she doesn't need Melissa anymore...
Eggman feels rather submissive toward her "creator."
1252222111112211222211112212121.content: "You were dying anyway." She waved her hand, sauntering away. "Now you're young, beautiful, and immortal. You're welcome."
1252222111112211222211112212121.title: "You could have killed me!"

12522221111122112222111122121211.content: Melissa soon realized something- She was only brought aboard just because Eggman was dying. Now that he, or rather, she was not only young, but also functionally immortal... She had lost her place, and now her plan of outlasting him was done- She would have to rely on outright cyber-warfare now that they were both a set of nanomachine clouds. The two dispersed, soon interacting with each other on a plane of existence once inhabited solely by Nicole. The two kept trying to find ways of finding a sort of way past their current offenses without outright compromising their own defenses. The two were quick to throw insults at each other just to try and break each others concentration, yet Melissa kept it minor- After all, spend too much time on insults, and she would end up giving up her own security.
