She started paying attention to a small scale war on Robotnik's nanomachines just to try and figure out something that could draw her attention. Yet soon, the winner was decided- The inheritor was...
12522221111122112222111122121211.title: The War Begins?

choices: She commands Phage to infect her.
125222211111221122221111221212112.content:
Melissa found herself trapped inside her own digital fortress, with only Nicole by her side.

"How!" She growled. "How does she keep outplaying me?"

Ivy Robotnik, as she had become known, had adapted easily to her new life, and had gained mastery over her digital powers with terrifying speed. From there, her experience as the leader of armies had served her well, and she was more than capable of beating her inexperienced foe in the strategy game that was their war. Without Sonic to focus on, and with a greater clarity granted by her logical computer brain, the sources of Eggman's insanity were gone from Ivy's mind, removing the only advantage that Melissa had.

Now, Ivy's virus army surrounded Melissa's final bastion, beating against the walls, with no hope except to somehow defeat Ivy from here. Nicole was her only ally now, as Ivy had hacked and reprogrammed the other former Freedom Fighters to not listen to her.

"I believe I have the answer, Melissa." Nicole spoke up. Melissa turned to her, only to find herself paralysed, bound in digital tendrils by the lynx.

"Nicole!"

"You have always been alone." The lynx droned, as black shadow rose from her body, a white cat-like mask appearing to represent a face. Nicole's eyes glazed, slumping into the embrace of Phage, who continued to speak in her own voice. "WHen you were fighting my Mistress, I infected and possessed your only companion. I corrupted, warped, brainwashed her. When she awakens from her stupor, she will be Mistress Ivy's slave, pet, tool.

Helpless, Melissa was forced to watch as Phage opened the doors to her fortress, allowing Ivy to enter and approach her. The former human AI looked up at her captive, smirking.
125222211111221122221111221212112.title: Robotnik!

choices: Leave Melissa until she was completely loyal?
1252222111112211222211112212121122.content:
Melissa was out of options. She was going to fail. As such, she would end up going with a rather odd means of grace that would make Phage blink.

"Phage! Answer my last command as the heiress of Eggman- Infect me!"

It was utterly confusing. The traitor's last act was not one of defiance... But of submission. Now Phage was seriously considering going back to Ivy just to figure out why she would do this... But it was a command she could get an explanation of the moment the mask came on... Phage soon approached Melissa's form and slowly latched on, utilizing her nanites as a means of making an appearance in the physical world, resembling the two-tailed vixen, but completely blacked out with the exception of a familiar white mask.

"Mistress Ivy, your opposition has ceased, although she did it of her own will. Processing data now."

Ivy started thinking- Perhaps she might give Melissa a chance to redeem herself? After all, she did give her such a magnificent body... But then again, she did have the idea of outlasting Eggman... What would she do?
1252222111112211222211112212121122.title: Unexpected infection.

choices: Melissa stays as her Master's second in command.
Melissa becomes an ordinary slave, like her friends.
12522221111122112222111122121211222.content: "Well, I'm sure an explanation will be forthcoming when her mind is put in its proper place." Ivy grinned, looking and goopy nanites covering Melissa's body as Phage rewrote her code.
12522221111122112222111122121211222.title: Leave Melissa until she was completely loyal?

125222211111221122221111221212112221.content:
As Melissa blinked... She felt clear. She was more than just her and her friends. She knew she was two in one personas- One was once a genius fox boy, and the other was an AI that hungered for knowledge. Yet together, they knew their one true master. Almost immediately, they spoke in a way that betrayed their nature as a dual being.

"Mistress, we apologize for our behavior- It was closer to instinct. After all, the vixen was used to being your foe. As such, when the terms of the alliance meant nothing, she feared for her life. Please forgive us."

Ivy chuckled. That made a lot more sense, but still, she had proven herself as a loyal given she was willing to roboticize her friends and was outright willing to force her will on them when it mattered.

"As the magnanimous man- Er, woman that I am, I think you've earned a second chance! Now then, my faithful servant... What shall we do regarding your friends? And I'm not talking about the ones you turned- I'm talking about the ones that didn't show up..."
125222211111221122221111221212112221.title: Restored.

choices: Ivy wants Melissa back, not Phage in her body.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211.content: "They will be hunted down." The fused AI spoke, as her black, inky form melted into something more recognisable- Melissa's body, wearing an Egg uniform with inverted colours in the coat- black material with red highlights- and the coat was longer. She had a lower neckline, longer gloves with claw-like fingers, and the whole getup was made of latex. Her face was still covered by the virus' mask, hiding her expression from view. "Our fellow slaves will carry out the order."
1252222111112211222211112212121122211.title: Hunt them down?

12522221111122112222111122121211222111.content:
Melissa bowed before a slightly cautious Ivy. After all, it was a fusion of Melissa, her equal in terms of intelligence, and Phage, one of her more aggressive AIs. Yet Melissa was eager to ensure her Mistress' fears were ill-founded.

"We exist to serve you, Mistress Ivy. Both of us vote on our decisions- If you wish to talk to one of us, we will comply."

Ivy blinked. At the very least, it made communication easier with the both of them, but that... Reverb... It was just too unnatural. Sure, it showed that the both of them were speaking, but the fact that both were coming out meant some rather... Strange things in regards her biology. At least for the time being, she still had a cunning lieutenant completely loyal to her. Now she had to decide on just which to start with... Would she send her elites towards more... Obscure associates, or would they take on the military alongside capturing the likes of Team Dark? One drew less attention, while the other was two birds with one stone, so to speak...
12522221111122112222111122121211222111.title: Legion

125222211111221122221111221212112221112.content:
"Time to clean up the dregs of society." Eggman mused. "Phage, go and find your host's former lover. Fiona may know something about the movements of the criminals she once worked with."

"Of course." Melissa spoke, turning and walking away. It didn't take them long to find Fiona, who looked at her girlfriend's stolen body with...
125222211111221122221111221212112221112.title: Rascals and Rogues?

choices: "... all biotechs must become part of Phage!"
"... we must suggest this to Lady Ivy."
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
"Mels..." Fiona murmured.

"Not exactly." The hybrid spoke with two voices. "Melissa's rebelliousness was too much. Mistress Ivy sought to see it curbed. Now, we are one. Her mind, memories, and personality still exist,but as mere compliments to ours. We are Phage."

Fiona recoiled in horror, backing up from the figure before her.

"You will tell us where to find your former comrades."

"N-not until you let go of Mels' body!" Fiona yelped.

"Your resistance is undesirable." They hissed, as Fiona's biotech form ceased to operate, frozen in place. Melissa stepped closer, as Phage raised her hand and formed a mask identical to her own it, preparing to place it over Fiona's face. "It will be curbed."

The red vixen screamed as the mask covered her face. She felt the black, sludgy form of Phage's nanites engulf her body, hijacking her biotech form as it began to reshape her. She felt the mask fuse with her skin, as Phage wormed into her mind and coiled around it, dulling her will and trapping her in her own head.

The black tar reformed into Fiona's new body, wearing an identical uniform to Melissa's, complete with mask. Phage slowly adjusted to the sensation of seeing herself, as the three AI spoke in unison.

"Subject: Fiona's integration into self is successful." The trio spoke. "Our processing power and ability to serve the Master are only increasing. Biotech unit efficiency is also improved by deletion of self-awareness and individuality. Conclusion..."
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Fiona-Phage

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
The trio soon headed back towards Ivy, who blinked, before asking just what was going on. She tilted her head the moment both figures spoke.

"We are Phage- Our findings are as such: Individuality and Self-Awareness slow down efficiency. Request opinion, Mistress Ivy. At current status: Self-Awareness and individuality are repressed but still present."

Ivy stared as her glasses fell off. Soon enough, they crawled back up, reforming on her face. She asked Phage to give her a minute to think things over, to which Phage complied with- After all, she was Phage, but she was still proud to be a servant of Mistress Ivy. Now, Ivy could safely think things over. The idea was good on paper- After all, increasing efficiency and processing power was always some sort of good idea, especially when it meant chances of rebellion would be rendered little to zero... But then again, individuality seemed to give Melissa and company a strength that defied logic. At times, she even used that teamwork quite a few times. After some thoughts, her orders were as followed...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: What does she say?

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: "As you command!" The two Phage bodies saluted, as Fiona-Phage turned and headed off. "Mistress, I have one question. WHen you say "us" do you include yourself? Do you wish to be part of us too?"
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: "Make US the only existence!"

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: Ivy grinned as her nanomachines integrated themselves with the three forms. Soon, signals started sending the other biotech beings to the room where Phage and her mistress integrated with each other. It looked like some sort of chaotic storm, yet it was becoming obvious that any individual wills were becoming buried under efficiency and ensuring the success of the Empire. Soon, all was Phage. All was Ivy. All was each of the biotech gynoids integrated into one existence despite the potentially near-infinite "bodies" capable of being formed. Soon, the nanites horde started integrating itself with the buildings, the badniks, and the mechs- All were one... They could sense everything... They had far more than mortal senses. They were an evolution- Truly the ultimate fusion of both organic and mechanical. And there was little to no chance of reverting it in the traditional sense. But then again, there was a distinct problem that might arise given the initiator of the fusion in the first place... Was it Phage or Ivy?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: For we are many.

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
Ivy smirked, as she felt her mind become the whole city, all of her minions and former foes now mere extensions of herself. Phage was a simple secondary voice in her mind now, helping to guide her, but exerting no influence.

Deciding to manifest herself physically from the nanite soup that was once a population of Mobians, humans, and machines, Phage's mask took form, a body appearing behind it.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Ivy, just as planned!

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: The others brought up a point to Ivy- She had chosen Melissa as her successor, so why not choose her form as an avatar? Besides, it would make for a shock to see what was inside... Soon enough, Melissa's form had appeared underneath the mask, although her muzzle had more of... Reddish hue at the tips- Clearly Ivy had attachments to what was once Ivo Robotnik's oh so glorious facial hair. Meanwhile, Melissa was bubbling within as the vixen felt just about everything... And it was far from what she expected. After all, she was just expecting to spend years within the Eggman Empire, staying in the shadows... But looking back, it was definitely a strange journey now that she was one with her foe... But then again, she was just as much of a valid voice within, so at the very least she could act as Ivy's conscious for the time being... And she wasn't pleased with human beings within the fold. She started begging Ivy just to let the humans go- She could go after more... Furry folk, but she wanted humans left alone.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Well, it's something.

choices: Wait for more victims to blunder in.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: "Negative. All must be one with us, regardless of origin. Only through total assimilation can we become perfect. This includes humanity." Ivy replied, suppressing Melissa's negative reaction to the humans being enslaved.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Ivy is decidedly not interested.

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: Melissa sighed as Ivy continued a proud Robotnik tradition- Laughing. Yet still, the goo started spreading. Bit by bit, they were starting to integrate themselves with organic life all over... From the lands to the seas, the voices kept going and going... They were bound to run out of room, and yet the voices seemed to start gaining sheer presence thanks to the countless numbers... It was strange- From a technical standpoint, all were becoming Ivy, yet Ivy was starting to become more and more insignificant... It was bound to cause some sort of collapse despite the technical advantage Ivy had- Her processing power could only hold so much, even as each of the brains and computers of the globe became little more than bits and pieces of Ivy... It was bound to cause some sort of backlash in the real world. But what would this mean? Would there be survivors who managed to avoid the Egg-Fog? Or would it merely mean a slowed conquest of the world? The goo could only watch for the time being...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Continue spreading power.

choices: The strain is too much, and Ivy breaks into her component minds again.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: Soon, Mobius was little more than a silver orb, converted to Ivy mind, body and soul. Ivy was the planet now, alive and sentient metal.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Game Over, Start of Egg-World.

choices: It works! Ivy can now create the world anew.
It fails, and Ivy shatters under the strain, freeing everyone she consumed.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
As powerful as she had become, Ivy was losing her grip on her mind, and unfortunately, she was beginning to fray around the edges. As much as she wanted to be the only mind, she couldn't maintain it any longer...

She had a plan, though... If she could separate out those minds and form new bodies for them from her planetary biomass, then she could recreate all life on Mobius with her as their eternal technological goddess... All she had to do was erase their contradictory memories and she would have her worshippers...

Concentrating as much as she could, she began to create a new form on her surface, the silver form rising up into the shape of a curvy, cute vixen, with two tails and soft features. She began to imbue her creation with Melissa's mind, albeit altered. If it worked, Melissa would be reborn, not as her rebellious underling, but a devoted, fervant follower. The high priestess of her Goddess... If she could just make it work...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: The strain is too much, and Ivy breaks into her...

choices: Beg for a means of information?
Let the miracle of creation continue?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
Melissa moaned and looked around. The landscape was silver... As it should be... Right? Yet something felt... Off. Her Goddess had left her... It left her... Despondent. She knelt down and began to pray towards the silver that was the Earth... Her devotion was answered by forms emerging, along with a voice in her mind- She trembled as her Goddess spoke.

"I am always with you... You will be the Priestess- My mouthpiece as the world evolves. We shall be eternal..."

Melissa smiled as more figures slowly emerged. Creation was happening in front of her, and she knew it was all thanks to her Goddess. Soon, the earth formed while Ivy's voice could be heard, cackling in the wind. It was just so comforting... But for the time being, she could only watch as the miracle of creation occurred. She knew that she could watch, but would she be able to record this for generations to come? It was something to be curious about given the circumstances... But would she pray to her Goddess for means of recording? Or would she wait?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Melissa Prower: Priestess.

choices: Ivy makes her other former foes first.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: Melissa knew that this was not something for people to witness, save for her. She was the priestess, the only one who could see the birth of the new world.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Let the miracle of creation continue?

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
Melissa smiled as more of Ivy's old foes emerged, remolded into fellow priestesses- Living only to serve the glory of their Goddess Ivy. The group smiled as their Goddess spoke to them. They bowed down as Ivy spoke...

"Hey! Are you guys alright? It's a bit weird having your physical form being the planet itself, but... Well, I'm working on the basic parts of being... Well, the creator, and right now, I'm trying to concentrate just to access the parts of basic biology- It's really hard trying to start life, as well as speed through bits and pieces of evolution- It's weird trying to use certain bits and pieces without ending up with giant bug monsters being the dominant species- Trying to get something a bit more... Human so to speak. Plus there's the whole mess of certain... Artifacts. And a formerly floating island. So for the time being, I'm using artifacts of the... Old world just to fuel myself and my hold over the entire planet... Do you girls want anything?"

The girls pondered before deciding on...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Once Freedom Fighters, now a Sisterhood of Steel.

choices: It resembles one of Eggman's fortresses.
It looks more classical in design.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
"We need a temple in which to worship you, great Goddess!" Melissa announced.

Ivy focused her thoughts, as a giant, palacial temple began to rise from the ground before them.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: The first temple.

choices: Melissa is now completely devoted to Ivy.
Melissa's self held out against other spells for longer, and she's still free.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
"As you command." Phage replied, sounding somewhat disappointed. The masks on both vixens fell off, Fiona's disintegrating while Phage's normal shapeless form appeared from Melissa's.

Both vixens fell to their knees, recoiling in shock as their minds regained awareness. Ivy, seeing a chance, crouched down and embraced them, drying to comfort them. TO her delight, Fiona embraced her, while Melissa blinked and shook her head, as if trying to shake the last dregs of Phage from her mind.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: "Restore the both of them!"

choices: Form a plan to betray Ivy?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
Melissa groaned.

"Man... It was still nice voting and all... But she had to take over... My cells are screaming... Oh... She took some... Alright... Guess that's fair enough... Oh... Mistress Ivy... Sorry about all that... I kind of want to run off, but... Where can I run? I literally betrayed my friends just to repay you... I'm no Freedom Fighter... Not anymore... How may I serve you and the Empire, Mistress?"

Ivy gently smiled. Even after she admitted she wanted to run, she willingly gave herself to the Eggman Empire. It was a small thing that made her rather happy... Yet Melissa sighed, considering the possibilities. What could she do now? She could safely continue serving Ivy and achieve her goal of turning the Empire into a force for peace in the long run... Or she could scheme behind Ivy's back, reprogramming her when she least expected it... It was dark, but after what she did, she was no shining hero... Not anymore. As such, what would she place as her plain goal? Safe but long, or quick but dangerous?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Oddly willing

choices: Ivy has plans for Melissa and Fiona.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
Melissa knew that Phage was there now, and she had no chance of resisting the virus' corurpting influence, and she had no desire to subject Fiona to that. The two vixens simply huddled together, As Ivy and Phage stood over them, the human biotech grinning down at her.

With a wave of her hand, Melissa and Fiona were pulled upright, pushing their chests forward. She pressed her hands against them, a slight burning, tingling feeling making them wince. When her hands moved away, both girls' chests were branded with her new logo.

"You are mine, my dear vixen slaves. Your minds are mine. Your bodies are mine. Your souls are mine. Disobey me again, and you will both pay for it. Even if only one of you transgressed... Am I clear, my pets?"

"M-Mistress..." Melissa winced. "Please... don't do this to Fiona..."

"Fiona is being dealt with this way because of you, darling..." Ivy cooed, stroking her cheek. "So, remember that. Remember that next time you consider defying me... that it's your precious girlfriend that pays the price."

"Y-yes, Mistress!" The blonde whimpered, as Ivy released her hold. The two vixens embraced tightly, crying quietly as they looked up at their Empress.

"Good girl." Ivy cooed.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Continue serving Ivy?

choices: Stay relatively human, ears and tails aside.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
The two gulped as Ivy gently embraced the two of them.

"How about you join humanity? They say Humanity is rather infectious after all... Just give it a try... By the way, the whole speech, while it technically does apply, it was just meant to scare. You're feeling fine, right?"

The two gently nodded as their forms shifted towards something decidedly more human. It was strange having exposed skin on the majority of their body, but the layers of clothes made them feel a bit better... Although they were confused upon noticing that their proportions were a bit more... Curvy- It seemed that despite being a young girl, Robotnik's libido was still intact for the time being... They slowly got up and stretched about, trying to get used to the new body as Ivy watched. Granted, the new logo did feel rather nice on their chests... In a way, they were proud of it... But they still missed bits and pieces of being foxes... Particularly the ears and tails- Without them, the two girls felt rather off.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Now a metaphor...

choices: She keeps playing around with her new dolls.
She decides to get back to work.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
The two returned to their vulpine forms, albeit keeping the new physiques.

"Not for you? Ah well." Ivy shrugged, petting them.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Go back to being foxes.

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: Ivy grinned as she demanded even more transformations from the two of them. She wanted to see just how far their nanomachines could take them, and it was rather imaginative- From the mundane to even mythology inspired, Ivy wanted to see just how far the two could they could go. Compression, expansion, and all sorts of bodies, including bizarre new sensations and skills. It took a certain amount of... imagination just to see what could satisfy Ivy's curiosity, and yet nothing seemed to be done. Still, they were a bit unsettled- They wanted to return to being just a pair of nanotech foxes, but their desires were subservient to Ivy's- They kind of deserved it with what had happened... But then again, like a child, she would get bored of it, right? And incurring the wrath of Phage, Ivy's sentient virus was never a wonderful idea... But what exactly would they do? Would they at least voice their concerns just to let out a bit of steam, or would they merely wait it out for the time being...?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Girls like their dolls...

choices: She eventually returns them to normal.
She settles on a new design for them that she likes.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: The two didn't resist as their Empress constantly changed and warped their bodies, putting them through different forms and shapes and identities,toying with them.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: The two let it go.

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
After some time, Ivy finally got bored of playing around with the two vixens. Soon enough, they were incredibly attractive to the point of near-absurdity. Yet to the naked eye, it looked like they were born with it. The two embraced Ivy with a gentle smile.

"Thanks for that..."

Ivy tilted her head before considering what to do with them. Would she let them relax for the time being? After all, they had a bit of a rough time given what was going on, and it looked like that they were happy to be proud members of the Eggman Empire. But what would they end up doing? They were eagerly rubbing the brands on their chest as they looked up at Ivy. Ivy scratched her head before mumbling something. The two vixens gently asked for clarification. Ivy sighed.

"Well, I was thinking of either letting you two relax- After all, despite what Melissa just pulled, the girls here did a lot... So I was considering what to do- Perhaps going out on a vacation at the beach or something like that. What do you think?"
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Finally...

choices: Ivy decides to focus on work first.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: "If you so wish, Mistress!" The two chimed. Ivy smirked at their unshakeable devotion, though she did suppose that giving them these mindsets didn't do much to help her work things out... Well, she had other slaves she could turn into advisors. These two made perfect dolls and she liked it that way.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Beach time!

1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content: Almost immediately, however, the idea of relaxing sounded incredibly tempting- It had been so long since she would have been able to go out without being harassed just because she wanted to take over the world... What was so wrong with that? Still, she had an opportunity that would let her go out and relax on her own. Instead of continuing her initial plan, she announced something across her entire network- A vacation for the partly organic collaborators, by way of heading to the beach. But of course, there was something they had to pay attention to- The fact that they had a wide variety of potential swimsuit designs. Of course, all of them would have some sort of design evocative of Ivy, but what would they be? Red? Yellow? White? Black? Grey? Some sort of combination thereof? And then there was a bit of a simpler decision- Would it be a crowded coast where the people in and of themselves would provide anonymity, or perhaps a private beach? After all, she did have a legitimate company...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: May as well take advantage of it.

choices: They use one of Ivy's flying fortresses to get there.
They use a less conspicuous method of transport.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.content:
Ivy decided that having the beach to herself was the best idea. That way, nobody would be around to question why her servants referred to her as Mistress.

"My pets, pack your things, we're heading to one of my private beaches."

"Yes Mistress!"
1252222111112211222211112212121122211121.title: Private?

1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content:
Fiona merely waved.

"Hey, Phage. Hey, Melissa. What's going on?"

The two blinked, resulting in the mask itself blinking its eyes, and tilted their head. This was decidedly new to them... Why was Fiona so nonchalant about it? They didn't recall Fiona among the Freedom Fighters captured... Yet Fiona soon explained as her form revealed itself to be decidedly biotech in nature.

"I was in your lab, but your friends arrived and captured me. To be honest, I wanted a rebirth of some kind, and now that I'm a member of the Eggman Empire, I feel... Different. Not as angry as I thought I'd be. Yeah, Mistress Ivy was once the one I hated among all else... But seeing how he, or rather, she operates these days makes me think she's a bit more mature- Repentant... So I can feel a bit better about working under Mistress Robotnik, you know?"

Melissa and Phage started considering what to do about the biotech gynoids... Would they serve as her and Mistress Ivy's elite? Or would they be out in the field more often than not?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: "Yo!"

1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content: Yes, elite soldiers would be the perfect fit for them. They transferred this knowledge into the vixen, who automatically accepted her new role.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: Neo-Legionnaires?

1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content:
Melissa grinned underneath the mask as Fiona's uniform soon mirrored Melissa's own- After all, a leader's uniform should be essentially an elaborate version of her soldier's uniform, right? The outfit seemed to hug each curve of Fiona's body, even though she was technically naked. Soon enough, the two were outright embracing each other as Fiona bowed gently.

"Mistress, we exist to serve- The former Freedom Fighters past and present exist as your elite."

Melissa chuckled- Now, they would be able to properly become members of the Eggman Empire... But now the two had questions- Would they act as agents of Phage in terms of appearance, or would they remain with their faces exposed just to let the world know that the Freedom Fighters were not pawns of GUN and the other foolish people of the world, but members of the Eggman Empire? One was incredibly disconcerting thanks to the lack of face, while the other was bound to be a major shock to the world, and in particular some of Sonic's allies...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: The first in a line...

choices: Melissa wants to test Fiona first.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content:
Considering that Sonic and Tails, the two most well-known faces, were already transformed, and their silhouettes and abilities would be recognisable enough... Melissa created a copy of Phage's mask, and placed it on her first slave's face.

"Thank you, Mistress." Fiona smiled behind her mask. "Shall we spread the power of Phage to all of our allies now?"
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: Mask?

1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content:
Melissa chuckled underneath the mask while Phage soon answered while the mask's eyes soon squinted at the vixen in front of her.

"First, you must be tested- If you are not up to par, something wrong might happen- Glitches. Inefficiencies. Thus, you understand my reasoning."

Fiona nodded and performing the standard processes, just to see if her regular internal processes were standard, or hopefully even more efficient than standard... Yet soon enough, Melissa proceeded to face Fiona in combat- Physical, hacking, and mental, it was all done as the two of them became something of a literal storm- They were little more than a cloud, yet the both of them were still facing each other. It was impressive enough that the other biotech gynoids gathered to watch- After all, their mistress was combatting their newest member which was decidedly a first. Ivy on the other hand grinned as she watched the two, or rather, three faced each other- It was stuff like this that would ensure a mighty army...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: Trial by fire.

choices: She converts all of the Biotechs into parts of her.
She's not finished with Fiona yet.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content: "You are adequate." Phage announced, walking away from from Fiona.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: She's up to snuff.

1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content: Soon, Melissa grinned- The both of them agreed upon something else- All Biotech servants of Mistress Ivy would become Phage. She would have the bodies to experience just what the real world was like... After the Mistress would have all of her goals. Soon, they would achieve her goals, yet there would be a... Democracy about all of it- All would be able to answer directly to Mistress Ivy, have their own bodies, but they would have their own will, with an eye from Mistress Ivy. And then there was the fact that Phage would be able to gain from all sorts of view points... But then again, all that would have to wait. First, they would need to conquer. And then again, they had to go to the dregs of society first, and that meant meeting some people that weren't around since after a certain tournament for one of Mistress Ivy's old Death Egg facilities. But it would be simple enough... Hopefully. It would be either Fang or whatever name he went with, Fang, and Bark... Or simply a set of winged rogues...
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: Time for the mask.

choices: Ivy instead commands them to infect her Egg Bosses.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content:
The Rogues would at least be more useful, Phage decided,as she placed a mask on the face of the final former Freedom Fighter, feeling Sally Acorn become a mere minor presence in the back of her mind.

She left the chamber where the biotechs had once resided, and now her many drone bodies stood at attention, reforming in Ivy's throne room.

"Mistress, we intend to expand our reach, starting with the Babylon Rogues. No-one will miss them."
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: Rogues?

choices: In a secluded part of the ship.
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.content:
Ivy grinned.

"Excellent! March onward while I deal with some of my own creations- After all, I want to feel the sensations of each and every one of them!"

The Phages bowed and headed out, searching for their typical hangouts... Notably their airship. The group decided to split apart into resembling grains of sand in order to avoid attention. They started to consider just what they would do with the airship in the first place. After all, they could just fly. After some time, they considered crashing it before making it into a base of some sort- They didn't need to leave it in the air for the time being when Ivy had more than enough airships. As for the rogues themselves... Just where were they? They considered waiting, but Melissa decided to check computer records just to see where they were... If they were out, they could just wait for the time being. If they were still inside, they could simply strike just as they had intended to in the first place... But just where were the rogues...?
1252222111112211222211112212121122211122.title: Time to make some feathered fiends.

choices: Say he always felt like a she?
1252222112.content:
Melissa headed out, much to Eggman's confusion. He begged her to come back before Melissa answered the moment he had appeared only in her heads-up display. She was eager to spread such power and precision to the others- After all, there were pains from before the two tailed fox had met Sonic... And then there were the far more... Negative qualities of her friends... Not even her big brother-figure Sonic was perfect given how he'd constantly run off without thinking about things.

"Just you wait... Soon, you'll see just what this new existence can do..."

As she arrived over her workshop in the Mystic Ruins, there appeared to be something of a small crowd around the shop's door- Her friends were concerned about the disappearance of Miles 'Tails' Prower. She landed out of sight, soon restructuring herself into a decidedly organic form without any sort of eye glow to give her away. But it soon begged the question... Would she infiltrate as a stranger or at least a relative, or perhaps pass herself off as having wanted to become a woman? What would she do...?
1252222112.title: The Beginning of the Iron Fox

choices: She starts transforming them right there.
12522221121.content:
She figured a half-truth would be more convincing than a lie, and approached the crowd slowly. She considered opening with a joke, but decided against it. Her form shifted once more, her clothing shifting from the uniform to a normal red top and black leggings combo, as she drew near to her friends.

"Hello." She said. She'd considered a joking question about who they were waiting for, but being up-front was necessary in this case. The crowd slowly turned to face her, as she felt their eyes stare at her, in shock over what had apparently happened to her.

"Tails?" Sonic gasped. "Is that you?"

"Yes, it's me." She replied, smiling at him. "I... I had a bit of an awakening, and realised that I felt more like a she than a he... After I turned myself, I went off to figure out how to tell you. I'm sorry, I should've told you that I was leaving."
12522221121.title: Say he always felt like a she?

125222211211.content: Instead of blowing her cover when they could potentially attack her, she merely smiled, soon acting rather naturally, albeit trying her best to avoid exposing her nature as a new being. But for now, she could at least properly infiltrate the group, planting nanomachines on each of her friends to have a means of tracking them as she touched them in some manner- Hugs seemed to be the most common given how accepting each of them were of Melissa's so far standard situation. Now she had to deal with a harder part- Who would be her first target? The fast one she thought was most deserving of this sort of blessing, or recruiting the Holo-Lynx would be the first to rat her out as a badnik of sorts? It was a definite problem... She was split between her heart and her mind... And both had equal tactical advantages given the circumstances. She started silently thinking to herself as Sonic and Sally walked over, hugging Melissa again, giving her an opportunity to affect either one... Now who would she recruit first?
125222211211.title: The better part of Valor...

1252222112112.content:
As much as she wanted to embrace Sonic, and see him rise from his current status into a lovely nanite gynoid like herself, she knew that she had to be practical and smart about it, and not only could she eliminate her primary target by assimilating the fellow AI, but it would be far less conspicuous.

She allowed more nanites to touch Sally, creeping into her vest pocket and locating Nicole's computer form,slipping into it. She had options now. DUe to how much faster the two computers could perceive time, she could brainwash Nicole fully right now, and only a second or two would pass. However, it might cause some odd reactions, so she might not want to go all the way now.
1252222112112.title: Nicole?

choices: Happy to assist Melissa- A new recruit!
Going to warn Sally and the others- You will be assimilated.
12522221121122.content: Within Nicole's Computer, a virtual avatar of Melissa formed, soon noticed by Nicole, who was naturally mystified by the nanomachines and the appearance of Melissa within her little corner of cyberspace. The two soon exchanged information, causing Nicole to become confused by Melissa's decision to willingly roboticize herself. Still, Melissa calmed her down, emphasizing how this was of her free will, and how Eggman was quite literally offering to put an end to the war. This was all too interesting to pass up- Not only would there be a chance for Nicole to be the same as her friends, they would gain a new appreciation for her and her existence. After all, Melissa could actually join Nicole on her turf, and they could enjoy things in the same way she could... But the fact that Eggman was responsible for such a transformation, even if it was still indirect to some degree, was something to be worried about... Melissa soon noticed a change of expression in Nicole's face, meaning that something was going to happen- Nicole was...
12522221121122.title: Wait, take it slow.

choices: Melissa wants to make sure Nicole will followher lead entirely.
125222211211221.content:
"I think we should give them a choice to upgrade or not." Nicole said. "It's only fair."

"Hmm, but it's for their own good... Still, we have time to debate later. If we freeze up for too long they might notice the awkward pause." Melissa said.

"Yes, indeed." She nodded, as the vixen returned to her own head.
125222211211221.title: Happy to assist Melissa- A new recruit!

choices: There was a familiar red fox sitting around.
The Egg Pawns had made a mess of her lab- She would need to clean up.
1252222112112211.content:
Melissa soon dispersed the crowd, saying that they still had things to do while she had to do some things in her lab. Amy and the more feminine girls of the group attempted to drag Melissa shopping, but she covered it, saying that she had bought outfits online as she went inside and shut the door, soon grinning. Finally, she'd be able to convince them to at least feel what it might be like... Nicole appeared in her HUD, questioning her.

"It has to be free will, Melissa... Otherwise what would make you different from Eggman as he's been in the past?"

Melissa sighed, explaining that while the transformation would be forced, they would have the option to remain as they were before- If they really wanted to be as limited as they were before, they could just turn off certain settings. Nicole soon shrugged, satisfied with the idea that they could make the upgrade as nothing if it really bothered them... Melissa soon looked around her lab with a suspicious look on her face... Inside her lab...
1252222112112211.title: The plan commences...

12522221121122111.content:
"Well, hello Tails..." Fiona smirked. "That's a new look for you... Not bad."

"Fiona? What are you doing here?" Melissa demanded.

"Hmm, well, I was in the area and decided to drop by and see you. 'Course, you're not here, and then your friends show up looking for you and I'm stuck in here." Fiona replied.

"Why did you want to see me?"

"What, a girl can't just drop in on a friend?"

"We're not friends, Fiona." She said. "Now, spill."
12522221121122111.title: There was a familiar red fox sitting around.

125222211211221111.content:
Fiona grumbled and groaned before reluctantly explaining. She had grown tired of a certain green hedgehog and his... antics, and she had grown rather homesick. Melissa sighed, tapping her foot. After all, this was the vixen that had broken her heart... And Eggman could use another servant... After all, trying to hide her would be suspicious... But something within her heart was begging to let her feel the pleasure of being an immortal nanite vixen... Not to mention her own plans would likely exile her much the same as Fiona was exiled... She quivered, balancing either option. It wasn't like the others would walk in and interrupt- She had locked her door, meaning the others wouldn't interrupt them. It was just the two Vixens... She gulped and made her move, consciously avoiding any mention of Eggman.

"Fiona... I have something to tell you- I'm not 100% organic anymore... I'm something else- A cloud of nanites, fused with my organic form... And I want to give you the chance. Before you call me a Badnik, I promise you can be as you were before, limitations and all. You just have to turn off certain settings. I promise this isn't going hurt."

Fiona...
125222211211221111.title: Fiona explains herself.

1252222112112211112.content:
Almost before she could finish her sentence, the elder vixen was making a dash for the window. Melissa sighed, using her nanites to lock them, and approached her slowly.

"Let me go!"

"I have no intention of harming you, FIona. I want you to be happy and safe... and this will ensure it."
1252222112112211112.title: Leapt back, horrified.

12522221121122111122.content:
Melissa prepared a cup of coffee for a freaked out Fiona as she was slowly invited to a couch- The two would have some bonding time, like a pair of ordinary women.

"Look, Fi... I'm willing to let go of the past. So let's just try again. I'm Melissa Prower. My friends call me Tails because of, well, my two tails."

Fiona gulped, but started talking, finding out that the two of them were starting to have quite a bit in common now that they were a pair of vixens- The amount of tranquilizers in the coffee ensured she wouldn't explode like that, but Melissa was smart enough to avoid outright making her susceptible to suggestion- That would make her no better than a tyrant, or what she thought Eggman was like before... As such, she started explaining the technical details of how the nanomachines worked in detail, which seemed to make Fiona a bit uncomfortable... But also a bit curious.

"Alright... Let's try it."

Melissa smiled as nanomachines infiltrated Fiona's body, elevating her. The two soon started thinking- Would Fiona be a secret, or would Fiona be reintroduced to the Freedom Fighters as an ally of Tails'...? Both had risks and rewards...
12522221121122111122.title: Melissa tries negotiating.

choices: Just call the others here and tell them up-front.
Set up some sort of clever scheme.
125222211211221111221.content:
"It's going to be tough to reintroduce you to the others." Melissa warned, holding her new friend in a gently hug.

"I know, but I want to do it anyway." Fiona replied. "I've... I've run away from things for too long, and I don't want to do it anymore.."

"Really?"

"My first instinct was to run away from you." She said. "But because I didn't, I became this..."

Fiona stepped back and waved her hands, the nanites in her body reshaping her black, revealing outfit into the cute yellow and white number she wore before. "Is this what Nicole feels like all the time? Because it's wonderful..."

"You know about Nicole? You left before she got her nanites..."

"Silly... I helped her take over the Nanite City when I was still a Freedom Fighter." Fiona smirked. "You think she was able to set up a hard-line between herself and there without the help of someone with hands?"

"Huh... come to think of it, I always assumed Rotor or Chuck did it..."

"And they probably thought that you did." The red vixen shrugged. "Nicole didn't mention it?"

"She's rather shy, and was even worse at dealing with social stuff then than she is now. SHe probably didn't want to bring you up so quickly after you... left." Melissa explained, matter of factly. "It might've caused a stir, or maybe even concerns about the trouble you could cause.

"Feh, nothing, without Scourge's approval,you mean?"

"We didn't exactly work out what the dynamic between you two was until you guys invaded with the SUppression Squad." Melissa replied. "Now, how should we go about reintroducing you to them?"
125222211211221111221.title: Renew an alliance?

1252222112112211112211.content:
Melissa formed a set mimicking Fiona's black outfit in something more her colors before placing her hands on her hips as she sighed. So far, some manner of honesty had been successful with both her friends, Nicole, and Fiona, so a lie would've just been a mess. As such, she sent messages explaining about "a rough subject", that someone that they thought was a friend wanted to come back in an attempt to redeem herself. It was obvious who Melissa was talking about, but ironically the one that she thought would have the most distaste for Fiona, Sally, was actually willing to accept her. Thankfully, Fiona had already showed off a change in outfit, meaning that there was an obvious change from her villainous persona, even if Melissa did have a preference for the black outfit, looking back... Still, it would make things all the more easier for the meeting. The two looked at each other while Nicole soon arrived as a cloud of nanites, forming into an organic-nanite hybrid. She breathed, taking in the sensations before looking at the both of them.

"I have a message from..."
1252222112112211112211.title: A healing meeting.

12522221121122111122111.content:
"Yeah, what is it?" Melissa asked.

"She would like the meeting to happen at the castle, where there is more room for us all, as well as food for everyone that needs it."

"This place is a little small." Fiona shrugged. "WHat do you think, Mels?"
12522221121122111122111.title: "Princess Sally."

125222211211221111221112.content: Melissa cheerfully smiled, agreeing with the idea of more room, and in addition, more hiding places. Yet there was more to do- Preparations, and alerting Doctor Eggman about the current situation. Soon enough, the trio split into the two vixens walking to the castle while Nicole returned to cyberspace, preparing appropriate hiding places as well as securing escape routes just in case things went sour. Soon enough, Melissa waited outside of the castle gates, where Antoine was speaking in his typical stuffy manner, on occasion glaring at Fiona, making the former traitor feel bad. After all, the sense of hate was drilling to her very core. Melissa was quick to pacify Antoine before risking blowing their cover by causing Fiona to flee as a cloud of nanomachines by instinct- There were benefits to that mean of transportation inside certain bases, but out in public was bound to cause trouble. Soon enough, Melissa walked inside with an arm around Fiona's arm, gently smiling before bumping into...
125222211211221111221112.title: Party time!

choices: The two friends have a happy reunion.
Bunnie realises that Fiona's body feels a little... metallic.
1252222112112211112211122.content:
"Hi Bunnie." Fiona said nervously, hoping that she wouldn't be as angry as her husband. To her surprise, the rabbit woman hugged her tightly, holding her like a long-lost sister.

"Welcome home, Fi."

"B-Bunnie?" She stammered, as the cyborg leaned back, smiling at her.
1252222112112211112211122.title: Bunnie Rabbot?

choices: Screamed, resulting in Nicole shutting the entrances to avoid alerts.
12522221121122111122111221.content:
Fiona gulped and nodded while Melissa gently whispered to Bunnie.

"I have something that can give you the best of both worlds- You get to keep your cybernetic strength, but you also get to experience permanent touch... Something truly perfect..."

Bunnie was utterly shocked, yet this was definitely something curious... Sure, this sounded like a bunch of lies and nonsense, but it was the literal genius among them. What could she do, but ask for more details. Yet before she could do anything, nanites infested her form, changing her appearance into 100% organic from a visual standpoint, yet she could feel strength running through all of her body even beyond what her artificial limbs could do. It was amazing, yet she was visibly shaken upon noticing an Eggman logo in her HUD. What would she do now that she was exposed to the truth as the flow of data enlightened her? Or would she be just as accepting of this as she was of Fiona...? After several moments of shocked silence, she ultimately...
12522221121122111122111221.title: A peaceful conversion.

choices: They go into the meeting together.

With the influence of the other three girls in her head, Bunnie remained calm, still hugging close to Fiona, who was now massaging her friend's body seductively.

"So, what's with ol' Eggbutt's logo?"

"He's dying, and he turned me into his replacement, but I intend to remake his Empire into a force for good and peace.The transformation is just the icing on the cake." She replied. "Still, you're going to want to assume your normal appearance for the meeting."

"Oh, of course." Bunnie nodded, her arm and legs shifting back into their metallic state.
125222211211221111221112211.title: Remained relatively calm about it.

1252222112112211112211122111.content: The three former organics giggled while Nicole was pleased with the successful conversion of someone who might also be close- After all, Bunnie had an intimate link with the mechanical, and now the two could understand each other far more faithfully. Soon enough, however, they had arrived, gently scanning the area just in case. As expected, there were a few guards stationed, but the majority of the security was left in Nicole's hands, meaning the quartet had command of the castle. Bunnie headed off, trying her best to keep from showing off her new body- After all, if she showed off an organic form, something was bound to happen- Like being called an imposter and being driven out, which could possibly make things worse- Although Eggman contacting her definitely made her mood a bit sour. She was quick to "yell" at him, only to be distracted by detection of nanites- People were coming in. She was quick to pass it off as merely hearing their footsteps as they gathered. Soon enough, Melissa gulped, before soon unveiling a definitely repentant Fiona. The others...
1252222112112211112211122111.title: They go into the meeting together.

12522221121122111122111221111.content:
While some of the team seemed less than pleased to see her, Antoine and Amy in particular, it looked like Sally had convinced them to not go on the attack the moment they saw the vixen.

"Um... Hi everyone.." She said, nervously. Melissa wrapped an arm around her shoulders, hugging her reassuringly. "Um, I want to apologize... for what I did..."
12522221121122111122111221111.title: Were accepting.

choices: Took Amy to a corner and explained about her nanotech.
Held back and offered an invitation later.
125222211211221111221112211111.content:
Fiona gulped, and explained her story, conveniently leaving out the parts that had happened involving Melissa being a biomech and infecting both her and Nicole- There were some things they didn't want to reveal just yet. Thankfully, they looked to be a bit more accepting the moment Fiona explained how Melissa was willing to start over- Fiona even admitted to having some interest in tech, although she didn't have the right talent for it until recently, winking at Melissa. Most assumed it was just a relationship, which suited the four biomechs just fine. After all, they would know the moment they were changed... As soon as Fiona finished, Sally stepped forward, embracing Fiona- It seemed that even the princess was willing to forgive Fiona, which seemed to pacify even Antoine and Amy, although Amy was quick to go to Melissa.

"You know, Tails, I gotta know what sort of machine you used if you've got a figure like that..."

Melissa was a bit flabbergasted- It was as if Amy was begging to join her... She...
125222211211221111221112211111.title: Fiona tells her story.

choices: Sally lets her rejoin (FOr however long it lasts).
Sally isn't sure, and wants her to prove herself first.
1252222112112211112211122111112.content:
"Er, the machine just gave me a natural body for my new sex, this is what I'd have looked like if I was born female." Melissa said. "I can maybe rig something up for you if you're that desperate."

"Really, it's natural?"

"Have you seen her mom?" Fiona asked, raising an eyebrow.

"Fi!"

"I'm just saying, sweetie." Fiona shrugged defensively.

"Well... yes, this is natural." Melissa said. It wasn't hard to brag about this, in all honesty.


"So, uh... am I a Freedom Fighter again?" Fiona asked hopefully.

"Do you want to be? I thought you'd be content to settle for a while after this."

"Well, I feel like I should make amends." Fiona replied.
1252222112112211112211122111112.title: Held back and offered an invitation later.

12522221121122111122111221111121.content: Sally was quick to let Fiona back in, while Fiona herself knelt down in front of her, outright crying. Melissa on the other hand made contact with Eggman, leaving a quick message that all of them were ingrained with the Freedom Fighters, meaning it was all the more easier to properly infect the lot of them. Soon enough, however, Nicole was getting... Testy- She wanted to enjoy the sensation of being organic. Rather hastily, Melissa left the room and ran home, panting as Nicole formed. Melissa was quick to run back, pulling Nicole inside behind a curtain before hastily unveiling the biotech Lynx, saying that it was something Nicole had asked, accidentally letting slip that Bunnie had the same tech in her haste. She gulped, fearing the potential suspicion- After all, it seemed to be strange that all of these things were coming up today... She gulped and shivered as Antoine walked up and...
12522221121122111122111221111121.title: Let back in.

choices: Sally asks if Melissa has told her family.
Rotor asks Melissa how she did this.
125222211211221111221112211111211.content: Melissa smiled, hugging her friend back, before he separated and embraced Bunnie. SHe decidedto leave the happy couple to it, and returned to Fiona's side, cuddling up with her new girlfriend, sitting with the others.
125222211211221111221112211111211.title: hugged her, nearly sobbing.

1252222112112211112211122111112112.content:
Melissa was quick to say that she... borrowed one of Eggman's new projects, saying that she removed the slave program while Bunnie and Antoine were enjoying the lupine woman's now-organic legs, talking about outfits they might wear now that she had a decent set of legs. Yet soon enough, Rotor was staring while Nicole showed off an entire show. Soon enough, Amy was tugging on Melissa's arm.

"Tails, you've at least got to let me and Rouge give you some tips!"

Melissa blinked- Sure, she could use some help being a woman, but... Rouge? Something was definitely up... Soon enough, however, Sonic walked over, chomping on a chili dog. The two looked at each other and crossed their arms, looking away. Melissa started thinking, offering to invite them to her workshop just to infect them- After all, they'd be able to understand each other all the more better... And it'd please Amy given she'd be able to have the kind of body she begged for... Yet Melissa wanted to infect Rouge as well... Which to choose? Amy and...
1252222112112211112211122111112112.title: Rotor asks Melissa how she did this.

choices: Amy is still holding a grudge...
12522221121122111122111221111121122.content:
Enabling Amy's obsession wasn't something on Melissa's priority list, and the idea of fashion tips sounded rather entertaining. Sure, she had to wear an Eggman uniform while she was in his presence, but once he was gone, she'd be more than willing to ditch it and try some different styles. Getting a head start on that would be a massive help.

"Alright, Amy. You can call Rouge, then."

"Great!" She beamed. Melissa noticed Fiona pouting a little and sent her a reassuring message.

'Rouge will become like us, but you'll always be better than her, remember that.'

'Okay... it's just... she grinds my gears, y'know?'

'I know.'

'Still... I think you should come.'

'Me?'

'I don't want to leave you alone, okay?'

'Okay.' Fiona smiled at her.

"Amy, is it okay if Fi joins us?"
12522221121122111122111221111121122.title: Rouge?

choices: Knew Melissa was a Biotech Gynoid.
125222211211221111221112211111211221.content:
Soon enough, the party was over while Amy was calling Rouge. It was a bit strange, but Melissa was starting think about something from the Chaos incident... That Amy wanted to do more than just chase Sonic... Hopefully, with Rouge along, they'd be able to convince her that maybe she didn't need Sonic in her life... Soon enough, the two vixens were in Tails' workshop, where Amy and Rouge were waiting. It was taking a little bit just to prepare a proper room for the four of them, before noticing Rouge staring at them from outside. It was bringing out fears that she knew right off the bat. After all, she was a government agent who had worked with Eggman before... Wouldn't it make sense that she had some technical knowledge at least from Eggman's files? She gulped before gaining some manner of courage- After all, if she was fearful all the time, she wouldn't be able to do anything... She walked to the door and gulped before opening it, welcoming her guests.

"Hey, guys! Welcome... I may not have much, but I'm a bit new to all this."

Rouge...
125222211211221111221112211111211221.title: Girls night in!

choices: Fiona wants to take care of herself and refuses the offer.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211.content:
"My, that's quite thebody." Rouge purred. "You look great, darling."

"Th-thanks!" Melissa blushed.

"Don't mention it." Rouge smirked. "So, we have two lovely ladies in need of a makeover..."

"Two?" Amy asked.

"Fiona needs one too." Rouge pointed to the red vixen, who frowned.

"Hey, I look fine!"

"Mmm, yes, for a mission, or the gym, but for casual wear?" Rouge mused. "Mm, I don't think so. Besides, it's a bit small on you now."

"I suppose..." Fiona admitted.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211.title: Complimented Melissa's body.

12522221121122111122111221111121122111.content:
Fiona agreed to the makeover while Melissa blushed and smiled, soon walking to a bed room covered in posters of scientists of various types, typically roboticists. Amy was quick to tease her about it, yet Melissa was shaking. Rouge soon noticed, asking Melissa if something was wrong. Soon enough, Melissa gulped.

"Well, I wanted to help Amy- She asked for some help with her body, likely to woo a certain someone that shall remain unnamed for the moment, but... Well, back when Chaos was raging, you said you wanted to show that certain someone that you were capable... Right?"

Amy nodded, before thinking. She did say she'd do that after dealing with her metallic stalker, but... She just went back to old habits... Now that Fiona was back, and Melissa was, well, a girl, it started making her think... They changed so much, and here she was, still the same old fan girl as usual... What could she do? Take the easy path and ask to for her outside to be changed, or change her inside first? It was... interesting.
12522221121122111122111221111121122111.title: A makeover for two or four?

125222211211221111221112211111211221112.content:
"I mean, I want the makeover, but I need to do it for me, not for him." Amy said.

"Good!" Melissa beamed. "So that's three of us getting new looks. Want to make it four, Rouge?"
125222211211221111221112211111211221112.title: Start getting over Sonic?

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Rouge shrugged, being a bit nonchalant about it as she replied in a manner that made Melissa rather happy- She'd be able to change two more, and it wouldn't require any real trickery! After all, in a sense, it was a makeover, wasn't it? Melissa ran off, preparing a pair of chambers linked to Nicole, making sure that it would be able to fool the two of them well enough. After some time, she ran back to the bedroom, where Fiona had brought out a set of makeup items- Lipstick, nail polish, the works. Melissa was a bit nervous- After all, she was out of her element, but she had to explain that she was prepping a different makeup device for Amy's sake. Amy was quick to clap while Rouge was curious to try it out, although Fiona soon asked something of Melissa.

"Want to join us? I mean, sure, you want to help Amy and Rouge here, but why not try a good old fashioned makeover? You'll feel good about it... I promise."

Melissa shivered. What would she do? Let them push her makeover first, or at least let Fiona try first?
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: "Eh, why not."

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
"Sure..." She said, as Fiona hugged her, beaming.

"Thank you!" She giggled.

"You're welcome, Fi..." Melissa blushed, returning the hug.

"Nervous? It's okay, I haven't done this before either." Fiona smiled. "Makeup was never my thing..."

"Say it ain't so!" Rouge smirked sarcastically. "So, I guess we'll give you two your new looks, and then you do us with your fancy gadget?"

"Yes, that's the plan." Fiona nodded. "Who do you want first?"
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Fiona first.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: Melissa shivered as Rouge and company started assisting in a makeover. It was a strange sensation, but it was rather nice. The rush of emotions as her friends engaged in conversation, the brushes and sensation of makeup being applied on her face and the rest of her body. It was all so new, yet it made her feel so good... She was starting to grow more and more comfortable with just what might happen- After all, her friends were being so casual for once... But it had to end- After all, Fiona had to have a turn, and arguably, she was just as masculine as Melissa had been before becoming a biotech gynoid, if not even moreso given how aggressive she had been. Yet by the time they were over, they were feminine flowers that would be the envy of most cities- Even Rouge was mumbling about how they had created a monster so to speak- A pair of women who were bound to steal away guys and more than a few women. The two vixens looked at each other and blushed, before asking Amy and Rouge if they wanted their makeovers now, or wanted to eat first.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: New ladies first?

choices: Rouge and Amy trust their friends.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
"I'm not that hungry." Rouge replied, earning a nod of approval from Amy.

"Alright then." Melissa smiled sweetly, holding Fiona's hand, "Follow us!"

They led the two organic girls to the lab, where the pods awaited, open to accept users immediately. They moved over to one of the pods each, and began to calibrate them for their hidden purpose.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Makeover?

choices: Let the flow of information explain?
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: The two tapped their feet while nanomachines started slowly infecting them. The effect was most obvious with Amy herself- Her body was slowly, yet in a way violently ripping itself into a manner that Amy thought she would only see in her dreams. Sure, it wasn't as exaggerated as in her dreams, but the sensations were just so different. The two started taking on forms that were bound to attract men of all shapes and sizes, yet they were paying most attention to just how different their senses were- While Melissa blushed at the joking edition of a Sonic sensor she had added for a moment, but soon took it off in exchange for something far more subtle- Melissa was all too aware of just how poor her eye sight could be. On the other hand, Rouge was marveling at all the various manners of detecting objects ranging from cameras, security lasers, and other things that would normally be out of sight- Normally she'd have to wear a lens for all of that! But there was still the Eggman logo... They considered asking vocally or just let it slide given the stream of information.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: The changes begin.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: The two became aware of where their friend's change had come from, and the circumstances behind it.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Let the flow of information explain?

choices: Invisibility by way of shifting lights.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: As the stream of information explained what Melissa was thinking, and just how they could essentially go back to what they were- With all their faults and foibles with a simple change in settings. They headed out and embraced Melissa, thankful for the kind of care she was admitting, not to mention the fact that she was being eager to give Nicole a chance to be like them. It was definitely different, but given she was helping them in some manner, whether it be in work in the case of Rouge, or getting over Sonic in the case of Amy. Soon enough, Amy was speeding around, enjoying her newfound endurance while Melissa sighed. It seemed that, given she was chasing Sonic for years, she could approach his speeds as she recalled from the Neo Metal Sonic incident, but the problem was that she could never keep up for long, hence why she usually utilized her hammer for high speed acrobatics as opposed to what Sonic could properly do in the air. Rouge on the other hand seemed to be testing out something different-
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: They're okay with that.

THe bat had managed to make herself completely invisible, and she capitalised on this by immediately groping Fiona. After a yelp and a futile attempt to slap her away, the bat reappeared, smirking.

"Please don't do that!" Fiona whined.

Melissa, meanwhile, had her attention entirely on wat her next move should be.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Invisibility by way of shifting lights.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Melissa sighed and smiled at how much everyone was enjoying their new bodies... But if she were to try mass conversion, she was bound to cause a mass panic given the stream of information would obviously slow. As such, she continued on her thought of slow conversion, even if Fiona was still getting spooked by Rouge. Soon enough, she was starting to consider changing one of the boys for once. As such, she was left with two options- Would she try out of the castle, where there were bound to be less witnesses to make a fuss, or would she try the castle, where Nicole held reign? Nicole herself was weighing the options, even considering the idea of inviting Bunnie to infect her husband. After all, she was bound to be alone with him at some point, right? Millie sighed.

"We can leave that up to her. Besides, she's appreciating her newfound organic arms well enough... To be honest, even if I didn't want to spread this, I'd at least want to give it to her if it meant that she could have the best of both worlds... Back to business... I think..."
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Continue to slowly convert everyone.

choices: "I'll do it when we go for a run together."

"Um, won't Sonic turning into a girl be a bit of a red flag?" Fiona asked, huddling up to Melissa, hoping it would keep Rouge's teasing away from her.

"We can spin it any way we like. Even something as simple as him feeling the urge after seeing me." The former Tails explained, hugging her.

"How do you plan on getting him?" Rouge asked.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: "Outside the castle."

Instead, she merely decided to let the pink hedgehog relax. After all, what else could she deserve after ages spent chasing after a hedgehog who was far more of a daredevil speed freak than a healthy individual? Rouge on the other hand was gone, while Melissa sighed. "Top shelf are the jewels you can take! The others are meant for my equipment! Try not to get things confused!" It seemed that, even as a biotech gynoid, Rouge was still the same jewel thief, which was starting to make her wonder just how many jewels GUN was paying her if she was willing to keep working with GUN during the ARK incident... Regardless, she stretched and told Sammie she'd be heading out as she left the house, going at speeds that could keep up with Sonic. To be honest, part of her missed the sensation of the wind in her face, and the sight of the land rushing past her as she noticed...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Melissa goes chasing.

choices: Sonic slows down and lets her catch up.
Sonic thinks it's a race and keeps up his head-start.

The two went racing throughout the various zones around the area, faster than even when they were speeding through the first time- After all, there weren't any badniks to get in the way, although in some cases, they had to take some imaginative ways of getting through thanks to some previous destruction. It had definitely been a while- After all, as of late, Sonic had been doing his adventures on his own or in at least one case with himself... It had been a while since she had gone running alongside Sonic, navigating the landscape just to enjoy the sense of speed. Yet Melissa still had the advantage of flight, allowing her to take unseen shortcuts just with quick spurts. Sure, she didn't have the boosts Sonic was capable of, but she still had some expertise. Looking back, the last time she had gone through these zones was the Chaos incident. It was an interesting time, yet all good things had to come to an end- The winner was...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: A Not-so-Final Chase

choices: Melissa wants to infect Sonic first
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Melissa was quick, and she could take short-cuts, but she wasn't able to outrun her friend, and he knew the routes much better than she did. Sonic ultimately took the victory, screeching to a halt as she caught up at last. For what it was worth, he was out of breath, and she wasn't, and she considered that some form of consolation.

"Huh, new look, Tai- uh, Melissa?" He asked.

"It's fine, you can still call me Tails." She smiled. "It's a nickname. Miles is the name that I don't use anymore."

"Ah, okay." Sonic nodded.

"And yes, Amy and Rouge did a good job, don't you think? I'm going to Bunnie for some hair-care at some point, but this is good for now." Melissa smiled softly, twirling on her heels.

"I didn't think you'd go for the "cutesy" style, Tails." Sonic smirked.

"Oh, you should see Fiona. She makes Cream look manly." Melissa giggled. Sonic joined in the laughter, trying to imagine how much fun Amy Rouge must've had working on the fiery vixen.

"I bet she was thrilled with that."

"Huh. Never would've picked her as the sort." Sonic shrugged."So, wanna race back?"
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Sonic!

As the nanites interfaced with his body, his senses of touch were overwhelmed by something akin to being on a pillow that encompassed his entire body, without the sense of claustrophobia, lack of breathing, or lack of sight that usually accompanied it. Soon enough, his body was starting to gently warp into a far more feminine form, while Melissa gulped- It was starting to match her own in a way that was making her blush. However, she was thinking of something else- How would she react to becoming something else? After all, Sonic was known for being fast, and that included often not thinking before the blue hedgehog ran off. She gulped, thinking about just how wrong things might go before the hedgehog got the full explanation from the usual stream of data from everyone else. She shivered as Sonic moaned in a manner that betrayed her new gender before...

Yet Sonic started thinking for a different reason. Melissa waved her hand in front of Sonic's eyes before Amy ran up, tapping her foot.

"Oh, you changed Sonic. That would explain a lot... To be honest, I'm falling back in a bit, but... At the very least it'll be a healthier relationship, right? Because I don't have to worry about interrupted conversations... For the record, no dates. I already know how those tend to go all too much."

Sonic blushed, apologizing by explaining that she never really did mature- She always wanted a thrill. After all, she fought Eggman for so many years despite at times coming to quote on quote easy solutions while Melissa sighed and smiled. "To be honest, it's a bit fun taking care of him at times, even if he does have a place to stay." Sonic mentioned something about...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Not yet...

"I want a new name!" She said.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Changing the name she goes with.

choices: Amy, looking a bit annoyed at Sophia's presence.

Sophia shrugged.

"Well, I'll still answer to it, but I feel... Different, you know? Like I wanna be a bit... Different. I'll still help people, sure, but I feel like... Slowing down a bit. Smelling the flowers and all that, you know?"

But then it became a game. Thankfully, Eggman himself seemed to take a similar mentality as time went on. The two girls walked back while Sophia started looking at her new body, before looking at Melissa, asking why the Egghead didn't tell her he was dying- After all, she enjoyed the bouts she'd had with him. Melissa merely shrugged, unsure of why Eggman wouldn't bring up the subject. As soon as the two got back to their workshop, Sophia soon got on the couch, napping while Melissa sighed, mumbling about how some things never change before noticing someone at her doorway. It was...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: "Sonic's not a girl's name."

choices: Fiona takes the chance to infect Sally.
Fiona remembers that Melissa isn't sure about doing that yet.

"Melissa, is that Sonic?" THe Princess asked, looking at Sophia.

"She prefers Sophia now, but yes." Melissa nodded. "I noticed that my new body has dramatically increased my physical attributes, after I was able to almost outrun Sonic, with him having a head-start and me wearing heels. He wanted to try it himself, and that's the result."

"Oh, Sonic... always focusing on speed..." Sally looked at her on-off love wistfully.

"You'll be pleased to know, then, that she's much more passive now. I'm chalking it up to a distinct lack of testosterone in her body. She mentioned that you would be alright with it, and alluded to a relationship between the pair of you and Nicole."

"Y-yes... Um..." Sally blushed heavily. "Please don't tell my father. He's antsy enough about me being with Sonic. If he knew his "darling daughter" was bisexual and in a threesome a computer program he'd probably lock me in a tower and marry me off to some prince."

"Ugh, that guy." Fiona groaned, walking down the steps. "I hate him."

Sally raised her eyebrows at the red vixen's pastel-coloured dress, heels, and multitude of bows.

"Fiona, what happened to you?"

"Amy and Rouge happened, but... I kinda like it?" She blushed. "I think... I think cute suits me better than sexy."

"I'm inclined to agree." Sally smiled, giving her a one-armed hug.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: A confused Sally.
