Fiona smiled while Sophia blushed and stepped forward.

"... Sally... I know I've been... Well, rude over the years, and I haven't been able to actively explain it... I've always been a speed freak... Never wanted to be tied down... And I think it's going to get me into trouble if I keep... Well, you know, being so inattentive... I've never been really understanding... And I mean actually understanding someone... I'd always go off... I mean, my heart's always in the right place, but I always seem to ignore people, even when they have something important to say... And now... I... I'm sorry..."

Sally was absolutely shocked by how candid Sophia was being- As if she was more than just Sonic genderbent... She was rather curious about what was going on... Before turning to Melissa.

"Tails... I... I want to know what happened... This is... Completely different than just a lack of testosterone... It's like she has a way of... Looking into other people's minds or something like that..."

Melissa was absolutely flummoxed before...

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Leave it for now.

Sophia and Nicole looked determined, and as such, the others sighed and nodded- The plan was a-go. They entered the room and started waiting for Sally, who shuffled in and blushed. Melissa sighed and smiled.

"Well... I guess this is where I explain... But then again, you'll find out soon enough..."

Sally was confused before both Sophia and Nicole started making out with her- The sensation was utter ecstasy. It was something she had never felt before, especially in a kiss. It was almost like a lightning strike mixed with the sensation of a certain set of gems filling her body. Her mind was expanding before noticing a stream of consciousness within her mind- Or was it her mind entering others? Whichever it was, she didn't want it to stop, and as such, she held onto both Sophia and Nicole. After some time, the trio were outright blushing, even as Amy sighed.

"Sophia... You don't mind if I take a vacation once all of our friends... Well, you know, are a part of all this, right?"

Sophia was...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: A Kiss for Eternity

She's too enamoured with her girlfriends to notice.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Content with Amy's decision.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Sally blinked- There was a plan? It seemed as though Melissa was just making up her strategy as she went along. Soon enough, she voiced her concern, to which Sophia blushed.

"Sorry about that... Melissa was always the one with a plan, so I just thought she had bits and pieces of it in advance, you know?"

Melissa sighed and smiled. At the very least, the girls could be girls. It almost made her think that she should've transitioned years in advance. But then again, she never thought she'd be, in a way, willingly roboticizing her friends. The girls soon started talking to each other, and it was just amazing to understand each other regardless of subject- Whether it was about boys, jewels, clothes, or even machines and the inner workings of cyberspace, the group of women were understanding each bit of it, and even getting individual jokes, when they would've normally made awkward coughs before they were machines... But as the party ended, Melissa started thinking. Now that Sally was a biotech gynoid, would they increase their efforts, or remain as stealthy as they've been before?
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Plan? There was a plan?

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
"So, how do you want to go about spreading our gift further?" Sally asked. Goal-oriented and eager to work as ever, it seemed.

"We've been generally working on one subject at a time." Fiona replied. "It's easier to get the necessary info across without freaking them out if there's only one target."

"As for how to spread it, that's a tricky one. I can't go public with it until Eggman dies. Under no circumstances can we let them know that it's Eggman's creation, or the public'll assume it's a roboticizer and we're all brainwashed. Instead, when he dies, I will make it publically known that I'm taking over his holdings to supplement my own creation. Then I shall publically present the results of my labours."

"That sounds good to me." Sally nodded. "What about the others?"

"I think we should stop converting our friends for now. It will look suspicious if all of us are already biotechs when the reveal is made. We're pushing it as-is."

"So what, we wait?" Sophia asked.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Stay quiet?

Melissa grinned.

"Well, remember when I infested our friends before I infected Nicole? I can use them to slowly... Influence them- Well, initially it was meant for mass-conversion just in case, but looking back, it's just a means to keep an eye on our friends. Although to be honest, I'm a bit curious, Fiona... Did you have any plans before you came here? Like some sort of revenge against him initially?"

Fiona sighed. Looking back... Maybe she was at some point, but she was just too happy with her new life- Back in the Freedom Fighters, made up with Sally who was a lot more friendly than before, and then there was the fact that she had friends. Honest-to-goodness friends. And even the old twerp had become such a lovely beauty... And one of her best friends. Even the fact that she had been made Eggman's successor was something she could get past given they weren't planning on carrying on his reign of murder... But thinking of Eggman, he was bound to make a fuss...

"Should we contact Egghead or not?"
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Chekov, your gun.

choices: Melissa wants to report in at least.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: "Nah, we can call in when we're done." Fiona shrugged, leaning on her lover. "I just want to spend time with you."
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: "Nah..."

choices: Eggman was in the middle of something...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Melissa soon explained that it would be a quick report, to which Fiona relented. Soon enough, Eggman was contacted, and he was decidedly rambunctious, begging for some kind of explanation. Melissa sighed and explained, putting on a cold persona.

"Sonic the Hedgehog, Amy Rose, Fiona Fox, Rouge the Bat, Nicole the Holo-Lynx, Bunnie Rabbot, and Sally Acorn have been captured and converted into loyal subjects of the Eggman Empire. Requesting time to lay low."

Eggman was confused... But pleased with the explanation, accepting the request, mumbling some sort of tactical justification. As the communications closed, Fiona Fox was a bit surprised by how cold Melissa was. But then again, she had several personas running loose in her head... Including memories of Fiona's old vicious persona, meaning that she could properly put on a façade. Soon enough, the group embraced each other, just happy to have some time off with the "blessings" of Eggman. After all, if Eggman attacked, that might risk something... Right?
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Just in case.

"Eggman isn't going to like it, but he can't risk attacking us." Melissa smiled, wrapping her arms around Fiona as the two of them lay back together.

"What happens when theplan is complete?" Fiona asked. "WHat if he's still not dead yet?"

"We'll cross that bridge when we come to it." Melissa replied, kissing her cheek.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: They can relax!

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: Fiona trembled. Eggman was one of the worst beings in existence to her- The only reason she agreed to essentially working for Eggman was Melissa and company, nothing to do with him. She was utterly horrified of what might happen if Eggman got serious... They'd lose their individuality... They'd become the monsters they were expecting to be called. Or worse, they'd become a mindless fog of roboticization... She hugged Melissa tight while the others slowly started to understand thanks to their hive-mind. Soon enough, they were all hugging each other before Sophia realized something- Nobody else was aware of what had happened to her outside of her little group, meaning the likes of Shadow, Knuckles, and others would be very surprised. Given the last time, what would they do to properly justify the fact that one of the most famous figures in the world, yet often irritatingly misidentified, was now decidedly female? Would they justify it by some sort of accident given what Amy and Rouge could say, or would she give an excuse similar to Melissa's...?
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Her past... and her future.

choices: She searches for a way to alay Fiona's worries.
She agrees that she's worried about Eggman...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
"I'll go with the accident story. I fell into the machine that Tails used to become Mels, and this happened." She decided.

"Works for me." Sally agreed.

"Indeed." Melissa nodded, half-paying attention. She was more focused on her ove's concerns.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Accident?

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Melissa sighed and nuzzled Fiona while Sophia soon realized what was going on. Her expression soon looked to reflect despair...

"Oh... Oh, Fi... What do we do...?"

The group started considering what to do... They definitely wouldn't consider murder- They weren't willing to fall that low... Instead, they started considering doing something involving a particular masked AI- Phage. It would be easy to lure her, but would she be converted in some matter into a biotech... Entity? After all, it would be nice to have another ally on their side, and they technically wouldn't be, say, infecting one of their friends... And it would be some sort of new redemption. Yet Phage would obviously become noticed by Eggman- If she wasn't present, she'd be noticed almost immediately... Would they change her, or would they leave her as is inside of Cyberspace now that Nicole had a means of escaping just in case Phage had somehow managed to end up Overclocked... The group continued to ponder until arriving at a decision.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: How to help Fiona?

choices: Nicole absolutely refuses to try and fight her again.
Nicole is more confident with her allies on her side.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
Phage would be the first key to defanging any chance Eggman had of corrupting them. Removing his sentient virus would give them a much better chance at resisting if he survived.

"Nicole, we need to locate Phage and convert her." Melissa announced.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Convert Phage?

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: Nicole was nervous, but as she looked at her friends... She felt better. She was the same as them, and they were the same as her. So they could overwhelm the virus... But then Melissa had an idea- She had been made Eggman's successor. It would mean that she had authority over Phage, right? Fiona soon had an idea, though- Phage might be sort of a backup system, or at least a means of keeping an eye on the group, meaning that summoning her would be Eggman's alarm system... Melissa started scanning for where Phage was. So far, she was off searching for information... And it was that hunger for information that they would use to lure Phage to their side- After all, the sensations of being in the real world... Along with all that was within the real world, it would be tantalizing to the degree that she was bound to at least consider the deal... Nicole was quick to agree, but Rouge and Amy agreed to be a sort of backup just in case something that might happen... Melissa looked at the others, then summoned Phage within their own slice of cyberspace...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Together!

choices: Melissa goes straight for the infection.
Melissa plays it safe for now.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content: "Empress Melissa Robotnik. What brings you here?" The sentient virus asked, looking down at the group.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Phage is obedient.

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
The group almost immediately integrated their nanomachines into Phage, soon allowing the sentient computer virus to gain a foothold in the real world. Soon enough, Melissa was thinking of nicknaming Phage after a character from a fighting game just because of its behavior in reality- The only solid part was a fairly expressive mask that on occasion formed a mouth that drooled the rest of the substance of its body- Constantly pulsating goo that made the organic among them decidedly uncomfortable... But Phage soon responded.

"I like what I like, and this is the form that is most comfortable for me. It's me."

Nicole shrugged, given that she had little room to complain. Heck, the only reason she had chosen an organic form was because of her friends... But soon enough, they had to get over their concerns with just what Phage was, and that had to be done with not their standard means of communication, but a good old fashioned conversation, and they decided to go with the obvious...

"How do you like being in the real world?"
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Well, that was quick.

choices: ... they went back to relaxing and waiting for Eggman to die.
... she began trying to make them stick to Eggman's orders entirely.
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
"I miss the power of the digital plane, but this is not bad." Phage replied, sounding less than impressed.

With Phage now at their side...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: "It's okay..."

1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.content:
As the group started relaxing, Nicole gulped and gently explained just what Phage was now.

"Technically, you still retain the power of the digital plane- You just have an avatar in this world capable of taking in unique more than just simple computer data. You can see things that result from a lack of digital speed, smell things, taste things, feel things... I know it's not that impressive, but try to give it a chance, you know?"

Phage sighed and nodded. At the very least, she'd be able to keep an eye on the lot of them for the sake of Master Robotnik, and while they weren't actively conquering, they weren't doing anything to jeopardize her master's plans. As such, she would try... Enjoying herself. But now Melissa and the others had to explain just what happened about Phage... Would they explain that it was some experimenting Nicole herself had done, or would they justify it as some hacking and experimenting Melissa had done for the time being...? It was just a lot that was going on...
1252222112112211112211122111112112211121.title: Time to introduce Phage.

choices: Took a deep breath, believing in her friend.
Scratched at the walls, desperate to get out.
12522221121122111122111222.content:
Bunnie was quick to jump back with a look of shock and terror on her face, clearly expecting something to happen... Only for Fiona to start sobbing.

"F-Fi... Wh-wha' are ya...?"

Fiona kept sobbing while Nicole was quick to seal off the room. Yet there was some abject terror within both Melissa and Fiona's hearts... They were being rejected by their friends. While Fiona definitely didn't want to run again, Nicole was quick to point out that the Freedom Fighters would attempt to kill them in some manner... Melissa sighed while Nicole revealed herself to Bunny, showing off her semi-organic form while Bunny herself fell to the ground, obviously shocked. Melissa folded her arms before mumbling to herself- She may as well spill the beans.

"Eggman is getting old. So he wanted to make me his successor. His mechs ended up turning me into a vixen by accident, but I agreed to inheriting his empire just to mold it into something to defend the planet- Not take over the world. As for the mechanical part... Well, the three of us are a mix of nanomachines and organics. This is all of our free will, as weird as it sounds."

Bunnie...
12522221121122111122111222.title: Discovery!

choices: Bunnie decides to let herself be changed now.
Bunnie decides to help them meet the FF as-is.
125222211211221111221112221.content:
"That certainly sounds like him..." Bunnie said. "But why the secrecy, Tails?"

"You would have had Nicole try to turn me back immediately... but I like being like this..." She said. "I've always had an affinity for tech, and now, I'm one with it."

"Not a feelin' I can get behind, I'm afraid." The cyborg said. "And Fi, I'm sorry I upset you. I was just shocked at the feel, is all."

"It's okay!" Fiona said, jumping into the rabbit's arms, hugging her tightly.

"So, what are you three plannin'?"

"I need to convince Eggman that he's making the correct investment with me, that I will get results. He does not know my intentions for his empire. I also want to give everyone the chance to experience life as we do, as biomechs. I think those two goals line up."

"Oh, I get it. You're going to let people try out those biomech bodies and convince Eggbutt that you're turning everyone into slaves of the Empire, when really, you'll turn anyone that doesn't like it back the moment he snuffs it?"

"Yes, something like that."
125222211211221111221112221.title: Took a deep breath, believing in her friend.

1252222112112211112211122212.content:
Nicole unlocked the doors while the Freedom Fighters swarmed in, looking worried. Bunnie was quick to pacify and, much to Melissa's slight displeasure, explain about Melissa and her situation. It was a definite shock, and it caused Melissa to grow pale. Now, she might be rejected... She'd have no place to go now beyond Eggman... The name Tails might end up being synonymous with the very idea of a traitor. And as such, she fell to her knees, sobbing as tears flowed almost violently.

"I... I'm a freak now just because I like what I am... Just because I was curious and had some kind of hope that I could get rid of one of the biggest threats to the planet without murder... He's caused so much trouble for the world... The only major world crisis that he didn't cause was an alien invasion... But he's still a person... And all I wanted to do was try and find a happy ending... I can't even like an evolution to the initial purpose of roboticization in the first place... No slave protocol... No being stuck in a metal shell... And it's still bad...?!"

Melissa soon saw...
1252222112112211112211122212.title: Bunnie decides to help them meet the FF as-is.

choices: Nicole tells Sally that Melissa is fine.
Sally wants to do the test anyway.
12522221121122111122111222121.content:
She sprang to her feet, hugging Sonic and Sally tightly.

"What Eggman did to you doesn't make you a monster, Tails." Sonic said. "You're our friend, and we'll always stand by you."

"I understand where you're coming from with the whole "free will" thing, Melissa, but I do still have my concerns." Sally said. "I just want to let Nicole take a look at you to ensure that you really are free and Eggman hasn't just programmed you cleverly."

"It's okay, I understand." Melissa smiled, knowing inside that the lynx was already on her side, and would give her a clean bill of health automatically.
12522221121122111122111222121.title: Hands extended in kindness.

125222211211221111221112221212.content: Sally sighed, begging for an honest test while Melissa agreed, scared that Eggman might have subtly implemented a mind control-patch of some kind. Yet when Nicole performed a scan, things were far safer than thought. Soon enough, Melissa was sitting in a chair, sighing while the others started talking to each other about her situation, as well as just what kind of a boon Melissa's new body was in the war, as well as what Nicole had been told- Melissa had intended to spread the condition, but it could be pretty much nullified by changing certain settings- It could be a life changing experience, or it could mean literally nothing. Nicole was still taking in the sensations of being in the physical world with some kind of vaguely organic body, to the point of becoming a bit of an eager taster- She wanted to take in just what kind of sensations were available, although she needed a bit of restraint. Soon the topic of Melissa's plan came up, and what they were going to say to it... Melissa shivered as they made their decision. They said...
125222211211221111221112221212.title: Sally wants to do the test anyway.

choices: Melissa gets excited and turns them all.
1252222112112211112211122212121.content: "I think a few of us can try it out." Sally said,smiling. "Not everyone, mind, but some."
1252222112112211112211122212121.title: Yes, we'll be infected.

12522221121122111122111222121212.content:
Melissa blushed and smiled, soon explaining as she infected various members of the Freedom Fighters.

"From a technical standpoint, it's not so much becoming a badnik or mechanical as it is becoming about a 50/50 mix of organic cells and nanomachines. Well, sort of. Your body's cells become sort organic nanomachines, meaning you have control over your cells. The mechanical parts are just the software giving you access to each of them. Basically you're a cloud that can take different forms. I'd compare it to Cutie Honey, but I don't think anyone aside from anyone connected to the internet would have an idea of what that is... Anyway, this also means I can technically mimic anyone down to a T."

Melissa was quick to show off, mimicking each and every one of the Freedom Fighters before changing back with a giggle.

"I can also mimic machines, although that's just because I'm still a gearhead- Some things never change. Anyway, the transformations and new tech can be turned off in your settings, meaning you can return to normal on your own."

The others were...
12522221121122111122111222121212.title: Melissa keeps her cool.

choices: She decides to try and work things out with Fiona and Nicole.
125222211211221111221112221212121.content:
"I think I'll stick mostly to base form." Rotor said. "There's no need for the extra stuff right now."

"Of course, this is a trial run." Melissa said, smiling. "If you don't like it, I'll turn you all back."

It occurred to the vixen that, for her converts, perhaps the infatuation with their new bodies was more of a personal thing. She'd always been interested in technology, personally, and being partially mechanical fascinated her. Fiona was a willing accomplice to her because she was desperately in need of love, and Melissa had provided that. She also knew from personal experience that when Fiona fell in love, she fell hard, and would often forget her own morals and standards in her infatuation. Nicole, meanwhile, had taken a step closer to being organic, her life-long dream.

The thought gave her pause, worrying her a little. The last thing she wanted was to force something on her friends, and become just like Eggman, and she began to wonder whether she was actually helping, or if she had merely taken advantage of Fiona and Nicole's personal desires and vices to make them loyal to her. That was the last thing she'd wanted... If she had done that, she'd be no better than Scourge, or Regina, or Eggman himself.
125222211211221111221112221212121.title: Enthusiastic!

choices: Were ecstatic with just what they could do.
Politely asked to be changed back.
1252222112112211112211122212121212.content:
Melissa sighed and walked over to both Fiona and Nicole.

"... I... Guys... I forced this on you... I'm..."

The two instead merely embraced Melissa, smiling. They assured her that they chose it of their free will, and they were happy to do it. After all, Melissa had chosen becoming a Biotech being of her own will to boot- She had chosen the process herself. As such, her heart was still there unlike some of the others. Besides, she had no intention of forcing a lack of free will like some of the others... After all, the others she had compared herself to all had a 100% no free will policy. She on the other hand was completely fine with the idea of the others running off. Even looking back, she only wanted to do it to her friends as opposed to doing it to literally everyone- She didn't actually want to change all organic life like some kind of bad parody of the Borg or something... She embraced Fiona and Nicole, thankful for the reassurance that she wasn't a monster of some kind. In the meantime, the others...
1252222112112211112211122212121212.title: Reassuring.

choices: Miles, having undergone the same treatment as Melissa?!
12522221121122111122112.content:
Nicole was quick to relay that Eggman was demanding that the trio return to base for some reason. With a sigh, the three of them headed to Eggman's base, where something rather strange was happening- Eggman was being surrounded by his own machines, who had a distinctly lemon yellow glow in their eyes. Yet the three of them decided to refrain from freeing Eggman, drawing the ire of the forces present. Instead, they spread their nanomachines in order to at least pacify them as they removed Eggman's gag. He spit out, before panting.

"M-Melissa... while you were out, an intruder entered and quite literally reprogrammed all of my mechs- From the lowerst Buzz Bomber to even Mecha Sonic, none where spared... Worse, the older machines have been retrofitted with new parts..."

Melissa sighed, obviously concerned. Yet soon enough, she detected a particular variation on the Eggman logo that looked warped. Soon enough, the culprits revealed themselves- It was a pair from a different dimension: Eggman Nega and...
12522221121122111122112.title: "Doctor Eggman."

choices: The biomechs start feeling the urge to obey Eggman Nega.
125222211211221111221121.content:
Nega sat in his pod, laughing darkly at the girls, holding a control device of some sort in his hands, as his own slave jumped down before them, clad in a copy of her captor's outfit. Her face had no emotion, even less than usual anyway, as she stared at them, fire igniting around her hands.

"I thought you two were allies." Melissa said.

"With my death looming, Nega seems to want to fill the void." Eggman replied. "When I told him that I would be using you instead, he wasn't pleased."

"Of course..."
125222211211221111221121.title: A mind-controlled Blaze?!

1252222112112211112211212.content:
The girls were quick to infest Blaze with nanites, merely to eliminate the mind control while Nicole started hacking into Nega's control device, clearing through the firewalls. Yet there were problems of a different sort as the Badniks started attacking. Even with what the Biomechs had, they weren't exactly fueled by Super Emeralds. Eggman himself ended up with a different problem- His machines were attacking him with force normally reserved for Sonic and company. As such, he left, causing Melissa to make an eternal remark.

"How does a man that fat run so fast?!"

Yet just as Melissa remarked upon it, Eggman received a grievous injury. With his age, it was obvious that the man wouldn't exactly survive for too long. Nicole finished hacking into the device while Nega retreated. Blaze gripped her head, confused as to just what was going on while Melissa was faced with an utterly agonizing decision- Would she let this man pass, thus bringing an end to conquest... Or would she do something else to save his life...? Soon enough, she had noticed a sparking roboticizer- Something was definitely wrong, but it was the closest means of saving his life...
1252222112112211112211212.title: Blaze infected!

choices: The fight is still going on around them.
12522221121122111122112122.content:
"This is what you wanted, isn't it?" Fiona asked her, holding her hand.

"Yes... but... it's different when you have to watch it." She murmured.
12522221121122111122112122.title: Let it end.

125222211211221111221121222.content: Melissa sighed while the girls did their best to at least make Eggman's end a comfortable and painless one- It was the least she could do after Eggman gave her such a wonderful biotech body. As Blaze started asking what was going on, Fiona answered, explaining while Melissa faced a decision that was one of the bigger ones in her life... Eggman was dead. The war was over. The roboticization could come to an end... Yet the feeling of being a biotech gynoid was just absolutely incredible. Now she had to choose between two possibilities... The first was simple- Stay with the current plan of slowly infiltrating the Freedom Fighters, taking advantage of the newfound peace... After all, she could just say that now that Eggman was dead, Fiona started reflecting on her life, and started regretting what she did. The second was bound to cause some divisions- Carrying on the war. Turning her friends into biotech gynoids by force- At the very least, she could draw out her friends easier, and she would be able to explain much quicker...
125222211211221111221121222.title: They've won.

choices: She stays focused on her plan.
She immediately tries to demilitarize the Empire.
1252222112112211112211212221.content:
"We stay the course." She said to her allies. "While I long to bring my gifts to our friends, we can't start using Eggman's tactics. Infiltration will do."

"Yes, Empress!" Fiona beamed, saluting her, causing the biotech vixen to pause. She was the ruler of the Empire now, after all...
1252222112112211112211212221.title: Peace?

choices: Commanded that the others attack Melissa and Fiona.
Started sobbing, feeling horrible for her behavior earlier.
12522221121122111122112122212.content: Soon, Melissa was quick to hack into the entire Eggman Army, freeing Roboticized creatures and disarming combat mechs, even to the degree of stolen GUN technology to said organization, all to give a clear message- The war was over. Soon enough, Sonic and the others were coming, curious to know just what was going on. The moment they saw Melissa and company interfacing with the computers, they looked absolutely freaked out- What happened to her friend?! Soon enough, they were tugging at her body while Melissa was stunned. She had been discovered, and in Eggman's base no less. That wasn't even getting into the fact that Fiona was working with her. Sally looked betrayed- Melissa was a machine of some sort, working with Fiona in Eggman's base. She was quick to shout, calling out Eggman... Before Melissa looked down, sighing as she played security footage revealing the truth- From Melissa becoming a woman, to Eggman's demise. It was an utter shock as the group nearly fell with their jaws on the ground. Sally, after some time...
12522221121122111122112122212.title: She immediately tries to demilitarize the Empire.

choices: Sally volunteers the FF to aid her.
Melissa infects Sally during their embrace.
125222211211221111221121222122.content:
"I'm so sorry!" Sally gasped, hugging her friend. Melissa smiled and returned the hug, comforting her.

"It's alright. I decided to make the best of what Eggman did to me and turn his Empire into a force for good." She said. "It's not been easy, I don't have many fans within his ranks. Reprogramming his robots is easy enough, and I have support from love and Cassia, and Nephthys, but most of the others are less than pleased. I think Abyss went off to be a pirate again, I've had a ton of angry phone calls from Thunderbolt about perverting Eggman's legacy, and Maw has been kinda creeping me out. I doubt Kukku is ever going to respect me, so he's out... I need your help, Sally."
125222211211221111221121222122.title: Started sobbing, feeling horrible for her behav...

choices: Omega, upset at not destroying Eggman!
Metal Sonic 3.0, out for Nega's revenge!
1252222112112211112211212221221.content: Sally was pleased to enlist the others while Melissa sighed- She was eager to make Eggman's empire a force for peace, to be sure, but she did want to at least give a chance for her friends to experience being a biotech gynoid. She sighed while Fiona took some time to get back into the Freedom Fighters- After all, looking back and looking at what footage was available objectively, she thought her distaste for Sally was ultimately a bit petty. And yet Sally would accept Melissa... Soon, she didn't outright have a distaste for Melissa allying with her... Orbot and Cubot approached Sonic, and soon attempted to make some sort of apology for what they were doing in Eggman's service, although Melissa herself was a bit tired from disarming. She soon took to remaking Eggman's personal quarters just so it could match her own tastes, complete with replacing the emblem with her own logo. Yet she was soon distracted by guards being destroyed by an enemy mech. She quickly facepalmed, explaining that it was...
1252222112112211112211212221221.title: Sally volunteers the FF to aid her.

12522221121122111122112122212211.content:
Melissa flew out to meet the robot, landing herself in front of him. Her nanites infested his body, paralysing him.

"Release me!" The gunner mech demanded.

"Omega, listen to me." She said. "Eggman is gone, but his empire isn't. While some of them are willing to demilitarise, a lot of them aren't. You can go and destroy those."
12522221121122111122112122212211.title: Omega, upset at not destroying Eggman!

choices: Listen to her brain and use the base?
Listen to her heart and destroy the base?
125222211211221111221121222122111.content: Omega seemed to agree, albeit after begging for Eggman to be... Cremated. It was at least satisfying his main goal of destroying Eggman, so Melissa relented, letting him desecrate a grave before folding her arms as Omega marched towards his new target- Deleting remnants of Eggman's old empire that refused to fade away. Melissa on the other hand started thinking about what she would do regarding her old stuff... Would she move her stuff into Eggman's main base, taking advantage of the absolutely tempting amount of technology present to further research for the sake of the world? After all, that's what his grandfather's initial aim was- Bettering the world through technology... But then there was the dark side of the Robotnik family did- Creating misery and pain wherever Eggman went, all because he had some apparently insatiable urge to conquer and destroy what couldn't be destroyed. That would leave a bitter taste in her mouth, and as such, she might just outright destroy the base and rebuild a new one from the ground up... What would she do?
125222211211221111221121222122111.title: Omega likes this.

choices: She feels the urge to start making biomechs.
She wants to meet the Egg Bosses that are on her side.
1252222112112211112211212221221111.content: Ultimately, the base was toouseful to destroy, and she decided instead to renovate it, setting automated drones to update it into a new style of fortress, one that would represent peace rather than fear.
1252222112112211112211212221221111.title: Listen to her brain and use the base?

12522221121122111122112122212211112.content: Melissa sighed, making contact with the allies that she had newly gained. It was definitely different, and then there were the Egg Legionnaires, including Mighty's sister. It was a bit odd given how many jokes she had made before about her being reminiscent of a particular anime, but still... Things were just so different from before now that Eggman and his empire were out of the picture as a set of enemies... Right now, she had to put off any idea of changing her friends... Instead, she merely had to sit down as the base refitted itself into a far more... Freedom Fighter-based design. The colors were brighter, and choices in furniture were far more casual, while entire rooms, typically rooms intended for roboticization and Badnik manufacture were remade into meeting rooms, infirmaries, and even extravagant guest rooms among other things. Yet her heart was still fragile. She started thinking about just how to interact... Would she use a screen for long distance communication, or would she bite the bullet and meet them in person?
12522221121122111122112122212211112.title: Meeting her new allies.

choices: Power-hungry Lord Hood, who could hypnotize her organic allies...
... sadistic Regina Ferrum, who could brainwash her and her fellow biomechs...
125222211211221111221121222122111122.content:
Taking a deep breath, she sent out the message, calling for all of the Egg Bosses to travel to the city for a meeting, in order to establish the status quo now that she was Empress.

Clove and Cassia responded quickly, agreeing to arrive on the set date. Melissa made a personal note to start looking for doctors that could treat Cassia, should she refuse infection.

Axel was the next to commit. Him being a biker thug prior to joining her predecessor didn't fill her with confidence, though. He might not be willing.

Nephthys seemed eager to meet her. She'd been thrilled when the demilitarisation order came in, having always wanted peace. Melissa didn't think she was especially wise to join up with the doctor for that purpose, but her heart was in the right place.

Beauregard, Bunnie's uncle, also agreed to visit, which pleased her. She wanted those two to be happy.

Then, however, she spotted one would-be guest that made her blood turn to ice...
125222211211221111221121222122111122.title: Meet in person?

1252222112112211112211212221221111222.content:
The woman glared at Melissa... Before staring at her with a look of curiosity. Apparently the magitek mistress was intrigued to see just what this being was. Melissa sighed and showed off her nanomachines, and just what they were capable of... Before the woman extended her hand.

"In a sense, we are... Kin. I wish to have a bargain- You preserve my knowledge until I find the proper successor."

Melissa sighed, confused by just how mature she was being, but then again, she was only human- She would end up dying at some point. And as such, she would have to pass on her knowledge... Right? The two of them looked at each other in silence before coughing. It was strange for them to be on such friendly terms, but with the incredible change that was the end of Eggman, things were changing just so rapidly. For the time being, Melissa would have to handle foes that would be decidedly different. Soon enough, however, she decided to check in on Omega. She gulped, dreading the results as she saw...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222.title: The Iron Queen

choices: She gives them a grand speech about her plans.
She offers to help them first.
12522221121122111122112122212211112221.content:
Omega was laying waste to all of Eggman's weapons and war, and polluting factories, razing every part of the Doctor's legacy that wouldn't be co-opted and purified by Melissa's own plans. She couldn't deny his efficiency.

Deciding to leave the robot for now, she refocused her attention on the assembling leaders.

"I'm sure you're all wondering what the shape of things to come is..."
12522221121122111122112122212211112221.title: Omega destroying a large facility.

125222211211221111221121222122111122212.content:
Melissa gulped.

"... Ladies, gentlemen, and those of more... Uh... Ambiguous gender. The war is over. Yet over the years, we've drawn up hatreds of various kinds thanks to the battles that we've had. Eggman made me his successor... And accidentally turned me into a girl. But above all else, I was willing to put away old hatreds for the sake of establishing peace. Now that Eggman is dead, albeit at the hands of his own machines thanks to Eggman Nega... Long story that I will most likely handle on my own, or at least with the now former Freedom Fighters... Anyway, I intend to put away those old hatreds that we've cultivated over the years- What I want to do is assist you. This means that, short of murder and taking over the world, you will have the assistance of what was once the Eggman Empire, and the Acorn monarchy- Whatever goals you have, you will have assistance that you thought you might never have had."

The other former allies of the Eggman Empire looked at each other, considering what she had said and...
125222211211221111221121222122111122212.title: She offers to help them first.

choices: Focus on the parts of the EMpire that aren't loyal to her.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content: Fortunately, the reception seemed positive, and soon, they were offering their support. Melissa let out a sigh of relief, slumping down in her chair. She had a lot to do.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Nodded, agreeing to the circumstances.

choices: An odd glaze in Bunnie's eyes.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa decided to start gaining the trust of her new friends- After all, it was better to be loved than feared in her opinion, and much like her speech earlier, she wanted to avoid drawing up new hatreds. As such, she was going to first serve her new friends. But now she had something else to think about... After noticing something a bit different- Bunnie approaching. Melissa tilted her head.

"Bunnie? What're you doing here? I mean, your uncle is here, but I've been just clearing things up with past villains who were only really villains because, well, they were allied with Robotnik... Like Colin. ... Don't call him Snively. He hates that. Anyway, he's been... Getting a bit better given his... Sorry. Private stuff. Uh, anyway..."

Bunnie sighed, rubbing her metallic arm before offering a gentle embrace. Melissa felt a bit concerned given her new nature, but she swallowed up her fear and embraced her friend. After all, they were still friends, weren't they? She started smiling, before noticing...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Focus on her allies.

choices: Regina begins to laugh, pointing her staff at Melissa's head.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa realised that Bunnie was't easing up on the hug, and wasn't so much as looking at Beauregard, despite him sitting ten feet away when she entered, and now being stood beside the pair. She pulled herself back, and looked her friend in the face, noticing that the light was gone from her eyes, and her expression resembled that of someone in a deep sleep.

"Bunnie?" Melissa gasped, trying to nudge her awake, even as the rabbit's metal arm gripped her shoulder tightly, refusing to let go until the vixen was forced to infest Bunnie's metal limbs with her nanites, freezing them in place.

"Sorry, Bunnie..." Melissa said. "Mr. Rabbot, can you hold onto her while I get Nicole up here to look at her?"

"Sure thang..." The older rabbit said, resting his hand on his niece's shoulder. "Ah'm here, sugah... if ya can hear us, don't worry..."


'Nicole get in the meeting room now! Someone's hypnotized Bunnie!' Melissa contacted her friend mentally.

'Is Regina there?' The lynx sounded like she was pouting.

'Yes, but Bunnie needs you!'

'I'll be there, but if you want answers, start with Regina.' Nicole growled.

'Right...' Melissa cut the connection, and glanced at the Overlander woman. It was a bad place to be standing. Due to Eggman's policy on cyberizing his minions, everyone in the room was at least partially mechanical. The former Egg Bosses all had cybernetic implants, and she herself was evidently an AI. Being stuck in a room with a power-hungry and sadistic technomage didn't appeal, and she realised now that, by the time Nicole arrived, they could all be enslaved.

Still, she didn't have much choice. She walked over to Regina, and looked her in the eye.

"Did you do this?"
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: An odd glaze in Bunnie's eyes.

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Regina shook her head,

"One, if I was responsible, I would've gone with the one that was here first- You. Second, we already agreed to a degree of peace between us. What else could be responsible? ... Someone experienced in hypnotism? Besides, can't you interface with her in some manner?"

Melissa nodded, acknowledging the possibility. After all, Regina was sitting in view, and she hadn't utilized any of her tricks. As such, she sat down and sighed as she held onto Bunnie.

"Bunnie... I'm sorry... But even if you don't want this, I have to go inside you just to break whatever sort of hypnosis is affecting you... Just... Forgive me."

Her nanomachines started entering within Bunnie's cybernetics, soon reformatting them into organic parts with the same strength and advantages as her mechanical limbs before breaking just what was affecting her mind. After several minutes of waiting, Bunnie groaned as she gripped her head, slowly getting up and looking down at her new body. It was enough for her to be...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Regina denies it.

choices: Bunnie was under before this all started, being used as a spy by her captor.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
It seemed Bunnie hadn't exactly been conscious of herself while she was under, and finding herself transformed, surrounded by Egg Bosses, and feeling Melissa's presence in her head was causing her more than a little stress.

As Beauregard hugged her, trying to calm her down, Melissa delved into her mind, trying to find out who did this, and how long she's been under.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Scared.

choices: Melissa decides to try and find Hood.
Melissa keeps her guard up but continues her work.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
"Hmm, this is very recent." Melissa said. "I can't find any trace of programming... I think it was Hood."

"That duplicitous varmint? Shoulda known..." Beauregard grunted.

"Indeed. Nicole, I want you to begin work on psychic shielding for the organics." Melissa commanded, before turning back to her new lieutenants. "What can you tell me about Hood?"

"He was in it for his own power." Clove explained."He wanted to use Eggman to gain power of his own, because he was too cowardly to try conquest himself."

"Yeah, he always liked to use brainwashed victims to do his work." Cassia added.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Bunnie was brainwashed recently.

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content: Melissa gulped before going back to her computers... She was seriously considering doing some research just to refresh her memory- After all, in some cases, it had been a very long time since she had seen some of them, so she needed a refresher course on each of them. She searched her databanks, that is, her newly improved memories for all that had happened... And felt not hatred for her opponents... But pity. She sighed as she resumed her work, in addition, she started to search just to ensure that her friends would remain unaffected by just what was going on. And then there was just what was going on regarding Eggman Nega- After all, he was, in effect, the murderer of his counterpart... But what would he do now that he didn't exactly have an ally within this world, or in a particular anti-world... It made her think of something to do... Go after Eggman Nega just to put Eggman's memory to rest... Or perhaps go explain the news to, perhaps, people like Hope, his niece...? It was something she had to think about...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: On Guard

choices: She wants to meet in person
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa consulted her computer files, looking through the database. To her surprise, she realised that Hope and Colin were the only living Robotniks, or Kintobors, which ever they preferred. The others were all killed, most of them at Eggman's hand.

Deciding that it wasn't her place to judge her predecessor's family life, Melissa decided to contact Hope.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Inform Eggman's relatives?

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content: Melissa soon started setting up an appointment. Colin was bound to illicit a decidedly negative, but what could she do now? She had to make sure that she wouldn't show off any sort of Eggman allegiances... And that would mean making sure her nanites nature stayed relatively unseen. After forming a suit that ensured that she wouldn't be suspected, she set up plans before walking off to the GUN Base where the girl tended to spend most of her time given the circumstances. As usual, Hope had seemed to take after her great-grandfather and her uncle as some sort of wunderkind. But Melissa was still nervous- How would she approach it? There was either appealing to her taste for machines in order to slowly lull her into learning the news without overreacting... Or would she be rather upfront, respecting her as an individual? After all, she wasn't an ordinary person, being a child working in the military... But still, she was a child... It was almost maddening just to think of what she would do...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Recalling the Flame Shield

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa soon found herself meeting the young overlander, who raised an eyebrow at her.

"Tails? What happened to you?" She asked.

"It's... a long and complicated story, but... I came here to tell you that Egg- Doctor Robotnik is dead."

"Oh. I see." Hope said, frowning slightly. "I'm... not sure how to respond to this..."

"I understand." Melissa nodded.

"I know he was family, but... the things that he did... I can't exactly feel upset about it. I barely knew him and the one time we were anywhere close to each other, he shot my plane down, so...can't really say I felt the love."

"Hm, of course."

"How did he go?"

"Eggman Nega hijacked some of his machines. One of them injured him, and he succumbed to his injuries."

"And I'm guessing he had something to do with your new look?"
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Be upfront?

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa sighed.

"Okay... After a... Weird dream, I woke up in a lab... He said he was dying, and that his machines had accidentally turned me into a vixen... And I joined him just to turn his megalomania towards a peaceful end... Something his grandfather could be proud of- It wouldn't be an empire, but something like GUN... A security force to protect the planet... And then he developed... Something a bit weird... I'm both organic and machine- It'd be accurate to call me a cloud of nanomachines formed from my cells capable of interfacing with machines, and forming entirely new bodies... I kind of got used to the whole girl thing, but then... Well, all that with Eggman Nega happened... So I'm now the head of his Empire... But I'm not continuing his conquest- I'm offering amnesty to his allies- The terms are basically that if they have some sort of non-greedy goal, they can have help... And I'm not going to try and push you into inheriting his Empire- You're happy here... I get that. I only came to tell you."

Hope was...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: The truth.

choices: Hope's own gearhead side is curious about the biotech bodies.
The two go their separate ways.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
"I... thank you for telling me." She nodded. "And, for what it's worth, I'm sorry you got caught up in my uncle's schemes."

"It's alright, Hope. I kinda like this body." She smiled.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Understanding.

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Soon enough, the two of them were talking about Melissa's new existence- They were going on and on about just what the biotech gynoid was capable of. Hope was utterly in awe, even if her accursed Uncle was responsible for the technology.

"You can not only disguise yourself, but you can avoid outright injury, and you can even choose when you want to pass as opposed to having death as a surprise?! The technology is incredible! It could revolutionize just about every field of medicine from cancer treatments to prosthetics! You could potentially end disease forever without the long-term issues of immortality! How did he even stumble across it?!"

Melissa smiled and shrugged, a bit unsure of just what was going on regarding her capabilities- After all, she was a rarity. And she was untested... She'd need software updates- Sure, she was organic with all the benefits that it had, but that also meant some of the downsides... Speaking of which, would she check herself for any glitches? Or leave it by ear?
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Bonding time

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
"Probably by accident, knowing him." She offered a weak response. "I do need to scan myself to make sure everything's going okay, though."

"Of course. Still, if you ever find a way to make it work on humans, you know where I am."

"Oh, right, okay!" She smiled, beginning her scan.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Scan.

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Thankfully, even after two scans thoroughly done by an outside source- That is, Hope herself, Melissa was still up-to-date. It was a bit concerning, looking back, but at the very least, she could last beyond Eggman if she didn't have any sort of bugs. She looked at Hope, who seemed to be acting like the little girl she was- And it was cute. It was something that made her feel good in this time of uncertainty. She sat down and watched before noticing a black and red hedgehog... Or something close enough... Approaching. He glared at Melissa and gently tapped his foot.

"Explain."

Melissa blushed with a sheepish look on her face as she explained everything... Again. From the accidental gender change to Eggman Nega, she left nothing out. After all, it was never a good idea to leave out details to a fifty year old with Chaos powers and strength that was beyond normal, especially when the current target of his... affections was in the room and a bit unguarded. Shadow soon looked at Melissa with a different expression-
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: All clear!

choices: Melissa has to return to her work now.
Hope volunteers to help upgrade the biotech systems.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
"Hmm... that's unexpected. Still, I have to thank you for trying to do something to redeem the name of my creator since Eggman has dragged it through the mud." Shadow said. Melissa smiled at him.

"Of course, Shadow." She smiled. "Oh, and if people here want to become biotech gynoids, just send them my way." She added.

"Naturally." He said.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Mild surprise.

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content: Hope almost immediately asked for a sample for the sake of study. Melissa, thinking a small sample couldn't do much harm or, say, form into a copy of her, complied by filling a small glass beaker with her cells and handed it to Hope. Almost immediately, she called for a microscope which was supplied. As for Melissa, she left a set of commands to ensure that nothing would go wrong- No rogue AI forming, no difficulties, or typical computer problems that would result in the usual accidents. After all, glitches seemed to grow and grow until it caused some kind of ridiculous problem, even if it was still organic in nature. Hope started observing the cells, on occasion stimulating the cells with short pulses of electricity just to see what kind of reaction would result in one place or another. As Melissa walked back to her new home, Shadow was considering something- Utilizing himself as a test subject. After all, that was his initial purpose as the Ultimate Lifeform. He explained his idea to Hope who...
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: It's not Ivo, but...

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
"I'm not testing this on a live person until I've worked everything out. My uncle's tech was... buggy, and while Melissa is stable, without her mind guiding it, it could go wrong. And I'm especially not testing it on you. Your genetic makeup is... unique."

"Alright. Well, let me know if you need help." He nodded.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Was skeptical.

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa sighed as she returned. Colin asked how Hope was, and Melissa explained. Soon enough, however, there was still more to do- They still had to deal with that mind-controlling pain in the neck... She checked in on Bunnie, who was panting, but looked a bit better than before.

"Hey, Bunnie... Feeling better?"

Bunnie slowly nodded, explaining how she felt- Like her mind was in some sort of haze. Bits and pieces she remembered, like the shock of seeing Tails as a vixen, but most of it was little more than a fog. Melissa embraced her friend and gently nuzzled, comforting the bionic rabbit. Yet she was still faced with a decision- Would she set some sort of trap for the person who had placed his control over Bunnie, or would she go out hunting? It was something she would have to face sooner or later, so she'd have to make a plan in advance, and now wasn't exactly a bad time to at least plan given her mind was in twelve places at once, but Bunnie's presence was calming her down so she could properly plan.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Back to Host.

choices: She knows it won't go down well.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
"We need to find him before he tries again." Melissa decided, still hugging Bunnie.

"Sonic might be able to help ya..."

"But he's not immune to the hypnosis. My biotechs are..." Melissa mused. Perhaps she could... Maybe, turn Sonic?
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Chase?

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa smirked... But decided to leave it alone. After all, it was only a small step from literally asking "Do you want to be Roboticized?"- He'd say no. Instead, she decided to merely leave it be- If Sonic was hypnotized, she would merely scan if she was suspicious, and then she would utilize the nanomachines she had initially implanted into each of them simply to break the hypnosis. But for the time being, she was more concerned with just what was going on.

"So how are the Echidnas dealing with it?"

"Weyell, 'Su's comin', but they're just bein' the usual."

Melissa sighed and smiled- At the very least, they were keeping a clear head about all of it. Sure, seeing Knuckles for just about every incident was nice, but it felt like he was starting to forget the fact that he had his duties as a guardian of the Master Emerald. But how would Julie-Su react at all of this? After all, they had barely managed to send an email thanks to Knuckles preferring his island being pristine as it was before... But would Julie-Su be suspicious, or accepting...?
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Sad, but expected.

choices: She decides to try and win her over.
She stays focused on finding the person who brainwashed Bunnie.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content: It was understandable, Melissa reasoned, when Julie-Su showed up and acted generally cold and wary of them. After all, she had been part of a group of technologically-enhanced Mobians before, and there her own half-siblings had brainwashed her... twice!
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Suspicious?

1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
Melissa gulped as Julie-Su glared... Before explaining her situation, only to be cut off. Julie-Su kept glaring as she mumbled.

"I heard you the first time... Keep your claws off me."

Melissa sighed, and attempted to explain herself. If this was any sort of trap, she was already within the jaws of the beast so to speak. She was in arms reach. Yet she was allowed to go around, avoiding roboticization. And then there was what was happening- If she had meant for anyone to be mindless slaves, she would've done so the first time she met the others. She would've infected them, and turned literally all of them into mindless slaves. But they walked off with their wills, desires, and organic forms intact. All of this so far had a relatively positive impact as Julie-Su admitted the logic of it all... But it wasn't enough. Melissa started begging her friend to at least be the warm soul she knew the echidna could be, even after all that was going on... But was it enough? Or would it take more than that...?
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: Here goes nothing...

choices: Julie-Su is still suspicious, but playing along.
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.content:
The echidna shook her head, and sighed.

"I don't believe you mean us harm, uh, Melissa... But I can't accept this myself. If anything, i want to be less mechanical, not more." She gestured to her robotic parts.

"That's alright, as long as you trust me to be a good leader, that's all I need."
1252222112112211112211212221221111222121.title: She remains unconvinced.

choices: Eggman's lessons are rather hypnotic, and Melissa starts to accept them.
Melissa just tries to avoid buying into Eggman's nonsense while she sits through
12522222.content:
"Call me suspicious, but I'll take a pass on that." Melissa frowned.

"Very well." Eggman said.

"So, is that it? Am I done? Ready to take the throne at a moment's notice?"

"Of course not, my dear girl. I am not quite ready to end my reign yet, and you are certainly not ready to replace me. You must be trained. You must learn how to be an Empress before I can give you the reins."

"Great." She sighed. "And I'm guess you want to train me to be just like you?"

"Of course!"

"Wonderful." She groaned."Alright then, lay it on me."
12522222.title: Nah...

choices: "To serve you, Master Robotnik, and the Eggman Empire!"
"To take over your empire and do what you couldn't!"
125222221.content:
As Eggman kept going on, something in Melissa's brain seemed to click- Maybe Eggman was right... After all, Sonic was just so irritating... Sure, she remembered everything Eggman was doing, but looking at what the rest of the world tended to do... Maybe Eggman was far more appropriate for the world... Perhaps even perfect- After all, he was nothing but a perfect gentleman to her... She soon took on a smile while Orbot and Cubot stared, blinking on occasion. Cubot attempted to cut in while Orbot pushed him shut, whispering.

"Doctor Eggman is trying to "convince" Ms. Prower that being one of his Neo-Legionnaires is a good idea! After all, she's going to succeed the Eggman Empire the moment he passes!"

Melissa saluted Eggman the moment the elderly scientist ceased speaking. It appeared that the lecture was a total success. But there was something amiss... A look in her eye... He soon left the room, heading towards Melissa and waited for a minute before speaking.

"What is your ambition?"
125222221.title: Egg-Vixen

choices: Melissa decides to try and find a way to save Eggman.
Eggman has more lessons for his new slave.
1252222211.content:
The vixen's response was exactly what the mad doctor wanted to hear, and he looked down at her small form with a grin.

"That's excellent to hear, Miss Prower." He said, petting her head. Melissa smiled, it felt so good to please her Master, and she was overjoyed that he had chosen her to be his replacement. She loved serving the Empire, after all, even if she wouldn't get to serve him for much longer...
1252222211.title: "To serve you, Master Robotnik, and the Egg...

12522222112.content:
Eggman kept giving Melissa lessons, this time giving her technical information on operating his myriad vehicles. Much to his expectations and delight, she was an absolute master in both commanding and piloting, even mimicking Eggman's trademark laugh. It pleased Ivo to such a degree that he had even forgotten about some of his own creations out of sheer joy at having a daughter of some kind. Orbot and Cubot looked at each other and shrugged, soon entering a sort of sleep mode while Melissa started practicing against simulations, even tweaking them to be far closer to what Sonic and company were actually like. Eggman was pleased to have such accurate data- With this, Sonic and his friends wouldn't be able to win this time...! Yet Melissa had some new plans- Including altering some old machines into members of her new order... The Neo-Legionnaires! But it begged the question- Who to modify first? Metal Sonic, the all too rebellious machine? Or perhaps that old ragdoll Tails doll...?

"I think I'll modify..."
12522222112.title: Preparations...

choices: Eggman doesn't want her messing with his "best work".
125222221121.content: "We need to fix up Metal Sonic." She said. "He's good, but he could be better, and he's too rebellious."
125222221121.title: "Metal Sonic."

1252222211211.content:
Eggman laughed, pleased with any idea that could cease Metal Sonic's antics- After all, he had not only usurped his empire once, locking him away, but he even had the nerve to use his warships, wasting various ships from his mighty fleet! It was only natural to attempt to... fix this notable mistake. The problem was that, despite being his creation, he always seemed to have... Bugs. As such, it was only natural to have someone as smart as himself modify it, searching for any bugs that could possibly result in a rebellious will. Yet Melissa had her own ideas for upgrades. While she couldn't exactly betray her master, she still needed... Her own body guard. And as it was, she had a newfound taste for her own form, and she thought she might... Leave her mark on her newest servant and fellow soldier of the Eggman Empire. After all, she was meant to be Eggman's top servant, right?

"Doctor, would it be fine if I modified Metal Sonic's frame?"

Eggman approved, and as such, Melissa began to...
1252222211211.title: Eggman appoves of this idea.

12522222112112.content:
Metal's form was simplistic, but easily modified, she found. For the most part, all it took to alter him was to add layers of properly-shaped plating, bulking him out until he went from a stick-thin, skeletal android, to a sleek, sexy-looking robotic woman. As a bonus, parts like her legs and arms now had more space inside them for larger motors and other systems, dramatically increasing her ability to function.

Her code was altered at the same time, rewriting her personality and purpose. No longer was she simply to match Sonic, but protect her Mistress Melissa with her life, and obey her Master and Mistress at all costs. She became more 'alive', able to think and feel and emote, and it made her happy to be a good servant.

Finally, Melissa painted her body below the neck, making her look as though she wore an Eggman Empire uniform.
12522222112112.title: Make Metal far more feminine.

125222221121121.content:
Melissa grinned as Metal knelt down in front of her.

"Mistress Prower, thank you for this gift, and allowing me to see the error of my ways in my rebellion against the Eggman Empire- The glorious Doctor Robotnik seemed to have programmed me a bit too specifically, allowing my programming to make unwanted decisions."

Melissa sighed and smiled, pleased with the sound of Metal praising the glorious Doctor Robotnik, not to mention the fact that the upgrades to her frame made her feel proud as a roboticist- After all, she dreamed of producing an AI that would properly serve Eggman. The rotund scientist himself was curious with just what Melissa had created out of Metal, even thinking about the fact that Metal was far from a Metal Sonic... For long, anyway. Melissa on the other hand was assisting in testing the mech's new systems and equipment before suddenly having the same thought as her master- Would a rename be necessary, or would she just shorten it to Metal...? After some time pondering, she...
125222221121121.title: Melissa is satisfied with this.

choices: Something based on her current name.
1252222211211211.content:
"Hmm, you need a new name, my dear creation." Melissa said, petting her.

"Affirmative, my current title is no longer fit for purpose. I do not resemble Sonic." She nodded, looking over herself.

"Indeed. So... let's call you...."
1252222211211211.title: Changed the name.

12522222112112111.content:
Melissa sighed, deciding with something a bit cheesy- It made her sound like an otaku had created Metal, but she didn't have much else on the mind- After all, her old name was little more than a pun on Miles Per Hour, and her nickname was quite literally based on the most obvious feature about her.

"For the time being, we'll go with Metal Sonikko. I mean, I'm a roboticist, not a writer. Plus it'll be a bit amusing to see how that annoying blue nuisance might react. But we'll just go with Metal inside the lab."

Metal Sonikko was quick to nod, agreeing with the name while Eggman himself, observing the situation shrugged. Given he had labeled several stations as the Death Egg in a shoutout to Star Wars, he didn't have much better in regards to naming conventions. Yet the tests had given him a new sort of confidence- Melissa would be able to create a literal army based on his foes! ... Or perhaps utilize the other Sonic-based machines just to bolster Metal Sonikko?
12522222112112111.title: Cheesy, but what else?

125222221121121111.content:
"Melissa, I wish for you to create a team of Anti-Freedom Fighters to work alongside you and Metal Sonikko." Eggman's voice echoed through the intercom.

"Ignoring that the name is taken, can you elaborate, Master?" She asked. "Do you wish me to create Metal copies of them all, like Sonikko here, or turn them into robots like her for the same purpose?"

Both ideas seemed good to hm, but he had originally meant...
125222221121121111.title: Anti-Freedom Fighters?

choices: Metal Sonikko containing Sonic in her frame, uniting the two.
Melissa putting Sonic into unconsciousness with a taser.
1252222211211211111.content: Melissa soon saluted, before altering Metal Sonikko in order to make roboticization far more viable for Sonic, although it gave Melissa a different idea- Feminine frames for each and every last ally of Sonic or enemy of Doctor Eggman that ever attempted to aid Sonic. She quickly relayed the idea to Eggman, who didn't mind the possibility. After all, it didn't really matter what form his slaves took, so long as his technology triumphed over that meddlesome blue pain in the neck! Melissa was quick to smirk, preparing a scheme to draw Sonic out- After all, her handwriting didn't change much, and after some practice, she was able to reasonably mimic her old male voice, albeit with the need to give some kind of excuse to explain how off it was. Still, she prepared a dummy of her old self, and went to a reasonably secluded spot with Metal before hiding. Sonic was quick to arrive... And noticed the dummy almost immediately. Thankfully, his back was turned to their hiding place, which lead to...
1252222211211211111.title: Mecha Freedom Fighters (Roboticize them)

12522222112112111112.content:
Melissa leapt out of the shadows and zapped Sonic with a taser, holding it until he lost consciousness and slumped into her arms. She passed him off to Metal, and the two decided to head home before trying anything else.

Travelling back to the base was easy enough, they knew the way, they just had to be quick about it.
12522222112112111112.title: Melissa putting Sonic into unconsciousness with...

choices: Ensured that Sonic was up to par with Metal.
125222221121121111121.content:
As the two arrived back at the base, Metal Sonikko had an idea.

"Mistress, if we were to fully roboticize the Freedom Fighters, Sonic here would be very redundant. I propose that, once he is roboticized, our frames are melded."

Melissa blinked, soon thinking. Metal brought up a good point, but numbers were always a good thing. It was definitely something interesting to think about. Yet that could wait- First they had to roboticize him in the first place. Eggman cackled, pleased with the fact that the biggest obstacle to his schemes of world conquest was being taken into his base by what was once the second largest pain in his backside! As Melissa placed Sonic within a roboticization chamber, she decided to wait until the hyperactive hedgehog woke up. Soon enough, he was banging at the container, while Melissa grinned.

"I wish I could say this hurts me more than it hurts you, but Lord Robotnik is just far too right for this world."

Sonic kept banging before being rendered into a mechanical life form. Now, Melissa...
125222221121121111121.title: Fusion?

choices: She makes Sonic into a similar fembot.
She makes Sonic into Metal's twin.
1252222211211211111212.content:
"Are we to be one,Mistress?"

"Oh dear pet." Melissa said. "Two is always better than one. Why have one servant with your power, when I can have two? Download your data into the systems so that I can ensure that your new sister is up to par."

"Yes Mistress!" She saluted, plugging herself into the computer.
1252222211211211111212.title: Ensured that Sonic was up to par with Metal.

choices: Planning a conquest of Angel Island.
A bit saddened that he couldn't do it himself.
12522222112112111112122.content:
Melissa chuckled, saying to Metal that they would instead be metaphorically one. Soon enough, the two machines had only one visual difference- A set of green optics instead of Metal's traditional red eyes. Soon enough, the two had indeed become nearly indistinguishable. They were beyond merely the typical Eggman machine... They were some of the most advanced machines on the planet, capable of rushing past even the likes of Shadow with his temporary temporal manipulation. Melissa cackled as the two machines knelt down towards her, proclaiming the glory of the Eggman Empire- Soon, Eggman would be able to rule over this world! It was an intensely satisfying sensation, and soon enough, she strutted to her master, Dr Robotnik.

"My beloved master, your biggest thorn in your side has been properly roboticized! Now, she is the same as Metal Sonikko, a perfect slave and soldier for the glory of the Eggman Empire!"

Eggman himself wasn't paying attention, causing Melissa to become concerned. As it turned out, Eggman was...
12522222112112111112122.title: She makes Sonic into Metal's twin.

choices: "It's not the same. Call me when you get Princess Sally, though."
125222221121121111121222.content: "I didn't realise you'd be so sentimental about it, Master." Melissa raised an eyebrow. "If you like, I can turn her back so you can do the honours?"
125222221121121111121222.title: A bit saddened that he couldn't do it himself.

choices: "No, no! You're fine as you are!"
1252222211211211111212221.content:
Eggman blinked. He didn't recall putting an organic switch on the roboticizer, yet the fact that Melissa offered it meant that something was going on.

"... Okay, then... How did you figure out a process that I made to be physically impossible...?"

Melissa smirked, reminding him of her IQ- She knew how to fix it. As such, she walked off, modifying a roboticizer to restore Sonic. Soon enough, he was back to normal... But subservient to both Eggman and Melissa, acting as if he had been humiliated and broken. Melissa took Sonic to Eggman, grinning as the rotund scientist... Asked for them to give them a minute just to get things ready. Melissa looked at Sonic and blinked before thinking something a bit more strange... Asking Eggman to be roboticized at some point- After all, she had to atone for what she did, opposing the one true ruler of the world. Yet soon enough, Eggman called them inside, cackling as he had his moment, roboticizing Sonic... Only to end up with what Melissa had properly created before restoring Sonic. As Eggman finished, Melissa asked about being Roboticized. Eggman responded.
1252222211211211111212221.title: "You can?"

choices: He sends her after another target.
Melissa wants to be a robot.
12522222112112111112122211.content: "I put a lot of work into you, Melissa. I won't spoil it by overdoing it." He said.
12522222112112111112122211.title: "No, no! You're fine as you are!"

125222221121121111121222111.content: Melissa saluted Eggman, soon grinning as she strutted out, calling her Metallic Hedgehogs to her side as she decided on her next target, a particular rabbit with mechanical parts. Soon enough, she was setting the same sort of trap, calling Bunnie out to a spot within reach that would leave her out of prying eyes... But now she had a different thing to worry about- A different set of prying eyes that could interface with technology. It was almost painful to imagine having to deal with Nicole, but for the sake of Master Robotnik, she would see the light that is the Eggman Empire! Soon enough, the vixen got to work on creating a capsule that would unleash a computer virus that could affect Bunnie's mechanical limbs. The moment she finished, she got to work in capturing Bunnie. Later, in an abandoned Freedom Fighter Base, Bunnie stepped on something, before feeling agonizing pain. She fell over as her limbs refused to move while Melissa walked up, grinning. Soon, she had a decision to make...
125222221121121111121222111.title: Target- Rabbot!

choices: Focus on finding a way to roboticize Bunnie fuly.
1252222211211211111212221112.content:
Nicole was unlikely to be with Bunnie, and Melissa scooped her former friend up, carrying her back to her Master's base. She glanced over the rabbit's cybernetic parts, which posed quite the problem for them.

Robots and Roboticizers didn't tend to mix, and often had explosive results. That would make roboticizing Bunnie a difficult challenge at best, flat-out imposible at worst. Still, perhaps there were ways around it, she could also just brainwash her and give her new, more effective cyborg parts... THere were ways to make the rabbit see the light.
1252222211211211111212221112.title: Take Bunnie back to base?

12522222112112111112122211121.content: Melissa chuckled, relishing the challenge as she started preparing something to roboticize her bit by bit, including replacement parts that would result in a far more even Mecha-Bunnie, meaning that things were going well. Soon enough, Melissa was preparing a machine akin to an MRI, albeit covered in mechanical arms meant to roboticize Bunnie bit by bit. Thankfully, Melissa wasn't stupid enough to leave the machine with only one purpose- Part of her always did love multi-task machines. That's why she made the Tornado 2 the way she did as a boy. The two Metals inserted Bunnie into the machine, smiling as Bunnie's form was remade, with a scheme that betrayed her previously incomplete nature, albeit with a properly symmetrical appearance. It was a bit strange to see both arms on Bunnie match the other, but now Melissa had to think about a certain risk- After so many times, she was a bit worried that Bunnie's mind might be a bit immune to the mental changes... She gulped and quivered as...
12522222112112111112122211121.title: Full Rabbit-Bot.

choices: Bunnie's not big enough a victory, keep working.
125222221121121111121222111211.content:
Fortunately, the rabbot was under her control, now dominated by the programming. She stood up, saluting.

"I live to serve you, Mistress!"
125222221121121111121222111211.title: Bunnie bowed before Melissa.

1252222211211211111212221112111.content: Melissa smiled as Bunnie marched to Eggman, awaiting a command. In a way, it was the closest Eggman had gotten to roboticizing a member of the Freedom Fighters before Melissa joined Team Eggman. Now, the one at the very edge had finally fallen into the arms of the Eggman Empire!
