Melissa was considering what to do to when Eggman passed, but she was sure that it would be a while before he would- After all, he's Ivo Robotnik! To her, Eggman was the epitome of all things- The ideal. It was the reason she even took to mimicking his trademark laugh. Soon enough, she was outright laughing, thinking of what she had did for the sake of the Eggman Empire! But now, she was thinking of something else- Hacking a particular Holo-Lynx for the sake of manipulating buildings and bases, not just individuals. Soon enough, the Eggman Empire would spread across the landscape itself! Still, there were other things to pay attention to, like a screen flickering onto the glorious Doctor Robotnik, who was looking rather...
1252222211211211111212221112111.title: Show her to Eggman.

choices: Eggman gives her a different target.
12522222112112111112122211121112.content:
"You've done well, Melissa. Bunnie will make an excellent addition to our cause."

"Thank you Master. I am now working on Nicole." She said.
12522222112112111112122211121112.title: Pleased with Melissa's foresight.

125222221121121111121222111211121.content:
Eggman grinned, pleased with the idea that Melissa could give them the ultimate look inside his hated foes' base, and control the moment the final assault came! He even had an amusing fantasy of the Holo-Lynx essentially becoming a mass roboticizer, changing everyone within the castle into his mechanical servants! He cackled before falling over, coughing.

"Not again... I've really got to keep some manner of control... I'm bound to fall down the steps one of these days. Ah, right! What to do about those infernal... Do I reunite those three by going after the Master Emerald, or do I send the two Metals after their oh so beloved princess...? This is gonna be a hard one..."

He kept pondering the circumstances. Sure, he could gain a massive strength boost given that gullible knucklehead and his associate from that... Oddly unpleasant incident despite the fact that it ended with him conquering the world for like a minute... Or he could end the rebellion sooner than later... What would he do?
125222221121121111121222111211121.title: Eggman approves.

1252222211211211111212221112111212.content:
"Stay focused for now, Melissa. Take Nicole, and have her roboticize everyone in the city." Eggman ordered.

"Yes Master!" She beamed, saluting happily. "Metal, Mecha, I need you two to go to Robotropolis and kidnap Nicole.

"Yes, Ma'am!" The twin droids saluted,before flying off.
1252222211211211111212221112111212.title: Head to Sally's castle?

12522222112112111112122211121112122.content: Melissa kept hacking past Nicole's firewalls, eager to please Master Robotnik. Thankfully, she had some... Personal experience in formatting bits and pieces of Nicole's systems, including her security, which made things far more easier in regards to forcing the Holo-Lynx to bow down and see the light that was the Eggman Empire. Sure, it may have seemed painful... But she knew that Nicole would never listen to Master Robotnik, at the very least without some sort of... Convincing. As such, she wormed her way into Nicole's memories, slowly manipulating them until everything made sense- That she was supposed to be a willing servant of the Eggman Empire. As such, she could repay her apparent betrayal by roboticizing the residents of her protectorates, including her beloved friends. But of course, preparing something like that would take time, but the moment Nicole swore eternal loyalty to Doctor Robotnik, Melissa was quick to run to her master, panting as she explained how she was successful. Eggman was...
12522222112112111112122211121112122.title: Stay with Melissa.

choices: "Leave them. I want them to see this."
"Change them too. No sense in risking anything."
125222221121121111121222111211121221.content:
"Excellent work, my slave." Eggman grinned. "Have Nicole begin the process of roboticizing her own citizens."

"Yes Master!" Melissa beamed. "WHat about the Freedom Fighters that live there?"
125222221121121111121222111211121221.title: Appropriately excited.

1252222211211211111212221112111212211.content: Melissa nodded as Nicole finished preparations. Soon enough, the Freedom Fighters were being overwhelmed by friends, and in some cases, family- Granted, the badniks and mechs present had the same sort of specifications and intelligence as Metal and the others, meaning not only were they as fast as Sonic, but they were also thinking as fast as Sonic could run. Melissa herself was rather satisfied with the irony of it all- Their friends and family had become machines, and it was all thanks to a friend they thought they could trust being hacked by one of Sonic's oldest friends. She laughed, feeling rather triumphant as the army brought the Freedom Fighters to base, as they groaned, confused as to just what was going on- Where did the Roboticizers come from? Why didn't it target them? And just why were these machines so much more capable?! It was like they were akin to an army of Metal Sonics! As they were lead to some kind of forum, the machines kept their eyes up towards an ominous figure-
1252222211211211111212221112111212211.title: "Leave them. I want them to see this."

choices: Some of them are broken, and surrender.
12522222112112111112122211121112122111.content:
Melissa stood over her former friends, grinning darkly down at them. Metal and Mecha Sonikko flanked her, posing with her, as Bunnie and Nicole hovered nearby.

"Welcome to the Empire, my dear friends!" Melissa beamed. "Are you ready to join us?"
12522222112112111112122211121112122111.title: Melissa!

choices: She makes the FF choose who is changed first.
125222221121121111121222111211121221111.content:
"We will never surrender!" Sally growled. "We'll find a way to save all of you and change you back!"

"Yeah!" Amy nodded.

"And how do you expect to do that with myself and Nicole on Master's side?" Melissa beamed. "Now who wants to be changed first..."
125222221121121111121222111211121221111.title: The heroes stand firm.

choices: The twins start conversion in person.
The twins take them to be processed.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Melissa smirked, turning to the mechanical hedgehog twins posing with her.

"Girls, your little girlfriends shall be our first victims." She cooed.

"Yes Mistress!" THe two beamed, jumping down. Mecha grabbed hold of Sally, holding her close in the same way she used to as Sonic. Metal, meanwhile, scooped up Amy like she had done on the Little Planet.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: She picks a victim.

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Whilst the two squirmed, a bright pink Roboticizer was wheeled out, soon deploying some sort of field. As the two organics were dumped inside, the two started banging. It seemed impenetrable while Melissa giggled.

"Don't be sad, you two! You're going to retain your free will- You'll just see the glory of Doctor Robotnik and his creations!"

Soon enough, the two of them were noticing a sensation that was all too familiar to Sally- Metallic skin. Insides formed of wires and circuit boards... But what scared the two of them was just how good it felt. How much it was starting to feel like the right thing... Soon enough, they were outright pushing away thoughts of opposing Eggman... Or refusing Melissa. After all, they had given the two of them just such a pleasant fate... They soon stepped out of the now barrier-less roboticizer while the two Metallic Hedgehogs awaited them. Melissa on the other hand giggled.

"Step forward and join the Sisterhood of Steel!"

Soon enough, the Freedom Fighters were stepping forward...
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Four Heavenly... Queens?

choices: Melissa roboticizes her like the others.
Melissa decides to have some fun with her crush instead.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Melissa watched as Bunnie embraced Antoine and kissed him, before turning and dropping him into the machine with a smile. Nicole unceremoniously shunted Rotor into the second tube, and soon, two more sexy fembots stood in their places, smiling and saluting their Mistress.

Finally, only Fiona remained, cowering at the back. Melissa smiled, and strutted toward her. She tried to turn and run, but Bunnie and Sally grabbed her arms, holding her in place until the enslaved vixen closed the gap, embracing her lovingly.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Utterly broken.

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Melissa started gently rubbing Fiona's body while the crimson vixen groaned.

"Why...? Why are you doing this?! And after I literally come all this way because they begged for you... You... You're literally worse than me!"

Melissa sighed. After all this time, she was planning on sparing Fiona the fate of becoming a lower servant of Master Robotnik... But she was being so rude... Maybe it was a remnant of her old crush as a boy, but she kept dropping hints that she wouldn't be averse to Fiona being her partner among the upper echelons of the Eggman Empire... Yet soon enough, it was becoming clear that Fiona quite literally refused to listen- Her utter hatred for the rotund scientist prevented her from doing anything involving the Eggman Empire... Melissa started pondering what to do before shaking her head as she pulled Fiona towards the inside of the facility. The others were surrounding the two vixens, glaring at Fiona with black and red optics. Soon enough, she gently laid Fiona inside a chamber before jumping back as the chamber trapped Fiona.

"Prepare Fiona for..."
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Time for some fun...

choices: Melissa just makes her docile and submissive, so she can seduce her.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
"Wait, what? You're not going to turn me into a bot like the rest?" Fiona yelped.

"No, darling." Melissa purred. "I've always wanted you to be mine... and I can't really... enjoy... shall we say, a robot. I had hoped to seduce you, but your virulent hatred of my Master prevents you from listening. Such a shame."

"He killed my parents!" Fiona screamed, fighting the urge to insult Tails. She knew full well that the fox wasn't in her right mind anymore, and held onto some grim hope that the real Tails would emerge soon enough. He didn't. Melissa pulled the lever, and Fiona felt her mind slow to grinding halt.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: "Physical and mental alterations!"

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Melissa smiled as she started inputting some changes to Fiona's mind- She wanted someone just as smart as her, but also smart enough to realize when she was making an utter mistake... As such, she left Fiona's... Spicier side intact. Instead, she would make Fiona a loyal servant of the Eggman Empire, along with certain changes that would ensure she was in the mood when it mattered. Melissa licked her lips as Fiona's capsule opened up, while Fiona gripped her head.

"Ah... Wha... What happened... Oh, Melissa! Does Master Robotnik have a mission for us? Because I was hoping we could cuddle if we hav e some free time, you know? It's nice to see that the rest of the girls are here to guard us..."

Melissa teared up and hugged Fiona tightly, before the two walking straight to Dr. Eggman, who seemed a bit confused by Fiona being spared... But put it off as something to ensure that Melissa would stay sharp. And after all, she deserved a reward after all of her hard work in his name! Now what would he do...?
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Welcome to the Eggman Empire!

choices: Fiona suggests targeting some of her old comrades.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content: "So, the Freedom Fighters are mine." Eggman grinned, looking over the Robians and his two fox servants. "So, what to do now...?"
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Continuing the conquest?

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content: Melissa suggested the idea of capturing the rogue E-100 Model Omega, which Fiona soon logically escalated to capturing Team Dark. After all, why choose one target when they could logically go after multiple targets? Besides, they could just set a trap involving the Space Station that a certain Ultimate Lifeform tended to hang around, which would draw out the military, alongside the ones called Team Dark. In addition, planting a few Eggman Empire Mechs would be bound to draw out the attention of said E-123 Omega. But it left them with two possibilities- The first would be the easiest, but would still leave the others alone which would mean that they had to form another plan. The other was simply capturing Omega and the others together which was bound to be difficult thanks to their combined strength... They decided to leave it to their beloved master, Doctor Robotnik at the very least, and if he was busy, they could just play a game of rock-paper-scissors or something of the sort. Robotnik agreed with...
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Target: Dark!

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Weighing up the options, it was decided that all three of them were available targets. Shadow was powerful, but he struggled with one Sonic, let alone the two robot Sonikkos. Fiona was chomping at the bit to get some retribution on Rouge, as was Bunnie, and Omega's rampaging AI could be tamed easily by Nicole.

All in all, Melissa liked their chances.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Team Dark all together.

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content: Melissa and Fiona looked at each other and grinned as they commanded their forces to head out. Soon enough, they headed out on a pair of Egg-o-matics, and they were laughing as the squad of machines headed out. Now they could prove to the world of their Master's greatness! The military soon noticed the group heading towards a particular base that had some sort of device utilizing an all too familiar gem... As per usual, Team Dark was present. Omega was showing signs of impatience- He preferred revenge on Eggman to simple guard duty... But it was bound to bring attention of his forgetful creator while Shadow was performing his duties as expected of him... Although he was a bit irritated by how some things didn't change from when a certain GUN Commander was targeting him. In the meantime, Rouge was, true to form, begging to have the gem, or at the very least pushing the scientists to replicate the device in a way that didn't need the steady stream of energy from the Chaos Emerald just so she could have it. The group of Eggman's servants...
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Go hunting.

choices: GUN's finest put up a good fight.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
"Alright..." Melissa grinned, standing up in her seat. "All forces, attack!"

"Yes Mistress." The Robians droned, bursting into the building.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Decided to burst in!

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content: Much to Melissa and Fiona's expectations, Shadow was the first to fall thanks to the mechanical Hedgehogs double-teaming the Ultimate Lifeform. The second to fall was Omega thanks to some rather outdated security systems- After all, he had been abandoned for a long time before he had been discovered by Rouge and Shadow, which meant that while he had power and defense in the real world, he was an open book in cyberspace. Rouge on the other hand was quick to run off and hide, even as she grit her teeth as each of her defenders fell to the invading mechanical lifeforms. There was only so many places to hide, however, and soon enough, the last of Team Dark's combat members fell. As the members of Team Dark were... Reformatted, the human members were cuffed and brought onboard a transport vessel with one notable exception- Hope. After all, she was family to the Master, but as she watched from within a completed Fire Shield meant for humans, only one thing had stirred within her small heart...
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Over already?

choices: Melissa decides to try and break the shield.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Melissa and Fiona approached Hope's shield, as she glared at them from within.

"We are doing this in the name of your uncle. You should join us." Melissa said.

"Never!"

"Can we fight her?" Fiona asked. "THe Master may not appreciate it."
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Resistance.

choices: "Leave Omega's exterior alone! It looks threatening!"
"After what you did with Metal, I want you to remodel Omega!"
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Melissa soon contacted her master, Doctor Robotnik and explained the situation.

"Sir, your niece is defiant... She refuses to join the Empire, even as her friends are marching towards proper obedience to you. I was thinking of merely dispelling the shield and nothing more, but..."

Ivo took on more of a decidedly grim expression, ordering the machines to take Hope and escort her to the base- While she would be captured, she would not be harmed. The group complied as Hope was carried by a mechanical Rouge and a decidedly feminine-looking robotic Shadow. As Melissa and Fiona headed back to base, they looked at each other and grinned. The military had lost its biggest chances of opposing Eggman... But there was the matter of E-123 Omega. Sure, he had power... But he was decidedly out of date. The two vixens were seriously considering remodeling Omega, but he was the final of the E-100 Models...They decided to leave the decision to Eggman in terms of visual designs... After all, the interior was obviously going to be changed. Eggman soon made contact, saying...
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: "A question, sir..."

choices: She find a way to make a convincing but functional fembot out of him.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content: "As you wish, Master!" Melissa smiled, getting to work on Omega's body.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: "After what you did with Metal, I want you ...

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Surprisingly, making Omega "feminine" despite the fact that the machine's design was decidedly non-gendered was simple enough- Making the arm and legs far more shapely. As for the main body, that was already done within thanks to a curved element. After replacing Omega's voice chip with something far more appropriate and changing certain AI settings regarding pronouns and gender, the two vixens looked as Omega reawakened.

"E-123 Omega Mk II online. How may I destroy the enemies of Robotnik?"

The two girls grinned at each other and clapped at their work- It seemed that working together was far easier thanks to some work that Melissa had done. They commanded Omega to return and kneel down in front of their Master. It was a bit strange seeing Omega rock her hips before heading off at full speed, but now they had to return. By the time the two returned to base, Eggman was preparing something rather strange- They looked at each other as Eggman cackled at his newest creation- His means of surviving...!
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Omega Mk II

choices: "You can't mess with perfection! I will be exactly the same."
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Floating in a tank of glowing liquid was a human embryo, which Eggman was working on.

"Master, is that the new you?" Fiona asked.

"Yes, it is!"

"Oh, what will it be like?"
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: A new organic body!

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Eggman scratched his head, before gently explaining.

"Well... I decided to keep only my majestic facial hair and my grin- I spend a long time in the bathroom each day just to ensure that these pearly whites stay healthy... But I want to change my figure- I'm tired of being called Eggman! Sure, I've used it a bunch of times, and I even answer to it, but it's meant to be a motif for my machines, not an insulting nickname for me... At the very least I have something to ensure that my lineage will continue."

The two vixens looked at each other and blinked. What would their master mean by that? Was it something to ensure that he would have a child... Or would he cut out the middle man and do it himself? Regardless, they decided they could ask- After all, he was right here... After he finished laughing of course. That was something that they would instead compliment by laughing alongside their Master before asking the moment he finished.

"What is your backup plan, if we may ask, Master...?"
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Eggman no more!

choices: Not yet... but he's on the lookout!
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
"An Empress? You wish to get married." Melissa smiled. "We will assist in any way we can."

"Is there a lucky lady already chosen, Master?" Fiona asked.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: "An Empress!"

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Eggman sighed.

"Now, I'm asking the resistant sides of you two, but do you think a guy like me gets a lot of dates? I mean, I'm a scientist. A former teacher. I'm wanted around the globe, and... I can be a bit of a child... A lot of the time..."

Melissa and Fiona soon embraced their Master, gently nuzzling him while Eggman himself sighed and smiled before he started thinking. Sure, he could go looking for a girl... But why not make a woman? After all, he had enough materials for a backup, meaning that he still had a means of creating a woman... He could just do some of the usual mad scientist fare to accelerate the growth, implement certain... Programs, and create what was in essence the perfect bride! One who would love him for him, and be the perfect partner for his conquest of the world! ... But that took time, and such a thing was something he wasn't sure he would have given the circumstances... Which would he choose? Would he pine for a woman, or make a woman that would pine for him...?
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: No, but I might...

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Truth be told, he doubted his machine's ability to make a fertile woman.

"Master, why date when you can brainwash?" Fiona asked.
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Date a woman?

1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.content:
Eggman sighed and shook his head. To be honest, he was rather tired of brainwashing humans.

"I'd rather have a challenge, you know? Just... Trying to see if I can win a woman the old fashioned way. I'll do it when I'm in the new body though- After all, I'm not exactly attractive to most people..."

The two vixens sighed and nodded before considering what to do next- Would they stay inside the base for the time being just to get the heat off given they had just attacked a government facility, or would they go after even more subjects? After all, they would still expect some sort of assault either way, and having numbers was always a good idea... But then again, leaving the base undefended was bound to have disastrous results in some manner... It was something they would have to weigh their options with, even as the trio ended up taking a bit of a review of each of their roboticized minions... It was something they had worked just so hard for, and they weren't willing to give it up so easily...
1252222211211211111212221112111212211111.title: Still the old fashioned way.

1252222211211211111212221112111212211112.content:
Melissa giggled as the machines started prodding the Freedom Fighters, pushing them towards the inside of the base.

"To be honest, I'd rather have you roboticized as the Master has always ordered, but I could spare you if you're willing to give someone up... And don't try that whole changing me back- Even if you did try... I just love this body oh so much... I'd change myself back again and again... And of course, I suppose I couldn't resist serving the Master... It's just too perfect..."

After much fearful deliberation, Sonic stepped forward with a determined look in his eyes.

"I'm coming... And I WILL save you, Tails..."

Melissa dropped down and smiled. "I'm Melissa! Welcome to your new life as a servant of the Eggman Empire! No need to do any of that nasty opposing Eggman nonsense- Just let him run the show! Besides... Who says I'm a complete doofus?"

Almost immediately, an electric shock overtook Sonic, forcing him into unconsciousness. As he woke up, he felt his skin changing... He was becoming...

1453121.content:
He continued walking along, looking down and deep in thought regarding the strange dream and his latest invention... He had wondered what the dream meant... When he suddenly found himself tripped and fallen on somebody... He had closed his eyes, and when he peeked them open, there was Rouge the Bat... His hands right on her breasts as she appeared VERY annoyed.

"Tails, would you PLEASE get off me?!" She growled at him. Looking around, he had somehow wandered onto a side street, nobody else around at all... Tails apologized profusely, but found his hands stuck fast to the part of them that were on the skin of her breasts. He tugged and pulled as Rouge winced. "What'd you do, get superglue on your gloves?!"

Tails shook his head, frowning and trying to pull his hands out of the gloves... But it was as if the fabric of the gloves had passed through Rouge's skin, his fingertips now inside of her! His body began to glow the same color as the light from his dream. "W-what's going on?!" He exclaimed as Rouge struggled, but began to become subdued... As Tails was drawn deeper into Rouge's breasts, his arms now elbow deep into her as his head passed into her cleavage...

It would have been an odd sight to anybody passing along... Tails struggled and kicked, his body getting pulled into Rouge, but it only served to have him slip into her faster... As Rouge passed out once his legs finished sinking in. He awoke already walking along, hearing a voice in his head. *Can't believe Tails would just grope me and run...* He felt an odd bouncing on his chest as he did so, and an annoyance at himself. He seemed to have memories of the time before he woke up... Tails had disappeared after knocking her over and copping a feel... *Can't believe even Tails would do something like that...*

Tails twitched his limbs as the voice gasped at that. *W-What was that?* It asked as he took over the walking for her, and it settled down. *OK... What's going...?* He found himself asking himself... When he caught his reflection in a window. There was Rouge, staring back at him. She blinked when he blinked... Moved her hand and waved when he did...

*What am I doing...?* The voice asked as Tails spoke using Rouge's voice. "I... I'm Rouge? What..." She blinked, frowning. The voice was confused by this statement. Of course she was Rouge...
1453121.title: Rouge

14531211.content: Tails held back a laugh as he decided to take advantage of his current situation as he went to the bat's apartment using her memories for directions. Once there he grabbed a camera and began to undress and and laid across her bed and took a few shots, these would go to Knuckles as he just wanted to make the echidna uncomfortable after he bashed a hole in his wall the previous week. *Knuckles didn't bust a hole in my wall last week?* Rouge questioned as she seemingly heard Tails' thought.

14531212.content:
Tails brushed aside that thought as he groaned mentally, not sure how to communicate this to her... Only to have Rouge's thoughts stumble a bit. *Why do I want to talk to myself? I must be going crazy...* Tails could tell she was willing her body to continue forward... And he let her. He was silent in her mind until she got to her apartment... Where he took charge, looking into her mirror and sighing. "Hey, Rouge... Its Tails." She said to herself... Which only made her blink at how strange saying that felt. *Now what the hell am I doing...?* She thought as he continued to speak as her.

"For some reason, when I fell onto you... I fell... INTO you... Now I am you." Rouge began to feel frightened at this... Why was she saying all this? It felt like her saying it... But it didn't stop feeling weird... Tails just frowned further at that... Rouge thought she was just going crazy, pretending to be Tails in the mirror for an unexplained reason. Just then, everything seemed to go hazy... Like he was seeing two worlds at once... In the one world, the real world, Rouge was just talking to herself in the mirror. In the second world... Tails saw himself in the mirror, and the reflection did not match the body. Not in appearance or in movement.

"I'm inside of you, Rouge." He said firmly as Rouge growled. "Little perv... Get out of me!" Tails just sighed and shook his head at that. "I would if I could, Rouge... But I'm glad you believe me now..." He sighed as Rouge tried to turn away, but found herself unable to. "Let me go! What are you doing?!" She cried out as Tails 'tsk'ed. "Rouge... I'm you. Completely..." He said as Rouge's mental image shifted a bit... And she suddenly found herself staring from the other side of the mirror rather than Tails. She tried to protest, but now when Tails made a movement, her own body was forced to follow. "I can't do anything about it, Rouge... I'm sorry. But I'll treat you well!" He said, though her voice and his mixed in their mind...

info.description:
One night Miles 'Tails' Prower was working on the Tornado, his plane. This was normal for the yellow fox as he loves machines, even more than any girl! Then as the two tailed fox was finished fixing his plane's engine, when a blinding light came throe the window. This startled Tails, who then found himself unconscious on the floor.
